50b7(mdo): yul du skyes pa ste// shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig nyed dbang 'das 'apyod yul pa// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs
50b8(mdo): ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul da ro lad pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi ga rang thabs ston pa po// chos kyi gang thabs ston pa ba// rab ston da yon tand spyar mdzad pa// spyod pa
51a1(mdo): ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/ yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas 'apyod yul rnam sangs rgyas// dgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/ 
51a2(mdo): bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul do na par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub byed stobs// theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs// blo chen rgyal bar dka' ba'i// nyon
51a3(mdo): mongs rgya mtsho phyi rol gshegs// theg pa chen po tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos sa pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste// sangs
51a4(mdo): rgyas sa li 'bras bur gnas// kong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/ khyod minam mkha'i gnas ma bzhugs// bde 'byungs dang ni/ dang nams kyi// mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod// sangs
51a5(mdo): rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan brgyal rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha'i tshogs rnams kyis// phyag byas mgo smad phyogs cig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na
51a6(mdo): gnas pa sa lus me se 'khod/ bong du rdo rje mod 'ching ba// langs nas cod pan rab tu gsos// dkyil 'khong mtshan po mams cad tu// gad zer chen thos yongs bkang nas/ 
51a7(mdo): nor bu'i rgyan minas g.yo zhing // Tha ha grags pa sgra spogs te// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal ba grangs byed gsugasags pa// byang chub sems pasogs mchog rnams kyis/ 
51a8(mdo): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma ched dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la spyod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan
51b1(mdo): brgyal rba brgyad grags bas pa/ bcom ldan 'das zung bad dad// ba dang ngas nyan mangs dang / reg pa sems cad das pa / macan brgyam brgyad mtshan brtan na// zlab
51b2(mdo): ras grol cing / nyon mongs mtha' dag nas par spong // shes rab chen po nyid tu 'gyur// de ni yongs khyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams kyi 'gyur// de ni cher rabs thams cad du// blo ldang/ 
51b3(mdo): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la// bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis// mngon gsum gzigs nas bka' su lad pa// rgyal ba 'is
51b4(mdo): 'brim pa ste// brgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/ 'dzi/ te bde ba kun las 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mdo dam du phyogs// gzhan gyis myi tshugs gzungs dang de/ 
51b5(mdo): mtshan brgyam brgyad cang byed pa/ de dag nam dag bdag nyid de/ sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa ci kyis kyang // de dag sa cher 'bras bur gnas/ ring por/ 
51b6(mdo): myi thogs dga' 'gyur na// 'chang stsogs lta la ci zhig smos// de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la// gtan tu bde ba 'dod pa yis// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing
51b7(mdo): bcang bar bya// dgang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang btod da ni// de 'don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad myi 'gyung// 'din yon tan kun gyi thom/ 
51b8(mdo): dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyend 'bras bu bla myed mchog/ bde 'byung 'thob par byed pa yin// 'bras bu 'byor da pa ci yang rung // thob par myi 'gyur dogs pa myed/ 
52a1(mdo): kun mkhyen go 'phang thob 'gyur nas// dpe myed gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyas sa'i 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan
52a2(mdo): snying rje'i dri ma myed sbyin pa// 'di mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dka' ba ste// / 'jig rten dkun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang myed// ston pa sangs rgyas
52a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs so// / @/ 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya
52a4(mdo): rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sesadapa' chen po rgyal 'chab/ dadu dpang skur ba/ 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
52a5(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying zo smras pa// na ma stai yang dI ka nAn/ sarba ta tha ga tha nar/ tad d+ya tha au/ sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ 
52a6(mdo): ma dang/ ma gad pa/ tsamaca/ tsa/ b.rab pa/ pa hasham/ bka/ nyakapas / sranas/ dam/ ag ma/ sa kangs te// de nas de bzhi
52a7(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhes gzungs chen po 'di ni yon tan ma ste/ mtha' mas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang zhinang tu thos par dga' ba/ 
52a8(mdo): sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad stod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs byed pa/ 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug
52b1(mdo): pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ sel ba ngan pa dang / las ngam pa thams cad las bad par byed pa/ sems cad gi khams maba' mas su byed pa/ yongs su badras par byed pa me/ gded tu bkod pan
52b2(mdo): men pa rdo rjed kyim 'bamag 'bar la dang / lA ma yis du bcas pa/ norang bu cod pam gyis bsrings pa/ rgyan 'breng rab tu gso pa nams kyis bong bal ma spar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog las
52b3(mdo): pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyim mngon par bstod pa/ dpal ba chen po babs brnyes pa// rgyas 'thab khyi'i bdag po ste// 'jig te dang bdag pong nas par gsal// dang pa
52b4(mdo): po mngon par rgyas// tsham chen stobs ldan che ba ste// ded da zhin yangs shing rdul dang bral// dbang chen rtse ltapa 'o da ldan pa// sa'i dbang phyug rnam par gnod// rgyal chen mtshon
52b5(mdo): cha brgya pa ste// mchom cha chen po'i rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan 'od brgyas bsgyings pa ste// nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyad thogs srid gsum dag na spa ba'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i khyod yul can// 
52b6(mdo): lun pa'i tha pyid kyi la'o// cenas dkyil 'khor 'char bag// dkyis 'bar chen pa sangs spyod pa rang tu dga' ba de bzhin de/ long su dga' 'an chen po'am// me ba lda rnams
52b7(mdo): sangs rgyas gtung chu rgyas yang da cing // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang lan// sangs rgyas yongs kyid mongs par bye/ sangs rgyas bstan pa san pa za// te se rba 'byi
52b8(mdo): bzhin du yangs// sa'i dbang phyug bde badzad pa// pad ma/ 'dab stong rtse mo can// rdo rje pad ma legs par skyes// chos kyi longs spyod longs par 'apyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/ 
53a1(mdo): spang bar byed par 'byung ba bo/ sring gsus lags nyam lags/ gtso ba chen po cher grags pa/ seng ge chen za grobs pa che/ ma lugs chen po zhal che ba// skye bo ngad dang sug
53a2(mdo): bsngal 'dus/ don gyi mu byecu rtsa// nong bu yidabu thong rgyan du thogs// byi ru gser gi gcal bkra ma la/ su chen zhabs kyi skabs kyis gshegs// zhal mdangs nyis du ma'i gzas/ lang po
53a3(mdo): pa gnyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri myed dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gro// drung kyis/ das lus paspyod pa'i// 'bar pa chen po lta ba cad// 'od gce
53a4(mdo): mang pos phog pa li/ ban pa 'i thabs ni rab ston pa/ brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa'i// 'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung rgyan 'od gzer spel mar bkod// mtsho
53a5(mdo): bris gan tu mdzes par 'chab// yun po phrad cing lathag pa skang// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs// de rje chen po ci mo can// shind tu dga' mdzad pa de skyed pa// byams pa 'i dkyis 'khor ga
53a6(mdo): char bgos// brtsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshod cha chen po shi nad tu 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas sba ba'i dkyil 'khor pa// 
53a7(mdo): ma 'pham thub byed dag pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam myed che// byams pa'i snying po snying po che// byams pa'i pad ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chad chen rdo rje can// rdo rjes bstan pa'i dkyil
53b1(mdo): 'khor ba// rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bsten cing bstod pa po// grub pa chen po rig sngags grub// rdo rje 'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad
53b2(mdo): grub pa po// sangs rgyas gtung gi sdong chen lags// kas pa sngags chen po rnam par nges// mdo sde bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges 'gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi// spang ba'i dri ma seld par mdzad/ 
53b3(mdo): 'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyurd cing shin tu nges// sa ha sa hI bdag po mchog/ 'od gzer bde legs bde lem
53b4(mdo): mdzad// stobs chen 'char ba bkra shes pa// nyi ma 'dra sten dmas pa lags// stod byed rgyal ba'i yongs spyod ldan// dmakha' ltar dri myed khyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms
53b5(mdo): par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ste brtson pa byed// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston// rlung chen dashugs kyis bskyod pa 'i// g.yo dang 'brug spogs sgra ldan pa/ 
53b6(mdo): sangs rgyas gyod yul pad ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa 'i dbang phyug po// byams pos
53b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun nas gnod bral gyi// thub pa'i nyi mas bkal sa lad pa// kye ma mying brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ mying gi yon tan 'od ldan pa// pade dang phun gsum tshogs/ 
53b8(mdo): sgrub pa// thabs chen bla byed pa ste// mying brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun ki bde skyed pa// 'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag
54a1(mdo): las rgyal ba 'i// byams pa'i bstod pa'i gnas po la/ mying brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// myi ni la la kang skrod pa// de la lha las sogs kun dang // lag na rdo rje stobs can nams/ 
54a2(mdo): rtag pa nyid du sdug pasngal kun// gtan tu gsal phyim brtsom par byed// gang zhig kyi brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ mung du 'don pa'i khyod ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la me tsom yong byed do// 
54a3(mdo): nang par mal nas langs nas de// gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byams par rtog pa ni// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de pyir dris khams cad sel byed cing // sdig 'joms
54a4(mdo): yon tan mas cad bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten sdug pa sngal daselang bal// mying brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par logs/ 'phags pa byams pa'i mchar brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs pa/ 
54a5(mdo): dang bcas pa/ rdzogs so// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phag
54a6(mdo): pa nam mkha'i snying po'i zhal ras rgya che zhing / s+yang gi 'od 'gro bas/ nam mkha 'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad
54a7(mdo): ma sa phyag 'tshal lo// ma ni/ ka la la Ta/ bi mu la sa ba ba/ du ma du du go mar sa hA// de nas gzungs 'di brjod ma thag du/ ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang
54a8(mdo): g.yos par gyur pa/ rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang zag par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' su la pa// kye 'khor/ 
54b1(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor na/ 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khom mngon gsum pa rnams kyis hA'i mchog gi gzungs/ 'byung bar shind tu dka' ba/ bsod nams chen mo/ sdig pa dag
54b2(mdo): nyon mongs pa thams cad bsreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rin po che'i phung por gyu rad pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma byed par 'gyur zhing / legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la/ shind tu ni
54b3(mdo): pa dag par 'gyur ro// pad ma la bur 'gyur te/ 'khor pa'i nyes pas phyigs ma// nyis la bur 'gyur te sems can thams cad spang bar byed do// tha ba la bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu rim
54b4(mdo): par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te// ngadu song gi sdug pa dasngal thams cad kyis kyi gos so// sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ dmathos dpan byed do// phung po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can/ 
54b5(mdo): thams cad kyis bskyod par myi nus so// tha dad pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis myi gos so// de la rdzogs pa yon tan stong phrag gyis 'grangs pa/ tshad myed grangs myed pa dag/ 
54b6(mdo): thob par 'gyur ro// nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / stond pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smond pa dang / re ba
54b7(mdo): thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / chab myi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas bklag pa dang / myi nad dang / mi las ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang
54b8(mdo): 'jigs pa'i dus dang 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'ged pa dang / gcan zan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor da pa dang / 
55a1(mdo): dad pa nga sa ca 'grul par 'gyur ma// denas 'bor dadag mas kyi/ ma co dang / gan/ lha dang zhes byas nas/ nas dang rgya
55a2(mdo): tshogs pa spyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa rnam sa kha'i snying pa'i mcha brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho la bsod pa/ yang dag par brjod pa/ 
55a3(mdo): nam ma khal snying po srang gsum sems can brtog/ 'byo nga ldan blo gros rim chen rgya mchom pal// sems can dag pa bu khyed rin ced mchog/ tha rad pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sug bsngal yis// kun ma byed dul
55a4(mdo): mnyan legs dang segs phyin ma byed// ba na mtshan mo danapa pade dang gyi sa des byed// las sa byed rjes pabyed de/ dang kyi dge babyed// dum ma byed dge ma byen slobs dang stobs kyi
55a5(mdo): mibyed// 'gram zhanam mchog sems can lan ta pag/ ma mchog sanas chos tu la dang rgyal phyin mchog/ chog mchog 'dzind dang 'dzin byed chos// dga' mchog rtags
55a6(mdo): mchog mchog dang mchog myin mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab tha rad pa'i rab te nye nad kyi rab// rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs rtse'i rab// mnyam rab sems cad rab ste gsu
55a7(mdo): rig rag/ legs smod mchog smom stobs dang stobs byin smod// b.rang slod rig slon rgyal dang rgyal phyir smon// dge slong gzi sgom dor bu'i 'od kyi smod// rgya gang zla ba rgyal las shar ba'i spron/ 
55b1(mdo): sems can dab za// rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad myed dbang // dpa' po rig sngags 'chang dab srid gsum dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje 'od rdo rje 'bar/ 
55b2(mdo): rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzi dad rdo rje grag/ rdo rje rgya cher rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na bza' sngo zhing sku'i cha lugs sngo// sku mdog sngo zhing sngo pa'i 'od kyis brgyan// 
55b3(mdo): ral gro na 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsdams// mkhal sngog zhal myed khang 'bar dpar bzhugs// lA nal dri myed shi rang tu myi bzad 'bar// rab tu grag la 'od gzer 'phro zhing 'gyu// sdig sel
55b4(mdo): rdul ltar 'khrul myed 'phreng mchog can// glog gi stobs kyi spa bas bsregs la brtan// ral gri'i mchon thogs dbang da ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo rje'i mchod thogs mdal dang mdung zung
55b5(mdo): 'jigs// 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcings pa mi dang 'bru/ gsal zhing mtshon thogs dgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa/ bde 'byung 'jig rtend gsum dag rdo rje'i dbyug/ sku rnams zas/ 
55b6(mdo): cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan// grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad// mu tig 'phreng bas bsgegs shing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'phye/ 
55b7(mdo): mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes// mthul stobs lhag par brnyes shing grub brnyes la// rig pa gsum gi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'gren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa// cha lugs gas/ 
55b8(mdo): mchog dar ba chen po 'dren// byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dred// legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dred snying rje can/ dri myed cha lugs gsal ba ma lugs 'bar// nam zags bskyegs pas
56a1(mdo): mags pa'i bdan cad/ 'gro ba'i gapas 'bred 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyed// sangs spyod gsal par ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sru dmar mu mdog su mdzes gru bzang ba/ 
56a2(mdo): pa ngas ma pa can / napa// gtsun gnang sa gam ca ma / mad pa can
56a3(mdo): yangs/ mica la bathad pa legs pa thags pa// yon tam la dastobs khyad pam rnam par grags// nom bu chen po napa dkug dang thu ma 'od// nyi ma nom bu'i rgyas khyod nor bu 'bar/ 
56a4(mdo): yid bzhin nor bu 'gro 'gon gcig pa// nam mkha'i dkyil na nor/ bu gcig sdang ltar// sems can nam dag yangs zhing napar grags// srid gsum srungs pa gcig pu rgyal sras man/ 
56a5(mdo): ni pa rab tu mas srub sa 'os stag/ skye dgu'i bdag po par 'byung pad ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba// dpapa legs bshad rab tul legs bshad phyag// tho ba'ang / 
56a6(mdo): 'od bzang bde ldan ste gnas bab // mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan// zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// 'od kyi 'byung gnas pade mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung zhes
56a7(mdo): rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang nam grags mdzad// nam grokrol nyes grol shi nad tu grol ba'i blo// blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu longs/ 
56b1(mdo): myod sgo ste blo'i mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkor mchog gsum las bsgrags// sangs rgyas pad la 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad/ snying po gsal ba'i snying po bta
56b2(mdo): zhing 'dul/ ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan parnyes rab gsal ba// s+yan bur mdal 'di rab tul gtad legs pa// 'jigs myed 'al ras stond kyi zla ba 'dra// mdung thung brgya 'i mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs
56b3(mdo): zag po 'joms pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab tu mkhas pa 'thogs dgal 'dris par sa// rab tu zag pa mnyen rab gser mdog can// la chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ 
56b4(mdo): rgyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel// 'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'// na bzal bzang banab/ sa g.yas 'bed tshabs cher 'phen// legs bris sna chos/ 
56b5(mdo): mchom ma sna tshogs mngal// ma bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan ki dpal// zhal ras zla ba'i 'od gser rgyas pa 'dra/ zhal mdangs bstand pas 'jig rtedang kun 'byor nga mdzad/ 
56b6(mdo): bzhed pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mngal// zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thog thog 'jigs pa'i sla// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yol ba 'dzind// sgra snyan snang ba man
56b7(mdo): pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rno ba'i mchog/ rgyun 'jim dpal 'dzin da rin cen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang myi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun gi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras 'phreng ba
56b8(mdo): bzang // stobs chen 'jig rtend blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyan zhing brtags// myi'i mngal bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu// spu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ 
57a1(mdo): mabra' zhabs yang 'azhi mad pagang mug sam 'an/ gdad pa 'bang za gang nyid las gshegs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyal 'dug par mdzad/ brtan brgyang sa rab tu nges byu dang
57a2(mdo): dkris 'amadam bkun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig pu ste dbu mi dkyis nalam dog ma khyed// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes// dbang srub ba ches zhipas bcum legs gnas pa/ 
57a3(mdo): gnas chen mo dad pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs selang pa dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas / bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'dod byed pa/ 
57a4(mdo): 'jig rten zla ba gcig zham bzhin du snang // nam mkha'i snying po/ sems cam mchog gcig pa'i// mdun 'dug nang par bsngo/ dpa 'di brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog
57a5(mdo): 'byung nas/ dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang mdang par 'gyur/ gsal da 'bab rtsod zhidang tu myo bzad dang // n+ya ge'i gardo ba myi nad byung ba na/ mkhas bcu nig sngar yang sA dang bskye
57a6(mdo): nas// rnam mtham ring tho ma na ma grod zung ba// da ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas sems cad dang // sug pa sngal 'byung 'arjen rig pa rnams las 'thos// des mi ni mchog pade ba kun gnas dang / 
57a7(mdo): bde ba rgya chen nges la mthab par 'gyub// mdam pa longs spyod 'bel bya ba 'am/ rgyal srid mob dang byad gzugs no 'thob dang // rig 'thob yon tan kun gyi ga ni grub phyir// bton na 'grub 'gyur
57a8(mdo): 'di la the tsom byed// mi byir ci ste rtag tu 'dod pa de kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba// nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la// rtag tu bstod cing sngags kyang bstar par gyis// 
57b1(mdo): 'phags pa rnam ma kha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs so// rgya kar gyi mkhan po su ren 'dra// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang / 
57b2(mdo): bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po/ nam mkha'i dkyis kun tu rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i bram nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyis ma
57b3(mdo): kun tu 'phrob pa'i sku tha dad pa myed cing / dus gsum gi su mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs cad/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i sgras kun tu
57b4(mdo): mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs canabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ rab 'byams yi dbang phyug chen/ 
57b5(mdo): pa zhes bya ba la mams par bzhugs pa// de ras byang chub sa dpa' chen po kun tu ba'ang ba 'oms par bzhugs sa zag pa da'i so chen pa'i 'jig rted kyi nus tha rab gi dus byed naste/ 
57b6(mdo): rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ rnam mapa'i khams kyi sangs su rtogs pa'i sku rnams/ sa'i dkyil 'khod du ma dag tu kun nas 'thad por gyur da to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi/ 
57b7(mdo): khongs su gtogs pa'i di bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i 'go bo la byugs nas bkal stsa la da pe/ rigs kyi bu legs s+ho legs so// sangs
57b8(mdo): rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po/ gzungs chen mo shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po la mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pa/ do che sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo/ 
58a1(mdo): bar byas nas/ gzungs 'di bshad do// tad d+ya thA au na mo na ma s+t+ri pU pa ne sha rI/ ma hA bo ga ya/ a sa ma sa ma.a myi ta sa ma/ a nan ta sa mag ga na sa wa trib+h+yA/ 
58a2(mdo): ba nas ma a she la sa ma/ b+he sha sa ma/ ba ra mA m+ba sa ma/ swa ba bA sa ma/ ta ba tA sa ma/ a radza sa ma shud b+hi sa ma/ bud prI sa ma da ma/ ta ShA tA sa ma/ a bi sha ma sa masams
58a3(mdo): ma/ me ka nas/ pra ka ra/ b+hi shud d+he/ a lo ka/ hrI hrI/ lab la ba da/ bi ja la/ bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga tan yA na yA/ te ni ra d+hi Sh+Tha na/ saM bo gA mA~M ma na la ya/ [।]5/ dang ma
58a4(mdo): ag kra/ dA ra d+ha ra/ dzA ya dz+wa ya/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ham/ swa hA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo/ 'jig rtend thos cad kyi 'gon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par
58a5(mdo): 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bcom lda na 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas na/ de skad ces smras te/ 'jig rtend gsum po kun tu gang bar byas
58a6(mdo): so// de nas la dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ gser gi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus cad/ sa steng kur ni
58a7(mdo): rdo rje me tog thod/ stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas/ ha ha zhes sgra phyung ste spras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grangs myed pa rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen
58b1(mdo): mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung chen po mtha' dang dbus myed pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing / sems can gi khams grangs myed pa yongs su smyi red par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa
58b2(mdo): myed pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas/ 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skyems la/ lta ba'i ngo bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo// 
58b3(mdo): skal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag ma bsags shing / bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag pu ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/ thams cad mkhye/ 
58b4(mdo): pa li sa'i khyad par yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa/ gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi snying po/ gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang myi
58b5(mdo): nus na/ gzung ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos// gzungs chen mo 'di mying tsam yangabaskal pa bye ba stong gi bar du thos par dka'o// kye ma gzun
58b6(mdo): chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// 'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o// dge ba'i rtsa
58b7(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sug bsngam
58b8(mdo): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// la nad gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// land gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// 
59a1(mdo): de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du/ yon tan rnams thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sdug bsnga
59a2(mdo): thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 
59a3(mdo): nags tshal chen po li nang du skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug la lan bdun brjod na/ bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bapa 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun tu zang po'i sku gzug/ 
59a4(mdo): kyi drung du dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog las stsogs/ pa ci snyed pas mchod nas/ lus ngal par gyur da kyi bar du/ gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na/ 
59a5(mdo): rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas/ yang dag par dbugs 'byind par mdzad de/ chos kyi sdang ba chen po yang brtsog
59a6(mdo): par mdzad do// 'di skad du rgyal ba 'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod che rjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung
59a7(mdo): de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu che ba dang che bar grags par yang 'gyuraro// 
59a8(mdo): lha rnams kyang de la lta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo // nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdol sde rnams klag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang / 
59b1(mdo): bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad rdzogs shing / sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
59b2(mdo): bsngags par 'gyur ro// lA las stsogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar ji skad bste dad pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni/ ring por
59b3(mdo): myi thogs par kun tu bzang po lis chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje gtsug pud las bstsogs pa stong gsum gi bdag po/ rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / gyar chen mo las
59b4(mdo): stsogs pa rig sngags chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje snying po las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje zhags pa las stsogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang / 
59b5(mdo): ring chen dra ba can las spogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgron ma las sogs pa byang chub se mas dpa' chen po 'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dang chen dang / 
59b6(mdo): gzugs babang dang / shind tu blta na sug pa las stsogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / gzho ru ma rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bram mo rnams dang / byi 'khrugs pa las bsogs pa/ log
59b7(mdo): 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog las stsogs pa srin po bdag po rnams dang / ma mo las stsogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po las stsogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang
59b8(mdo): rdo rje me tog thod las sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan/ 
60a1(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bla na myed pa'i yon tan gi snang ba zhes bya bas mngon par bstod pa// kun tu bzang po kun gi mchog/ sna tshogs kun gi 'byor da pa che// dkyil 'khor chen po
60a2(mdo): li rdo rje mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po dges pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnon dang rab gnon dpal gi rab// khyad par rgyal ba'i blo gros
60a3(mdo): rgyal/ rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad// sgrub dka' chen pos bsgru ba mdzad pa// rol mo chen pos rnam par rol // rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po// la chen dbang phyug chen po ste// brgyan po
60a4(mdo): khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/ sa steng sa 'ogs la dgyes// de bzhims 'dzin pas gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i/ go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/ 
60a5(mdo): shes nyen can de bzod la dgyes// brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor de pa che// brtsod 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa// stong bcu 'i sras chen thu bo che// mthu stobs song gi gro ba dang / 
60a6(mdo): yongs su ldam zhing bcu sel ba// rdul sel rgyal po chen po ste// rgyal ba 'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba// rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga ma khyend pa'i blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa mdzes pa
60a7(mdo): skald pa bzang // shi nad tu stug pa dga' skyed pa// snying rje chen po las byung dbal// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'// sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam// rlung dang mtshungs pa'i pyod yul can// 
60a8(mdo): gzi brjid nyid de gzi marjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu dang 'dra// lugs dang skyo ba zhi bar mdzad// thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil// g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste// g.yul gnyis/ 
60b1(mdo): pa rab 'joms pa// gsung babang ngang ba'i mdangs su bzhad// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po las lhagazugs dang mnyam// chos 'dzind 'byor da dang ldan par bsta dang // rab dga'
60b2(mdo): bun mo bzhi mngad pa/ nyan mongs 'dabardab khyims mngadas// dpa gas pa'i dbas dang ses// ma nga 'jigs pa rnas par 'jogs// gsung sa 'das pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyam pabam
60b3(mdo): mnyam pa dang / mnyas byed yul las rnas par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang myong sul gcog/ byang rnab snying por rgya cher rol// rim parab god dag pas// rgyan babang phun su ma tshogs pa dag/ 
60b4(mdo): gtsang ma las babang sbyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad pasreg sbyin mchod da sbyin po// 'joms byed dgegs byed nas par 'joms/ datho ba mdzad dpel byed gsung ba po// rdo rje 'jig rten gcig snang ba/ 
60b5(mdo): skyes pa bud myed tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor da madz+ra pa// sems can 'khor ba zhi bar mdzad// brtang po sdig pa rnams dang bral// kun tu rna ba rgyal snang ba po// 
60b6(mdo): brtsonam par bklags/ nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar ba'i dag pa pa 'gro ma dzad pa// rgyags shing bde ba zhi bar mdzad// rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa// sdang ba thams cad
60b7(mdo): nges pa 'joms// pha rold bzhugs pa le sreg sel ba// dag pa nam mkha'i lhod yul cad// dag pa sbyin zhing yon sbyin pa// 'bras bu spyir zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nas sbyin/ 
61a1(mdo): longs khyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa// dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la// der sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par rgyal// dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde
61a2(mdo): 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs// sa 'dzind bzung bar dka' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin cen 'dra ba rin chen mnyam// sgron ma
61a3(mdo): mun sel rgyal ba can/ yon tan ye shes theg chen ldam// brtum mchog che ba'i bdag nyid can// gsung ba chen po shes rab che/ sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston dpa// mchod pa chen po theg ched gi/ 
61a4(mdo): theg pa bla na myed par ldan// mchod pa chen po chos che ba/ da'abras bu chen po chos kyi mchog/ sto dang mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po// zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa// bzang po bzang / 
61a5(mdo): dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun tu rab 'byor da selang mdzad pa/ snying rje ye shes snying po mkhye dang // snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil khor can// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs// dus chen nam
61a6(mdo): par dag par mdzad// 'tsho ba mchog dpar ba mtho ba dang // cong chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can// skye dgu spang zhing rgyas yangs pa// rnyed par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor da can// kun tu khyod pa khong dge
61a7(mdo): ba/ dge ba dam pa sbyin pa'o// kun tu yul kun mngal ba ste// zhes bzang po rtag tu mngal// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen po pad ma logs// zla ba lta bur
61a8(mdo): tshim mdzad thabs/ mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen pa// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mngal// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po
61b1(mdo): bregs pa me// dam pa nyid de thar byed// gsang sngags rlabs mi rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan brgya'i spos kyis rgyas// dag cing bya la mkhas la sogs// yon
61b2(mdo): tan 'byung la rigs sngags rgyal// gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs// mchog rnams kyis mi bstod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs
61b3(mdo): kye la bstod pa chen po brgya// byi brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis// myi rnams la la gang zhig byis// sdig pas la kun tu bzang po la// snying nas 'di yis pastod byas ni// des ni sangs rgyas
61b4(mdo): nyid kyang 'thob// gang zhig mying brgya rtsa brgyad 'don// dpyi de yom tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs tshul dache ba'i// ye shes ma lus smra bar nus// de ltar thub mchog
61b5(mdo): yon tan brgya 'i spos las nges par byung gyu rad cing // yod tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rte dang yas cad dag gi yon tan rgyas rnams las/ bstod pa chen pos snang byas rgyal ba li sras
61b6(mdo): la bstod pas nyid me bstod byas na// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur ba'i snang ba thob cing rnam dag/ yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya
61b7(mdo): rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs s+ho// rgya kar gi mkhan rgya kar skad du/ A pya man 'dzu shri na ma sang gi ni// bod skad tu
61b8(mdo): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la phyaga'atshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dkal 'dul ba rnams kyi
62a1(mdo): mchog/ dpa' gro 'jig rtend gsum las rgyal// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// pad ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i s+yan// pad ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal mngal ba/ rang gi lag
62a2(mdo): gis rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs// lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gtul dka' 'dul ba po// 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can/ 
62a3(mdo): don rtse mo rab 'tho ba// rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa// snying rje che dang shes rab dang // thabs kyis 'gro doran byed pa'i mchog/ dgalas ku rangs pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo lus kyi gzugs
62a4(mdo): ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa 'i 'gon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas// 
62a5(mdo): thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// kyad sngar 'dug ste 'dis gsosad// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag da bdag la thugs rtse 'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngod rdzogs pa ma
62a6(mdo): byang chub rtsi nas bdag thob mdzod// nyon mongs pas ni sems bklags shing // kyai shes 'dab tu bying ba'i// sems cad kun la sman pa dang // bla myed 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i ma
62a7(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro bu'i bla ma stond pa po// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyend// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig
62a8(mdo): bdag/ ye shes su ster dbyung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'// bying ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ dod zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs myed rab zhi ba// thogs/ 
62b1(mdo): bar dang mthar dge ba/ 'das pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// yang dang yang bya gsungs pa ga pa/ 
62b2(mdo): rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag byed rnams kyi bka' bzhin du// glur blangs gapa lags bshad du gsol// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun ni// gas
62b3(mdo): 'dzin can ma bdag 'gyur phyir/ nges par 'byung gi bar du ni/ bdag gi bsam pa brtan pos bzung // nyon mongs ma gus b.las pa dang // mye shes ma lus spang ba'i byor// bsam pa'i khyad par
62b4(mdo): bzhin du// sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal/ dgasang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas na
62b5(mdo): spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shag kya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nasaljags bzang ba// ring zhing yangs par brkang mdzad de// 'jig
62b6(mdo): rtend gsum po sdang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum/ sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung mi snyam pa yis// 'jig rtenadu
62b7(mdo): gsum po kun bkang nas// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gas pa dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// snying rje che dang ldan gyur pa// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod// ye shes lus cad 'jam dpal gi// mying brjod pas
62b8(mdo): mdon sem/ dag par byed cing sdig sol ba// pa las nyan par bsto nga pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas/ khyod la legs par
63a1(mdo): bstand par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes/ gsol// de nas bcom ldan shag kya thub// gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang // gsang sngags
63a2(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rtend 'jig rtend 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten pa snang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang / 
63a3(mdo): rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas// tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su myed par 'byung ba dang // myi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa// 
63a4(mdo): a A/ i I/ u u.e e me au.au a/ sI to hI ti/ gnya' na mur ti/ ra he saM bud d+ho/ dbud d+ha ne/ trad pA ba ra ti na/ au badz+ra tika sA du kha che da
63a5(mdo): prad nya gnyal na mu pa ta ye/ gany+dzan ka ya/ ba gi zhar/ A rab cam ya te na thA// / 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas a las byung // man/ 
63a6(mdo): yig 'bru kun gi mchog/ don chen yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas byung ba skye ba myed// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gi rgyu'i mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// 
63a7(mdo): mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang rtse// nyon mongs kun gi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti
63a8(mdo): mug sel/ mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba me// dga' ba chen po/ 
63b1(mdo): bkru ba'o// gzugs ma lus kyang che ba ste/ kha dog che zhi bsum po che// byed yang me pa byache pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// zhes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba zo/ nyor
63b2(mdo): thong sa chen po lugs kyu'i mchog/ grags chen lan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsas pa che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul cher po don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen
63b3(mdo): po dgal bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po myig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po gtso po ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po// brtson 'grus chen po bcu
63b4(mdo): pa yin// bsam gtan chen po la ting 'dzin gnas/ shes rab chen po'i lus/ 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu myed/ 
63b5(mdo): snying rje med la blo'i mchog/ shes rab chen po khri ci du mkhas pa cher po zabs che ba/ rdzu 'phrul chen po spobs dang ldan shugs chen ma gyogs pa chen po ste/ rdu 'phrul chen po nyer bas/ 
63b6(mdo): ba/ stobs chen la rol gnod pa so// srin pa 'i mi mo chen po 'jobs/ gakhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chab// drag po ched po drog shul che/ 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'o// 'gon pa
63b7(mdo): rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ theg pa ched pol tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po bro ched
63b8(mdo): ldan// gas pa sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyi rad bcu thob pa ste// pha rol daphyind pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyind bcu dag pa ste/ 
64a1(mdo): pha rol du phyi dad pa bcu'i tshul/ 'gon po sa bcu la dab 'phyag ste// sa bcu la zhig nas pa po// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu nam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i
64a2(mdo): dor// thub dbang stobs bcu 'a khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gi don ni ma lus byed// nam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma myed pa gros myed bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ bder bar smra zhing cig
64a3(mdo): myi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su byed dang gnyis byed stond// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag myed seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu
64a4(mdo): 'gro ba'i don yod stobs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar margya dkas// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor lo sgyur/ pa stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 
64a5(mdo): tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu che gces pa 'arji nad pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gi tring myi 'jog/ tshig rje tshig bdag spra// mkhas pa// tshig la dbapa pa tshig mtha' yas/ 
64a6(mdo): tshig bded pa dang bden par sla/ bden pa bzhin gnod pa bo// phyir myi ldog pa phyir myi 'ong// 'dren pa rang rgyal gsel chu'i tshul// nges byang sna tshogs las byung ba// 'thung ba chen po rgyu gcig / 
64a7(mdo): dge slong dgra ba com lag pa bad// 'dod chags thal bas dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs myed thob// gsal bar gyur pa rnyog pa byed// rig pa dang ni rkeng par ldan// bde gshegs 'jig
64a8(mdo): rtend rig pa'i mchog/ bdag gir myi 'dzin da rang myi 'dzind// bded pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthard sond pa// bya ba byas pas skam sar gnas// shes pa 'ab zhig des
64b1(mdo): gams pa// shes rab brtson nasanam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rted snang ba byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ma yod pam
64b2(mdo): dod grus pas pa pa grub pa'o// chog pa thas padanas// rnam par gyi rtog dbyi sa kyi ya/ tshal dbyings dam pa bad kyigs// bso das rnam pa tham nams chogs/ bshes / 
64b3(mdo): 'byung gnas che// mnos ldam sa yod byed zhes/ tshogs gnyis tshogs ri bsags pa'o// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor ba cad// thasas gtad bsas bya tho ldang bdag/ mo so rang rig gyi gsos
64b4(mdo): mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chab// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bad/ nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga'i bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan cad// rgyan lnga chags pa myed pa 'chang / 
64b5(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'o// sangs rgyas sras po dang pa'i mchog/ shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas byed/ chos las byung ba sred pa sel/ gcig bu ma malegs rdo rjer
64b6(mdo): bdag/ skyes ma zag pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung ranga'abyung ba// zhes rab ye shes mo che// 'od chen nam par snang bar byed/ ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar
64b7(mdo): rjod// ga dzi dpa 'ad gsas // gas drags 'dag gis rgya// gas gas rgyam pa ni na byed/ gtsun ta tshan pa can kyang ts+tsha/ rnam pa na/ 
64b8(mdo): po sna tshogs sod/ sangs rgyas kun gdag dngos po'i mchog/ 'gro kun dga' ba'i chog dpaldan// gA tshogs gzugs can bskyed pa'o// mchod cing brjod pa drang srob che// rigs gsum
65a1(mdo): 'acang pa gsang sngags can/ dam tshig chen po gas sngags 'dzin / gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/ don yod zhags pa nam par rgyal// 
65a2(mdo): 'dzid pa chen po na rje 'i zhegs// de de'i sngags kya zhags pa re// rdo rje'i 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ma'i tshul po gdang drung 'jigs// myig drag lagatsug stobs dang san/ keng ngas
65a3(mdo): mche ba brtsigs pa 'o// ha la ha la gdang brgyab// gzhin je gzhed pa dgegs kyi rgyal// do ni shugs can 'jigs par byed// de rje grags po rdo rje'i snying // rdzu 'phrul rdo rje gsum po yi/ 
65a4(mdo): de rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba dmyi g.yo ral ba gcig kyis bsgyings// glang chen ko rlom gos su gon// grag chem ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// hi hi zhes smog pa
65a5(mdo): 'jigs par byed// kad mo chen mo gad rgyangs che// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpal che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje drag po dga' ba che/ 
65a6(mdo): rdo rje hUM lce hU~M zhes sgrogs// mtshon du rdo rje'i mam 'thogs pa// rdo rje'i ma bris pa lus gco// rdo rje kun 'ad rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pu gsul sel ba// rdo rje 'bam sa myig kyi bzad/ 
65a7(mdo): sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// byig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i khrig/ lus na rdo rje'i ba su can// rdo rje'i su ni gcig pu'i lus// ser mo skyes pa rdo rje rtse// rdo rje snying
65a8(mdo): so lags pa ma khregs// da rje 'phre thogs dpal dpa ldan// de rje'i brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste// kar chungs gang nges par rdzogs/ mi gi drug pa rdo rdo'i sra// 'das dbyang sa ched pa lnga mam// 
65b1(mdo): 'a da nam na rgan gapa// dpa pa'i khams la A / pA dang na pa rnams kyisachog/ pa dag bdag byed dpan nyid// yang dag sa la la ga byed/ 
65b2(mdo): badzin no// bcing rgya rnags pa/ na / na te gnas mya nga 'as/ gas su sa / gzugs
65b3(mdo): yang dam pa ste// ga chogs gzugs can med sa skyes// gzugs rnams pasas zad snang ba'i dbas// gzugs brnyad ma lus 'chab bo// tsugs pa byed cing che ba ma grags// sa 'ams gtsum
65b4(mdo): dbang thug can pa ste// 'phags lam ni da tu po la gan/ dpas chen po rgyas kyi tog/ 'jig nyid gsus na gzhon dbus gcig/ gnas brtan nan po skye dgu'i bdag/ su
65b5(mdo): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'cha ba// stug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten da shes legs slob dpon ste/ 'jig rtend slob dpon 'jigs pa myed// mgon skyabs 'jig
65b6(mdo): rten yid bcugs pa// skyabs dang slob pa bla na byed// nas mkha'i mthal la long spyod pa// thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes mtsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa 'dre ba 'joms
65b7(mdo): ba/ nyi tshangasas sus ni byed pa/ 'ang ba'i rgya ma ma yo da// ye shes dbang gyur byed pan ca/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyad zhugapa pa gsus gsug pasdum no// 
65b8(mdo): gsum sem ma tham pas grol gsum 'phob// smig pa kun las nges par thos// mkha' sar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs kyi ma kun las 'das// dus gsu dus myed rtogs pa sa/ 
66a1(mdo): sems cad kung gi klu chen mo// yon tan mod can rnams kyi thod/ nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// nam ya ma chi las la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nong bu chen po 'chab/ khyas
66a2(mdo): bdag rin cen kung gi mchog/ dpag bsams shing chen rgyal ba ste// bum pa bzang po che ba 'i gachog/ byed pa sems can kum dod byed// par don sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes zhing
66a3(mdo): dus shes pa/ khyab bdag das zhes dam tshig ldan// tus zhes sems cad dbang po shis// nab grol gsum la mkhas pa'o// yon tan ldan zhis yod tad shes// chos shes kra nis kra nis 'byung // bar
66a4(mdo): bzags bdag dpas/ bachog ldan ma tshan skyed sa / spangs kyi sa srung sa zas// 'jig nyid dub skye/ 'jigs pa ma lus mal pa pa// cug zur grangs
66a5(mdo): grang lo ban/ mal pa mud lagacod pa dacad// gdong lngagatsug phud lnga dang ldan// thur bud lA pa me cogayod/ mgo rdzam bcul shugs ched po pa/ tshangs par spyod brgyal zhugs mchog/ da
66a6(mdo): chub gapas gyin pa dka' thub che// gtsang gnas dam pa ko la ta ma// bram ze sangs pa sangs pa shes/ mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thog// grol ba ya da pa nas grol lus// nas grol zhi bzhi pa nyid
66a7(mdo): mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'dar// legs par bya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sug sel ba la bar bya dad pa/ chags bral lus las 'das pa bo// thub pa myed pa dpe byed pa// phyi mngon kyi snang gsal byed byin/ 
66b1(mdo): ci cu kun 'gro khyas pa'o/ 'am zhing bag byed ma bon bral// rdul byed nul thal dril byed/ nyes pa sangs pa spyod byed pa/ gnad tu yad pa sang pa'i bdag/ kun zhes kung rig dab pa sa/ rnas
66b2(mdo): par zhes pa'i chos nyid 'das/ g.yo zhes gnyis myed tshul 'ang ba// rnas par rtog myed lun gyis kyab// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog pa tha la myed// / dang po sangs rgyas rgyu byed pa/ 
66b3(mdo): ye shes myig cig rtsis myed// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog sba ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa byed/ 
66b4(mdo): kun tu lta bu'i mchog tu dka'/ gzi lag rjid 'phreng ba ltar sdug/ 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gi be'u// laka na 'od 'bar snang ba po/ da smand pa me mchog tso bo ste/ thug tu 'byind pa bla na myed/ 
66b5(mdo): spang rnams pa lus ldon pa'i shing // dad to cog gi dgra che ba/ sU gu 'jig rten gsum gi mchog/ dpal ldan rgya ska pa dkyis 'jo can// phyogs bcung nam mkha'i mthar thug par // chos kyi
66b6(mdo): rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs// 'gro da gdugs cig yangs pa ste/ byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal dang pad ma gang gi bdag/ khyab bdag chen po rini chen gtugs// sangs rgyas kun ki gzi
66b7(mdo): brjid mo// sangs rgyab kun gi sku 'tshang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor da che/ sangs rgyas kun gi bstand pa gcig/ rdo rje rin cen dbang skur dpal// rin cen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig
66b8(mdo): rted dbang phyug kung gi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gi rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ 
67a1(mdo): rdo rje nyi ma sdang ba me// rdo rje zla ba dri myed 'ong / chags bral la srogs chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos/ 
67a2(mdo): 'dzin pa la/ dpal dang sangs rgyas pad ma skyes// kun mkhyen pa ye shes mdzod 'dzind pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rigs sngags rgyal// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// yi ge
67a3(mdo): mchog ste rnam par dag/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal sel// mchod cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo 'dzin 'jig/ rdo rje bro gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol daphyind pa kun rdzogs pa/ 
67a4(mdo): sa rnams kun gyi rgyam dang ldan/ rnam par dag pa bdag myed chos// yang dag ye shes khwa/ 'od babang // brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ rdo rje'i padam mi ma lus ldan// 
67a5(mdo): be shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang / kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang sa'i snying po 'gro ba 'di nad// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin man
67a6(mdo): dngos pokun gi rab bani 'dzin/ sme myed chos te sa tshogs dor// chos kun mom nyid 'ang ba// shes rab chen po skad cig la// chos kur khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun mngod par rtogs pa ste/ 
67a7(mdo): thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha'// byi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gi mngon gsum pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don/ 
67a8(mdo): drug dam pa ste/ ngan sod thams cad nam sbyong ba/ mgor po sems can kung gi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab krol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// myi shes 'gra'i glegs pa
67b1(mdo): 'jogs/ blo ldan sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan// brtan po lci stug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing // gom pa'i stabs kyis kar byed pa// dpal dpalag pa rgyas bka la/ 
67b2(mdo): nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyod// rkang pa cug 'thil gis gnod// rkang 'theb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang // tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnod// don cig gnyis myed chos
67b3(mdo): kyi dod// dam pa'i don ste 'jigs pa myed// rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can// sems dang rnas shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos don ma lus rnams la dag la// stong pa nyid dka' don chags blo/ 
67b4(mdo): srid pa'i 'dod chags rdzogs spangs pa// srid gsum dka' ba chen po pa// srin kar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzangs ston dka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma shar ka li dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo la
67b5(mdo): 'od ni zhes cher dpar// cod par bzang po'i mthon ka'i rtse/ skra mchog mthon ka chen po cad// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas srul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig rten/ 
67b6(mdo): sa sa khyen gyu pa/ rdu'aphral gang pa'i na 'ang// de nyid cad pa chen po las/ dran pa can po ting 'dzin ma/ byang chub sanas gas rtags sa// de bzhidi gzhan pa pa
67b7(mdo): mchog// lam gi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun lags cher chags// nam mkha' la bur chags pa byed// sems cad kun gyi yid la 'dug/ 
67b8(mdo): sems can kun gyi yi de ltam mgyogs// sems cad kun gyi dbang dod shes// sems cad kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga dod de nyid shes// nam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mahA/ 
68a1(mdo): sa gnas/ nges par 'byung ba krams mkhas/ nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun stod pa// yan las bcu gnyis srid rtsa latod/ das pa rnam pa bcwa
68a2(mdo): gnyis 'chang // bded bzhi'i tshul gi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shur byang chub pa// na
68a3(mdo): par sangs rgyas kun ni/ mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skul pa'i sku// bye ba dpag myed 'gyed pa 'o// skad cig thams cad mdzod par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs/ 
68a4(mdo): zabs tshul rig/ 'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po// theg pa gsum gis 'dzes 'byung ba// theg pa gcig gyis 'bras bu dganas// nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa 'i bdag/ las
68a5(mdo): kyi khams rnams zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgor pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa// snying rje chen
68a6(mdo): po shes rab thabs// dor yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi doran spangs pa// nam zhes don mi 'gag par byed// sems can kun yid yul dang ldan// sems can kun gyi yid rig pa/ 
68a7(mdo): sems cad kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par 'dug/ sems cad kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gi yid dga' ba// grub pa ma'am phyind 'phrul pa myed// nor pa
68a8(mdo): thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tsom myed pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gi bdag/ phung po lnga don tus gsum du// skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed// skad cig gcig gis
68b1(mdo): rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus myed lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gzugs rnams thams cad kun tu stond// nor bu chen po rin/ 
68b2(mdo): ched tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na byed// gsang sngags las byung yi ge myed// gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa'o// 
68b3(mdo): thig le cher po yi ge byed// stong pa chen po yi ke lAH// thig le stong pa yi ge brgya// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa myed// bcu drug byed phyed thig le 'chang // yan lag myed par rtsis las 'das// bsam gtan
68b4(mdo): gna'i rtse mo cad// bsas gzhan yang lag kun shes zhing / 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can su kyi cog/ longs spyod rdzogs su kun gyi rgyal// yul pa'i mu
68b5(mdo): sku'i mchog/ sangs rgyas stsal pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyon bcur phrul pa sna tshogs 'byed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed/ pa/ lha dang lha dbang lha la// lha'i bdag po la phyin bad/ 
68b6(mdo): 'chi byed dbang po lha'i lha// 'joms byed 'joms byed dbang phyug po// srid pa'i dkon pa las rgal pa// stond pa gcig pu 'gro ba li bla// 'jig rten daphyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi
68b7(mdo): sbyin bdag chen po kha// byams pa'i go chachas pa ste// snying rje'i ni ya la dgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs myi shes g.yul po sil// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba/ 
68b8(mdo): bdud bzhi li 'jigs pa sel bar byed// bdud kyi dpung rnams las byed pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten da 'dren// mchod 'os stod 'os phyag bya'i gnas// rtag tu ri mo bya ba 'i 'os// bkur 'os brjod
69a1(mdo): ya bar bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla la'i rab// 'jig te dang gsum po gos cig bgrod// mkhal lham mtha' byed nam pa ma gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/ mngon shes rje/ 
69a2(mdo): ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol daphyind pa'i mthal// shes rab kyi mi de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams
69a3(mdo): cad la// kun la phan pa li gang zag mchog// dper bya kun las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/ phyag rgya bzhi po'i don stod pa// 'gro ba'i
69a4(mdo): bsnyed bkur gnas kyi mchog/ res 'byung gsum gyi bgrod nams/ dkyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum dan skal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa/ 
69a5(mdo): 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog// / mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur da khyod la 'dud/ stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod
69a6(mdo): la 'dud/ sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'ja la lud// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas ros la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'drub pa khyod
69a7(mdo): la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsub nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// myed pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la/ 
69a8(mdo): 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol stor khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye she
69b1(mdo): ny-id khyod hA/ laganang dzi rdal ma/ 'don 'chos ldan 'das kyal shes/ de bzhi gshegs pa bam pa ched kyi sogs kyi mra 'dus dpas gzhes sams dpa'i/ yongs su
69b2(mdo): ba'i drud mong ma yin pa'i phyir yang dag par brjod pa yin te/ khyod kyi dga' ba dang / dang ba dang mgu la chen po bran myed pa bskyed pa dang / lus dngangag dang yi kyigasang pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang
69b3(mdo): su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongs su pa dag pa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su dag pa bya ba dang / bla ra myed pa'i don ma rtogs pa
69b4(mdo): rtogs par bya ba dang / mthob pa thob par bya ba nas/ de bani/ gshegs pa lams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung bya'i ba dra'i phyir ngas bshad cing bsad pa te bkrol zhing / rnam par
69b5(mdo): phye la gsal bur byas so// lag mardo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni/ ngas khyod kyi rgyud la yang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos / nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// lags
69b6(mdo): rdo rje rdo rdza' rang gnas yang skyi yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ thams cad bakhyed pa'i ye zhes dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gseng po shinang tu yongs su dag cing byang ba'o// de bzhi gshegs pa
69b7(mdo): thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// bde la ma gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings blan
69b8(mdo): myed pa thugs su chud pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyis bdud kyi stobs thams cad las par mdzad pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do// thams cad mabyed pa dpas kyi thams ca/ 
70a1(mdo): mkhyend pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs/ 
70a2(mdo): pa/ dri ma myed cing shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i skye gnas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ngo // lha dang phyi thams cad kyi 'byor da pa phun sun tshogs pa'o// theg pa chen po li gzhi'o// byang/ 
70a3(mdo): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyi mtha'o// rnam par grol ba rnams brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam skye ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshes
70a4(mdo): pa'i gtung myi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dadang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshadagacod pa'o// mu stegs can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o/ 
70a5(mdo): bdud bzhi'i stobs kyi dpung dang sde phab par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung babagrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su spyad pa'o// 
70a6(mdo): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzidad to// sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba brtson pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// kun tu sbyor ba thams
70a7(mdo): cad dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o// rdzas thams cad las tha dad pa'o// 
70a8(mdo): sems kyi g.yeng ba thams cad zhi ba'o// 'byord pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad sel pa'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o// 
70b1(mdo): 'khor ba 'i 'khor lo la myi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i bstan pa 'i gtugs dang // rgyal mtshar dang ba dang bsgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos stond pa'i gnas so// 
70b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpal gsang sngags kyi sgo'i byed pa spyod pa rnams mi myur du 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
70b3(mdo): rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa la mngon par brjod pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid mo yang rtogs pa'o// gnyis su myed pamam so brtogs par mngon par bzod pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyidad pa dang tshogs nas/ 
70b4(mdo): cad yongs su dag pa'o// sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// da 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sems rtse gni
70b5(mdo): gyis rtogs pa'o// mying yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yang yongs su rtogs par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // gzhan yang myir yang
70b6(mdo): dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun tu spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// 
70b7(mdo): ngang 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// myi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun gyi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnams zhi bar
70b8(mdo): byed pa'o// mi lam ngad pa thams cad nges par 'jig par byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o// brda ngas dang bgegs thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// su kyi na da dang byed / 
71a1(mdo): dge ba'i ma pa dang bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad kyi skye ba la byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang / brgyal dang / grags pa dang / rang
71a2(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du myed par smra ba
71a3(mdo): rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na myed pa'i shes rab dang yid bzhungs par byed pa'o// nad myed pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// / 
71a4(mdo): dpal dang dge ba dpa'i ba dang legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / bstod pa grags par byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad rab
71a5(mdo): tu zhi bar byed pa'o// shind tu dag pa rnams kyi yang shi dang tu dag pa'o// shin kya dag byed rnams kyi sang shin tu dag byed do// shin tu 'byor nga ldan rnams kyi ya bzhin tu 'byor nga ldan no// shin tu bkra/ 
71a6(mdo): shes pa rnams kyi yang shind tu bkra zhes pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skabs so// gnas byed pa rnams kyi gnas sa/ slob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi smos pa'o// dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung nyen
71a7(mdo): no/ gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo / 'khras sa myed pa rnams kyi 'khras sa bra na myed pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o// nad thams cad sel ba'i sman gi rgyal po chen po'o// blang ba dang dor
71b1(mdo): ba'i dngos po bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa un nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o// sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin
71b2(mdo): gi dbul bu'o// 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku thos par bya ba thams cad mkhye rad pa'i ye shes so// s+yar lnga khob pang bya ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i yongs su dag pa'o// zang zing dang gyi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa gto
71b3(mdo): ba'i phyir pha rob tu phyidad pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzidang yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyims pacu thob pa'o// chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su byed 'i
71b4(mdo): chos nyid do// sgro btags pa myed pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang debazhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs raba'i ye shes yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i
71b5(mdo): mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngam sa pa'i tshang tshing brgyad stong ma lus par sel ba'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mying yang dag par brjod
71b6(mdo): ba yi 'di lta ste/ gnyis su byed pa'i chos nyid kyi dod kyi phying yang dag par 'dzin pa bston pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad brjod pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// laka na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
71b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ gnyis su myed pa'i don dam pa'i bying
71b8(mdo): yang dag brjod pa/ dbyig gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad myed par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge 'i 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis/ nyid cig
72a1(mdo): bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin stond pa dang // 
72a2(mdo): mying gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmyigs te/ kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang / chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog/ rnyog pa myed pa'i dad pa
72a3(mdo): dang ldan bzhin pa dang / mos pa dang de kho na nyid yid la byed pas/ sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni/ dus gsum gi dus myed pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te/ 
72a4(mdo): gshegs nas/ chos kyi sgo thams cad stond par mdzad de sku yang stond to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ sku dang gsung dang thugs tham/ 
72a5(mdo): cad kyis de'i rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob po// sangs rgya sa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phan gdags pas kyang / phan 'dogs par mdzad to// chos thams cad la myi 'jigs
72a6(mdo): pa'i spobs pa yang bsgrub par mdzad do// dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug par 'dzind pa 'i bsam pas/ bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang nye bar stond par
72a7(mdo): byed do// ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / de rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa rnams dang / srul pa'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyi mdangs dang
72a8(mdo): stobs dpag zi brjid zil gyis myi gnod pa dang / gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang 3/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed do// gsang sngags dang rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo la
72b1(mdo): lus pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud kyi dgra dang phyir zlog pa dang / gzhan gis myi thub pa thams cad kyang / nyin mtshan byed par skad cig re re la/ spyod lam thams cadadu srung ba dang
72b2(mdo): skyob pa dang sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang / drag po dang chen po che dang kum mkhyen gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug chen po sbyin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang
72b3(mdo): dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang chu la dang / ku be ra dang 'phrog pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend sbyor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag tu rgyund myi 'chad par nyid mtshan byed par 'gro yang rung
72b4(mdo): 'greng yang rupa 'dug kyang rung nyal yang rung / gnyid log kyang ru dam log kyang rung ba na/ srung ba dang skyob pa dang / skyed pa byed do// mnyam par gzhag kyang rung mnye bar ma gzhag kyang rung
72b5(mdo): gcig pu 'dug kyang rung / skye bo mang po'i dpa na 'dug kyang ru grong dang grong khyer dang nong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal pol pho brang na 'dug kyang rung srog dang / sgo gang dang / 
72b6(mdo): khri lam dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong bar dang tshong khang na 'dug kyang rung khang stong dang / ri dang tu rlung dang tshal dang nags tshang tshi phan 'dug kyang rung / gtsang sbra ma byas pa dang
72b7(mdo): ra ro ba dang bag myed par 'dug kyang rung ste// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du dzi'i sgo nas kyang mchog tu srung ba dang slob pa dang / skyed par byed do// nyin mtshan du yang mchog tu bde legs su 'gyur
72b8(mdo): ba pa byed do// gang yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am mi dang lto 'phye chen po myi dang myi ma yin pa gzhan dag dang / gzal dang rgyu skar dang ma mo nas/ 
73a1(mdo): dang / tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang ma mo 'atur po gang yin ya rnams dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang sha za mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang 'atu zhing gcig tu mthun par dbu
73a2(mdo): bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang skyed pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma dang sa dang stobs dang gzi brjid mchog kyang de'i lus la 'jug par byed do// nad myed pa dang stobs dang / 
73a3(mdo): che 'phel ba yang sgrub par byed do// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / gzhan yang mying gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ gang nyid gcig bzhin du dus gsum du/ ma nyams par yid dam du/ lan gsum kha
73a4(mdo): ton tu 'don tam/ glegs bam tu byas pa klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzug/ yid la dmyigs shing / gzugs dang mthun par sems te/ 
73a5(mdo): de'i gzugs dang mthun par bsam gtan byed pas ni/ 'dusaba'i dbang gi phyir ring por myi thogs par de nyid kyi sprul pa'i ga/ thugs kyi lus mthong par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
73a6(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi skun pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de ni nams kyang ji ltar gyur kyang / ngan 'gro ngan
73a7(mdo): song du ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs nga du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob tu skye bar myi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar skye bar myi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba dang lta ba ngan pa'i rigs su/ 
73a8(mdo): skye bar myi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bzhugs na yang / des bsta dang pa'i chos spong ba dang / skol bar myi 'gyur ro// 
73b1(mdo): ma ma dam po na du sa phye bar gyi 'byur ro// sug dpa nad dang mtshan ga par gyi zhal ba'i nang du yang skye bar bye 'gyur ro/ sems pa lnga'i dus su ya skye bar gyi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dngang tha dang / 
73b2(mdo): da pa 'gas pa zung bar kyi chu ba sa kyang ngan pa dang dbul pa'i 'dags pa sa pa 'byu bar kyi 'byung ba/ tshang ga dang 'azur pa dang tha pa dang rgya ma pa dang / sa pa
73b3(mdo): 'ams pa 'byung bar gyi 'gyur lo// ud dang drus dang rigs bzang ma dpal pa ldan par 'gyur ro// kun nas mangs pa dang gzugs dpa'i dag dang sam par 'gyur ro// 'jig nyed da pa rnams
73b4(mdo): mun pa dang / yid du 'ongs dang 'grog sa na bde ba dang thod na dka' ba yang 'gyur ro// 'jig tad pa rnams padamangs pa dang zhal pa dang ldan pa dang / e brtsan par yang lus
73b5(mdo): das ldan pa gyung pa// rang na ma da brgyan das lda par gyus pa shes panas pa gdas pa
73b6(mdo): rbad par bezhes pani dngag bas dang stobs dang smon las dang ye zhes dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bsnga dang bcos pams cad la 'jigs pa byed pa dang sgra mkhas pa dang byi thun pa dang cig gsal ba dang sbrid
73b7(mdo): thoms pa 'thung ro// zhes nyed can dang le lo byed pa dang / chogazhes pa dang / nong mang ba dang sred pa myed par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu med brtan par bya ba dang slob dang / 
74a1(mdo): dang bla mar bkur bar 'gyur ro// des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba 'i bzo dang / sgyu rtsal dang / mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang yi ge'i sgo nas shes pa
74a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang 'tsho ba dang kun tu spyod pa shin tu yongs su dag par spyod pa dang / legs par rab tu byung ba dang / legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
74a3(mdo): kyi byang chub kyi sems kyang myi brjed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa la nams kyang 'jug par myi 'gyur ro// lag ra rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ de ltar yon tan dpag tu byed pa dag/ 
74a4(mdo): dngalam par 'gyur te/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gi tshogs dadapag tu myed pa gzhan dag dang sang ldan par 'gyur ro// lagadan rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i phyir yang dag par brjod pa 'di
74a5(mdo): yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag de ni bsod nas dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags shing sangs rgya kyi yon tan rnams shinang tu byung du bsgrubs nas/ ring po kyi thigs
74a6(mdo): par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las 'dra ba'i chos su myi 'gyur bar/ sems can thams cad la/ bla na
74a7(mdo): myed pa'i chos stond pa dang / phyogs bcu pa dam pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra chen po rgyum myi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// oM sarba d+harma a pA pa/ swa b+ha ba/ bI shud d+ha badz+ra/ a a/ 
74a8(mdo): AM a/ pra ki ti pa mi shud d+ha/ sarba pA ma ya tu ta/ sarba ta sAg za gnya' da ka ya/ man 'dzu b+hi pa ri shud d+hi ta/ mu pa da ye ti a/ sarba ta thA ga ta sId ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hU~M hri/ bka ba
74b1(mdo): gany+dzan mur ti ba gi wA ra/ ma a bA tsa sarba d+harma ga gan/ a ma la su pa mi shudad+ha/ d+harma d+har tu gnyal ma ga rba a// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar/ 
74b2(mdo): mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// de ni 'gon po gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig du// gsang bstod/ 
74b3(mdo): nas ni tshig 'di gsol// 'gon po bdag cag yi rang ngo // legs so legs so legs par gsungs// nam/ grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i// 'gro ba 'gon myed rnams dang ni// bdag cag yang dag
74b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i// byang chub thob pa'i dod ched mdzad// su 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// 'di ni nas dag legs pa'i// lam// bab cing yangs la rgya che ste// don med 'gro ba'i non mgyis
74b5(mdo): ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/ rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas rnams kyis bshad// / bcom ldan 'das 'ja dpal ye shes sems dpa'i/ don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par 'arjod
74b6(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhid gshegs pa shag kyi thub pas gsungs pa// rdzogs so / rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya yan 'dzu bI na ma shwa sha ta kar// bod skad du/ 'bag/ 
74b7(mdo): pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ka zho nur gyurard pa la phyag/ 'tshal lo// shi na tu dang pa'i seMs kyis su// zub la 'gon pos phyag 'tshal te/ 
74b8(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa li// mtshan rnams 'di ni brjod par bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste// gzugs rnams kun gi bla na myed// mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs// 
75a1(mdo): 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags// bsam gyis myi khyab bsam dang bral// mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du 'byung // sku gsung 'phrin las bsam myi khyab// de bzhin thugs kyang bsam/ 
75a2(mdo): myi khyab/ stong nyid bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can// stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan// stong pa nyid la lhag par mos// srid pa gsum po stong par ston de// thams cad mkhyend cing thams cad gzigs// 
75a3(mdo): sa rnams kun gi bdag dang bla/ sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// sems can kun gyi phyag bgyis pa// ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du// mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms// pas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod
75a4(mdo): pa// smra ba'i seng ge myi'i mchog/ dul zhing nyon mongs rnams dang bral// sgrib pa tri ma kun myi mngal// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob// grol zhing skye dgu grol mdzad pa// ral pa mun dza
75a5(mdo): brtul shugs cad// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ bgrang nor thogs shing phyag kar bsnams/ dag cing dag pa te rnams dang ldan/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mngal dbang mangs/ 
75a6(mdo): pad pa las 'khrungs pad ma'i spyan// pad ma li the ba kha dog 'dra// bzhugs pa'i bdan khri pad ma lags// gtsangs ud pal sngon po bsdams// gsung dag zhi ba'i thugs dpaldan// khyod ni sangs/ 
75a7(mdo): rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po sangs rgyas lags// rdzu 'phrul lda zhing mngal dbang brnyes// bden pa bzhi dag stond pa po// 'jig rten spyong pa 'byas stong mngal// khyod mi dbang phyug skye dgu ma
75a8(mdo): bdag/ khyod mi zhi ba'i sems can rnams// kun gyi mngal bdag yon tan mcho// khyod ni khyu mchog skyes bu'i gtso// thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs// rnam par 'dren pa 'dul mdzad pa// rgyal
75b1(mdo): sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs// 'od gzer stong ldan nyi ma khyod// zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod// nam pos bu dang chu lA 'ang lags// dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod// rlu'i rgyal po
75b2(mdo): mthal yas khyod// de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags// lA myim dbang po thang bzangs ris// dmyig dmaragaza' lhag pa bsangs// sbed pa dpa' bo lnga kun lags// lha rnams kun
75b3(mdo): kyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten du chos kyi dri ma bral// khyod ni 'jig rten dgang zag mchog/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rtend rig/ ye shes can gyi dam pa mchog/ dam pa
75b4(mdo): sbyin dpaka nas dang smrabs// bdud kyi las kyis yod myi rnaM kha nam po mye me la zab// dge ba'i bshes ni kun tu grags// khyod ni smad pa khrug rngu 'byis// phyi 'dul
75b5(mdo): kha lo sprum ba'i mchog/ blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/ blo dang ldan pa mkhas pa lags// khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsams shing // byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan// 
75b6(mdo): rnam grol 'bras bu phun sun tshogs// lus can kun gi gnas su gyur // yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa// sdig pa myi mnga' tshangs par 'apyod// khyod ri 'jug rings gzal mchog khyod// 
75b7(mdo): khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog/ khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i mnga' bdag gtso bo lags// ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso// mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston pa// khyod ni rnam
75b8(mdo): sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltang // sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// rin cen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
76a1(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsald pa// A bag kye da na na mA sa dA// ji smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rigs sngags bcas par 'dzind na ni// srid pa kun las grol bar
76a2(mdo): 'gyur// rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob// brgya lam rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa// de la 'dod pasam chu yid bzhin du// gdon myi za bar thob par 'gyur// / 
76a3(mdo): bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni// mtshams myed skal ba mnyam pa'i// las rnams myi bzad gar byas pa// de dag thams cad myur du 'byang // 'jig rte nad pha rol 'pho ba na// 'jigs
76a4(mdo): pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe// sems can dag pas dran byas na// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang mthong bar 'gyur// blo dang ldan pas gtsang byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog pa// sangs rgyas
76a5(mdo): nyid ni 'dod na yang // thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom myed// // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs s+ho// 
76a6(mdo): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// phyogs bcu'i yang dag pade rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing / 
76a7(mdo): mchog tu mad du byung nam par dag pa'i blo mngal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzho dur gyu da pa// thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma myed pa'i/ 
76a8(mdo): tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyad pa'i sku// zhabs rtend kyi pad ma la/ lha dang / phyi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rigs sngags 'chad rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod can gi rtse mos gtus/ 
76b1(mdo): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// nga song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad d+ya thA/ A~M/ b+ho ma hA ma tsi/ ru tsi ra/ 
76b2(mdo): ka wA ba/ bitsod tra/ muka tA dA ma/ ma lang krita/ sha rir/ pa ra ma sad t+ta/ po tsa ka/ ta tha ka ta/ ma ha da ma/ kog d+ha ra/ za ba ra d+ha ma la ba ta/ bi dza ya/ su ma ta ma ga
76b3(mdo): pa dang sha ka/ kre shang ka pa pra shas ka/ shu n+ya \u0f7f/ sa b+ha ba/ ma nu sa ri/ ma hA bo d+ha/ sad ta ba ra/ ba ra da/ pa ran d+hanga.oM ma sna pra sha/ pra sa pa/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan tam
76b4(mdo): ma sa man ta bud tra/ sa ma da ta sun dA ra/ sa man ta ma ka/ ra/ sa man ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he/ man r+d+ha/ her ba/ ma ha ba na dz+ra kha da ka/ tshing du tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha bin da/
