76b5(mdo): bi ra dza bi radza/ kar ma/ a pa ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru d+hu ru dU ru/ su ru su ru mu ru mu ru/ dA dA dA da/ dU du dung+ku/ ba ha mo ha/ ma ha ma ha/ mo h+ya ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ha/ bIshwa b+hi ma/ 
76b6(mdo): da dang / sa ma sa ra/ ma ha bo sa da tA/ ma / ma ma naH/ ma nu mr-i ta/ A bA yA/ dug zhan/ su da kha/ maHka ru ni ka/ a na tho han/ dug gi to han/ sar dzo han
76b7(mdo): u pad dru/ to ha/ ma kI biki to tapa/ ku si g+ho tas/ ma rad d+ha mo han/ tan b+ha ga bAn drug khi to tam/ su kha da da/ a mA thA nA ma/ sa nAmA \u0f7f kar/ sa mdza sde/ bi
76b8(mdo): ska ra/ u pad drA ta nA ma/ sa tho bad tra ba pra sha sa ka/ a bi bi ga ta nam/ ku sha la saM bA ra/ pa Shi pu ra ya ta/ ku sI ta daM/ ma ha bIr+ya/ daSh+Tha ma ra Na/ d+ha mi naM/ sa mri ta pa dang / 
77a1(mdo): tapa ya bi ka ba na mamo zla ba/ Shar ram pa ra ya nan/ tra ta sa mra/ du ShA ni me pra sha/ ma na ya/ sarba kle sha ra dza/ sim/ a pa ra ya/ sarba sAn sa mi bad/ 
77a2(mdo): rdza pa tuH/ kha ni men sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+hama?/ ba ri pu rim/ se ku ru/ sarba kar ya/ a pa raH/ kle sha ba ra ba tA ma me/ bi ka ra/ ma ha bo d+hi sad tA/ se ba ta/ bir+ya ba ra
77a3(mdo): myi taya gai me/ san ni yo dza yA/ a raNad+ha ma/ bi rA ku/ bir dza/ san dzaH/ pra dza ha/ dA ra Ni sa ma/ kha sa ma/ dza la nau d+hi sa ma ma ru sa ma ma ha bo d+hi sad tA/ @
77a4(mdo): rad swa hA// // rigs sngags don kun sgrub pa 'di// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// de ma thag tu seMs/ can rnams// skye dang rga ba zad par gyur// ngan 'gro bas
77a5(mdo): cad zhi gyur nas// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dor// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dka'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// sdig pa zhi bar byed pa'i// gzungs
77a6(mdo): 'di bshad pa'i mdo la yang // grangs myed phrag ni dung phyur snyed// 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas tha rad// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing / 
77a7(mdo): kang tshe rigs sngags bshad pa na// brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas// rgyu ba dang ni myi rgyu ba li// sa gzhi de'i tshe na g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis// sa'i steng yang khyab par
77a8(mdo): gyung // dgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po kyi bzad gzugs can rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// sad byung cig ni mthun par spras// lha rnams
77b1(mdo): mi ba'i ma lugs can// thams cad yid ni dka' gyur nas// lag na rdo rje ral gri che// de'i drung lcags smras la ni/ phyag 'tshal mchog sbyid rdo rje'i mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs na
77b2(mdo): stobs chen la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba card// bgyegs kyi yul 'khom rab 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can gyi'i bag/ gdang / 
77b3(mdo): tu stobs ldan gzigs mdzes 'jigs// drag po drag po rab 'joms pa// ga'i brjid gzi brjid mngal ba'i dpal// dpal ldangs nye pa myed pa'i dpel// rdo rje can te snying spyong ba/ 
77b4(mdo): myi zhes pa'i rab rib sel// sreg pa'i ma lugs mchog dmanga' ba// skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes// gzhu dastobs can la phyag ring ba/ nyod mongs dgra rnams sel bar
77b5(mdo): mdzad/ mdzes pa da babal sna tshogs gsol/ me tog 'phreng rgyad sna tshogs can// yun bzang dbul ni marje sa pa ste/ dges shing na bza' mdzes par gsol// 'jam pa'i
77b6(mdo): dbyangs te rab tu bzhad// kar nag mdzes pa'i rgyan yang la ba// ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags// rab tu dga' ba bstan pa dgal/ rgyad chen gser gi mdog dang ldan// rgya batsho'i
77b7(mdo): snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// snang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo bas skyong ba// lha'i bdag po dga' bar 'dzad// 'dod pa'i
77b8(mdo): lta ste 'dod sel brtad// rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzind pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad// btud pa yas btud phyag bgyis pa// rtag tu
78a1(mdo): mchod cing brjed pa lags// stobs po che la zhugs che ba// phyag ri gsung chen mngar nam// sreg chen rdo rjengs pa ste// 'dres shes rab srung po shes/ dkyil mthong/ 
78a2(mdo): chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po stond pa po// dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs
78a3(mdo): la brjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan/ ha ha sa ha'i bdag che la/ mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hU~M kyis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa che// 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba zo// lha dpa lha byin
78a4(mdo): rnams kyis btud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis// zhabs rings kad rgyangs chen po can// rlung grag mun pa sel mdzad pa// 'jig rtend gsum du snyan par grags/ 
78a5(mdo): gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur pa// drag po dkar mdzad/ bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can// 'dzum zhing sgeg pa kun tu stond// spyod pa sa ltar brtan
78a6(mdo): pa lags/ nor bul dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi mo gsal ba lam me ba/ nye la 'i 'od 'dra 'ang khugs bzhed/ tho lang bzhugs shing rgya cher bshad/ mthong dag la ning dag ma
78a7(mdo): par mdzad// nod sbyis de bzhin gas pa sngags sbyid// dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyid// gzugs sbyid de bzhi stobs sbyin pa// dpal dang dpal mdzad pabyegs nor me// kun tu mong/ 
78a8(mdo): pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa// zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs pasags nas// dpung rgyan spyan ma gdub 'khor can nor bu'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa ste// rgya dang kyi tsu'i
78b1(mdo): 'gro ba spron// rab rib sel bang mdzad pa po// stond pa stonang mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po yangal bdag dpag gi mchog/ 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa myed pa'i kaH/ 
78b2(mdo): sbyin pa/ dkar ba sngo ba 'od babang ba// 'gris sdod byed stodang pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin ma lugs rab tu stodang // shes rab ral khris 'debs pams la mdzad// stong
78b3(mdo): nyid chos nyid sur 'dzidad pa// byams shing mchog dang tha ma mkhyed// rnam par grags pa gsan par nges// rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod// rigs sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// gnad/ 
78b4(mdo): tu nas rgyal 'khor los sbyar// 'jigs myed blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzid pa// mgur ba'angs 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni ston mngan/ 
78b5(mdo): pa// lha dang lha myin bcas pas bkur// sems can thams can 'jigs myed mdzad// sems can kun la rab stond pa// brtan po sems can rnams kyi mchog/ sems can rnams kyi/ 
78b6(mdo): blol mkhas// sred byed bu ste drag shul stobs// me'i 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa// rtsed mo'i rol po stonod par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad pa gas pa sngags mdzad/ 
78b7(mdo): bdag byir myi 'dzin rdul skyed brtan// nam mkha' 'drab dpe myed pa// btud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mchog sbyin bcan pa bskyod du byed// de bzhin thub byed rnam par rgyal// brtan po
78b8(mdo): sangs rgyas de bzhiran gshegs// mya ngad byed cing gnas pa myed// 'joms myed tshig bzang cha lugs bzang // dpa' bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa// tshad ched res 'joms rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa
79a1(mdo): gnod pa khyad par gshegs/ mamagon po rgyal ba sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje bas mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa/ stono mdzad nyor mongs sel ba lags ka
79a2(mdo): legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa bskyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin
79a3(mdo): srin po lha mying dbang // mdangs 'phrog gtum po dgod nams kyis// de ring legs par bstod par 'gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar 'gyur// 
79a4(mdo): de dag kun la bltas nas kyang // 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa// khyed kur rtag tu bgegs myed cing // des legs tha rad pa thob dgyurd pa// 'jigs myed bkra yang shes par shog/ 
79a5(mdo): ngal 'jigs pa ram sems shig/ de nas rab tu che ba dan cig// 'jug chen tha kar rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin ga she/ pa gas gsal pas// shar phyogs gzigs nas bka'
79a6(mdo): sbal da pa// kye sa gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug gsal ba'i phyir// sems can nams kyi masod nams tshogs// shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyu dang // kye ma 'asod
79a7(mdo): rnams cher byas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rab sbyar phyir// dam pa sbyin pa grub pa'i gnas// 'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas// sdug bsngal zhes/ 
79a8(mdo): cad sem pa'i// grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'dod pa 'am// yangan gtan tam sems kyang rung // de 'dod kun 'grub 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal kun las ma da par 'gyur// sdig pa khams cad nas
79b1(mdo): dag pa// de yis nges par thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa lis chen yang // ring po phyi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis// rab dgal shi ra tu dri ma byed/ 
79b2(mdo): 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// smyung dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur // ring du song dang myi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig res gnas 'dod
79b3(mdo): pa'i// sems can chen pos myi thogs par// che zad das ni thob par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad nam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // sros pa thams cad zhi ba 'i// byang chub
79b4(mdo): bla myed thob par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // bkra shis mchog tu dge ba'i dmying brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yisal
79b5(mdo): sbyar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ shi nad tu dang pas rtse gcig tu// dang par langs nas su brjo da pa// de la rigs sngags 'chang kun dang / 
79b6(mdo): de bzhin lha'i dbang po rnams// gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag/ rtag tu yang ni srung ba byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin
79b7(mdo): rdo rje'i mchod 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing // mnyam par bzhag pa snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin la'i bdag po rnams
79b8(mdo): bgegs dang log 'dren cheran po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis// rgyangs nas kyang phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir dgegs rnams dgra'agyur da pas// mche bar byed kyang kyi nus so// 
80a1(mdo): lan cig brlags mtshangs chen dang / bsod nams mnyam pa thob par gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig kyis// nyid de mtshad mchog brjod byas na/ dri ma byed cing rab dag la/ 
80a2(mdo): rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang // sems can thams cad dga' ba'i// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob// mtshungs pa myed cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha
80a3(mdo): rnams kyis bstod cing / yid 'brog lha dpal myin 'tshogs te 'dun pa'i// gzungs 'di rgyal ba la rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal
80a4(mdo): gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar skad/ ta rA pA ta ri ka yAnarnam a stong rdzangs ka kom/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma
80a5(mdo): sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan yid 'apo ta la// sna tshogs khabs kyis rnam par spras// sA
80a6(mdo): tshogs ljon pas bkras pa ste// skye gnyis du mas sma 'byind pa// 'bab chus tshogs chu bo che// ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste// me tog sna tshogs rigs nas kyis
80a7(mdo): kun tu pri'is bkang ba ste// sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan// rkang pa drug pa kA'i sgra// myi 'am ci li glu sman ler// glang cher myos pas yang dag khengs// rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rna/ 
80a8(mdo): dang // dri ba rnams kyang glu len pa// thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang // sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis kyang // 'phags ma sgrol tshogs lha mo/ 
80b1(mdo): rnams// rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis// rtag tu legs par bsnyen pa po// khro bo rgyal po'i tshogs gzhan dang // rta 'phrin la sogs kyis bskor ba// sems can kun la phan par/ 
80b2(mdo): brjod/ bcom 'ang sun ma gzigs bzhugs te// dbyim dpal dang ldam pa'o// pad ma 'i snying 'o grub pa'i bdang // dka' thub ces po dang ldan pa// byams pa yin snying rdor lan/ 
80b3(mdo): lha 'i mtho ba ni chen po la// chos gsung ba ni yang dag bzhugs// de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs/ phyag mardo rje stobs po che// mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas// byan ras gzigs pa/ 
80b4(mdo): zhus pa ste// rkun po srul dang seng ge me// glang po rtag dang chus 'jigs las// zhi mdzad thub pa'i sems dacan rnams// 'khor ba'i rgya mchor byid pa rnams/ 
80b5(mdo): 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams// chags sdangagati mug dri ma las// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ de gsung bdag la zhu bo che// 'jig rten 'gon pos 'di/ 
80b6(mdo): skad gsungs// dpal ldan de ni s+yan ngas gzigs// phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed// snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// skyob pa 'od dpag
80b7(mdo): byed pa'i// smon lam stobs kyis 'byung ba ste// nga'i sa 'jig rten dam ru shes// snying rje che dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba 'dod par brtson pa mo// nyi ma shar pa dang 'dra bar// 
80b8(mdo): zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od// lha bcas myi dpal byin rnams// 'di rnams thams cad gsal bar byed// 'jig rtend gsum po g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ 
81a1(mdo): phyag na mud pa la sdong zo 'i/ ma 'jigs ma 'digs zhes brjod pa/ bar snang du ma 'phar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag bsrung don tu// mtshon ma'i skam pa 'byung ba dang / 
81a2(mdo): 'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du// rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag skyed de// mying rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni// sems can rtag tu bdag gis bsrung // sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/ 
81a3(mdo): sems can thams cad bdag kyis bskal// des na bdag la 'jig rtenang du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// gus dang bcas pas legs par gnas
81a4(mdo): gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pas// gsungs shig rgyal ba pa rgya rtsa brgyad// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba'i// sdig pa spong byed/ 
81a5(mdo): bsod nams dang // bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed// gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed cing // nad rnams thams// cad brlag byed pa// dpal ldan shis la 'jog par byed/ 
81a6(mdo): nad myed che ni 'phel bar byed// sems can rnams la byams pa snyoms na// de dag dbyangs spogs thub chen pos/ 'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das// spyan ras gzigs
81a7(mdo): dbang rab tu bshad// mchog rnams thams cad rnam gzigs nas// 'di lta bu'i byams pas spos// phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs mdzad// bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa'i// 'di
81a8(mdo): gsungs shes rab shin tu che// legs so legs so dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig tu brtse// skal pa chen po'i myi rnams nyon// phyi rnams gang zhig 'don sgrogs pa/ nor gyi
81b1(mdo): dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol// dbang phyag kun dang yang dag ldan// dus myin 'chi ba nges par bsregs// 'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba// de rnams bad+ma/ 
81b2(mdo): gis bshad par bya// lha 'i dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rjes su yi rang gis// legs par bsdams par 'gyur la nyod// mau dge ba can ni gzi brjid che// 'jig rtend 'gon byed snyan
81b3(mdo): pa che// dbyangs can ma mi rgyan yangs ma// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// gso' byed ma dang rgyags byed ma// sa ta oM gyi rnam pa 'dod gzugs ma// sems can kun la phan par brjod/ 
81b4(mdo): g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol da phyin/ 'phags pa sgrol ma 'di 'ong ma// rdza rnga dung ni rgyas pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma// zla ba'i gdong can dkar
81b5(mdo): mo che// myi 'pham kos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar chen mo// stobs po che la pha rol phyind// gtum mo chen mo gtum chen mo// sdang ba'i sems can brlag byed ma/ 
81b6(mdo): rab tu ni bzhi pa 'i gzugs// rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// glog gi 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan can// ral gri 'khor lo bzhu thogs mtshon// 'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni// mtshan mo/ 
81b7(mdo): nag mo chun khyod ma// srung byed rmongs byed zhib mo// mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lho// tshangs pa mo dang rig byed ma// gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas// bkra shis mdog byed zhi ba mo// 
81b8(mdo): skyes nas rig byed yid ma gyoms ma// thod pa can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs ma bden ma gzhan myi rgyal// ded dpon chen mo snying rjes gnas// chud zos lam ni rab ston dam// mchog gter
82a1(mdo): gnod byed ston pa mo// bud myed gzugs la dpag myed gnon// mi khrod ma dang rnal 'byor dam// grub ma gtum mo bdud rtsi ma// des ma nor can bsod nams ma/ skal/ 
82a2(mdo): chen skal bzang mdzes spyod ma// mthar byed spag byed 'jigs byed ma// grag dang brtul shugs chedan yod ka/ 'gro la gcig pu phan par brjod// skabs byed zhus la gsong po la/ 
82a3(mdo): gang gi dbang phyug ni bra ma// rtag pa kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma// don kun grub byed bzang po ma// gsang byed gso byed nor ster ma// myi 'jigs bsod nams kolA ta ya// spyan ras gzigs
82a4(mdo): dbupa bdag nyid skyes// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'dir/ mi// phan par byed par grags pa ste// mchog dang mad byung dgasang ba bo// lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba// skal
82a5(mdo): ba'angs gas pa dang ldan byed// drug ni thams cad 'joms byed pa// nan ni thams cad 'i byed pa/ sems cad kun la mde sted ba// blo ldan gang zhig la
82a6(mdo): mnyam pan// gtsang skazas pa 'is// den kyis kyi ring 'dra// rgyal mid dpal yang thob par 'gyur// rtag tu thug pa bde bar 'byung// bzed pa phyus par 'gyur ba'o// 
82a7(mdo): rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// yid gzhung 'gyur bar the tsom myed// bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las dang rgyal bar 'gyur// dgra bo bshes por gyur pa
82a8(mdo): ste// rA can dang ni mche ba can// dog pa'i zab mo rgal dka' dang // sna tshogs pa'i 'khrugs pa las// mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis// 'jigs pa kun las krol bar byed// 
82b1(mdo): dus byin 'chi las grol byed pa// skyes bu snyan pa thob par 'gyur// phyi ni skye ba don dang bcas// de gcig pu'i phan yod gyis// gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas// skyes bu gang zhin/ 
82b2(mdo): sgrogs byed pa// rtag tu snyan pa thob par 'gyur// mye ri dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri sa dang ni lus srul po// 'byung po gshed byed srin pa dang / 
82b3(mdo): ma mo grub pa'i sems ldan pa/ gnod sbyin mo dang yi dgas byed// smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams// grib gnod dang ni brjed byed dang // ga ma la sogs pa rnams dang // ngo langs su
82b4(mdo): tshogs la sogs dang // skul khyed dang gzhan sems sngar rnams// grib ma yang ni 'gos myi 'gyur// ji lta slar ni rtsod par 'gyur// spang ba'i sems can 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
82b5(mdo): nad la stsogs pas sems kyi 'gyur/ phyug dang 'ad khyod yod tam ldan// bu dang mapo 'dre'i bar 'gyur/ blo dang skye ba dran par 'gyur/ rigs dang / 
82b6(mdo): ldam zhi mtho dgar 'gyur// gzi'i brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba// bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur// dge ba'i gshes gnyen yang dag bsten// byang chub
82b7(mdo): sems dpa' yang dag rgyan// gang dang gang du skyes par 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis myi spong // dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ 
82b8(mdo): rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs s+ho// @/ 'phags pa sgrig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas
83a1(mdo): pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// au a mri ta bin tu dza ba ma hA su ka sA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
83a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'o/ 
83a3(mdo): tshogs can khyod kyis/ gzungs 'di phyung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bseb bskyed pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang
83a4(mdo): ka'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyad sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskye dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang la layin lam du gragad par gyu dad pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 
83a5(mdo): sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rted kyi drung zla ba la kau re ces brgyad dam/ ches bco lnga la spang bar 'dug kyi gsol sbyong dang ldan par byas ste/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / 
83a6(mdo): mar me dang me tog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/ bskor pa byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ni 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa zas
83a7(mdo): tsad dang sug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las ba dad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol pa la/ spos las sogs pas mchod de
83a8(mdo): bzlas brjod byas na/ rmyi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa khams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ning / nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do// de nas
83b1(mdo): rdo rje me tog 'od cheran po sa gsum gi dbang phyug dang thabs gcig tu/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor chen po de yi nang nas/ stan las langs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad/ 
83b2(mdo): rnam par sel ba la btud nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa' tshul che ba// nyon mongs khri ma kun las 'das/ 
83b3(mdo): chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nges pa kun las rnam grol ba// spyor bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
83b4(mdo): lam drang ka cig pu'i tshul stond cing // theg pa gcig bla da'i tshul gcig pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ sdang ba chen po snang ba
83b5(mdo): brnyes/ yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ phra ba bzhin du 'od kar ba// 'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa ste/ sangs rgyas
83b6(mdo): theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor na pa grags pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// dad pa chen po nyon mongs ngoms// dges
83b7(mdo): zab bshin da grub pa ste// rin cen 'brab khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyis che// lhun po chen po dbang phyug ye// lha chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byod pa chen po khyod byan// 
83b8(mdo): 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mjed cing // sgrib pa thams cad sel bar mdzad// kun mkhyend yon tan bdag nyid che// nam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
84a1(mdo): spyod yul gzhugs pa ste/ chos kyis khyod yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes tshe// sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sru ma dzes yon tan snyim po brnyes/ 
84a2(mdo): rdo rje'i ni dkyil 'khor rgyad// sangs rgyas las ste don yod che// ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bas nad pa gnas pa dbang bdag po// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ yangs pa
84a3(mdo): dri myed shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab cing brtan par rnam par gnod// ni la 'jig rtend dag par mdzang // stond pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' / 
84a4(mdo): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skal pa chen po nyon mongs bco 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste// zhi ba zhi mdzad/ bde 'byung ba// chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ 
84a5(mdo): tha dad pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bdel 'gror gnas pa dris myed// nam dag zugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyedad nye sde khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtse mo yangs par rnam par
84a6(mdo): grags// sngags ched mang pos 'du la mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ 
84a7(mdo): dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra// nam gsum mkhyedad pa brnyes pa'i bdag/ rnam par gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes/ 
84a8(mdo): shing mnyam nyid brnyes// bskal pa dag ni grangs myed par// tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes// sa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dag/ 
84b1(mdo): sa 'dzind las byung ba// ye shes sa khyod la phyag 'tshal// ting nge 'dzind la mnga' brnyes pa// nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin pa mkhyend cing rgya che ba// mnyam nyid maH
84b2(mdo): khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po ched po snang ba che// sug bsngal chen po dri ma sel// ni gyu rad ma lus zhi mdzad pa// yon tam pa mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i
84b3(mdo): gsung ldan pa/ chos kun zhib phun sum tshogs// dgos mchog gsum rigs dpe' byed pa// rin cem mtha' las khyod phrag 'tshal// rdo rje chen po dri phyed mchog/ rdo rje mtshan pa snam
84b4(mdo): sdig myi mngal// nam yal lam sus yul dang ldan/ pa zhes khyod yul rgya mtsho ma dang // de bzhin gshegs dang / yul gcig dang // sel ba po gi rnaMs sbyong // shes
84b5(mdo): chen po rgyal ba'i sras// sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal// rdo rjes
84b6(mdo): pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin cen chen po rin chen blo// rad cer rdo rje 'od che ba// rin cen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // ring chen bstand pa bsrung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul
84b7(mdo): brnyes shing // ye shes stong pa nyid kyis stonang // stong nyid longs khyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mtshungs byed shes rab cad// dag pa rnam
84b8(mdo): dag sa dang bral// chos gcig las ni snang ba bo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rtend sngang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rtend chos las rnam par 'das/ 
85a1(mdo): 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan ma rnyes// brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa sa lus bsal ba ste// phyal chen skye bo kun la bang// sa 'dzind nam par/ 
85a2(mdo): grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mkhyend dga' la longs spyod pa// dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dkal ba mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ 
85a3(mdo): dgal la sdang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// skyeg cher 'dzum zhing dgongs par ldan// rnam par bskyegs la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa skyeg pa'i mchog/ skyeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
85a4(mdo): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje sa chog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ dabla myed mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo byang chub seMs/ 
85a5(mdo): dpa'i mchog/ sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'khod rnams kyis// mying brgya rtsa brgyadakyis bstod nas// rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa// brtsa
85a6(mdo): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye la 'byor da chen snang ba'o// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// gang zhig phying brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so song brjod byed na// ngani
85a7(mdo): nyes pa kun zlog cing// rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis// sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la// blo ldan gang zhig stod byed na// de'i sdig pa myed/ 
85a8(mdo): par 'gyur// gang zhig byed brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas brjod byed pa// snang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur// dgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su btang // 
85b1(mdo): sdig pa dag pa thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho longs pyod cing/ sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ 
85b2(mdo): bying brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'dod pa// des ni 'byor da chen sangs rgyas sa// ring por myi thogs thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba// gang zhig mying mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje'i
85b3(mdo): dkyil 'khor bstand pa la// ring por myi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i// mtshan pa
85b4(mdo): rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs s+ho// @/ 'phags/ pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sa'i snying po
85b5(mdo): 'i mtshad brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tsha
85b6(mdo): mo/ ma su b+ta/ ni sum la/ 186/ ma hA pA ga/ ma ru ta/ a mog/ pad dz+ra sa daHsahA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa'i// gzungs 'a
85b7(mdo): zashad pa zag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ri// ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyurd/ sa'i snying po cho gas dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis spras// skal ldan chen/ 
85b8(mdo): po legs so legs// sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod kyi gzungs mi rnam grags shing // yon tan dpag myed mchog bskyed pa// sems cad kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // 
86a1(mdo): nyes pa zlog byed zos pa ni// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis myi gos te// ji ltar 'das kyi pad ma dag/ 'dam gi nyes pas myi gos bzhin// lus chen dag lus
86a2(mdo): su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las mi gcig tsam yang // byang chub las mi ldog myi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/ thos nas mos par byed pa
86a3(mdo): ni// nges par yon tan thams cad kyang // thob par 'gyur te the tsom myed// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa'i dbang phyug po// sa'i snying po sa mchog la// mying brgya rtsa
86a4(mdo): brgyad smras pa ni// sa'i snying po gtso bo che// glog 'gyu lta/ pu'i spyan mngal ba// cod pad can tes brnyes pa// dun/ sum tshogs ldan 'byor da pa mchog/ rig ldan rig mdzad
86a5(mdo): mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge sbyong sto dad pa po// gni cas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul// sa hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab thams cad mkhyend pa'i nyi ma mchog/ snying po snying po
86a6(mdo): mkhyedad par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol da// sa'i dbang phyug gar thabs can// skyeg po zhal bzangs gar thabs cad// skyeg po zhal bzangs kar mkhan ldan// 'bras
86a7(mdo): bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor dablo gros snying po mkhyend// snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa myed// mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 
86a8(mdo): 'dod chags la stsogs smyon pasal cing // gar thabs chen po stonod pa po// stond pa dpag bsams shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung dang 'dra// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// 
86b1(mdo): dbang phyug chen po 'bar bar bsod// yod tan mtha' yas longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho gang ched mtsho// yon tan sna tshogs long spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog
86b2(mdo): zabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste// theg pa chen po 'jigs pa myed// mchod pa chen po sna che ba// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa// rdo rje'i
86b3(mdo): dkyil 'khor me tog thod// blo gros chen po phyag ring ba// pad ma chen po stobs po che// gsang sngags chen po chags chen ldan// sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan
86b4(mdo): nges// nor bu me tog zod kyis brgyad// mnyam pa nyid labyam longs spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan// sa'i bdag po lhun po bani/ 
86b5(mdo): sa la longs khyod longs spyod bzang // mtshon ma g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab 'byas snod ni rnam par grags// sba mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spyan rtsa yid tsam daH/ 
86b6(mdo): bste// me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings// sro ba chen po'i phyag ring ba// brtan po brtan la bde sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal babang chen po ste/ gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/ 
86b7(mdo): dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang // brtsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang 'jug/ 'jig rtend mchog rig sangs rgyas tshangs// de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can// rin cer tog ste cher bshad pa// 
86b8(mdo): dges pa na baba' sna tshogs gsolang// gzigs pa ring ba 'byan yangs pa// dam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa myed// zos pa myi dpogs rin den gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod pa myed pa'i rgya/ 
87a1(mdo): dul ba nyon mongs drim gsal// dag pa gtsang ba gso spyang can// rnam par gnod pa yul las 'das/ ldang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyi grags pa rgya che ba
87a2(mdo): bsams na shes pa'i khyod yul can// dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgya cher rab 'byung ba/ 
87a3(mdo): rigs mkhye nad rigs kyi snying po mkhyen// rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs mchog skyes pa'i rtend// rdo rje 'i ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa// rig sngag
87a4(mdo): 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyad par mtsho// 'grin bzangs nad dang bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston/ dpa dag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ 
87a5(mdo): sgrol ba smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud// rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams lamakhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rtend// grub pa
87a6(mdo): sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshul myin rtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste// 'od zer lnga ku'i 'od dang ldan// ser la na bza' ser po mnabs// dkyil 'khor ma lus
87a7(mdo): kun gyis brgya da// pyad rtsa dmar pa zla ba'i dpal// nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba// rdo rje brgya'i stobs kyis gro// mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma myed// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ 
87a8(mdo): dag pa mabyed da cing dag par dzad// dag pa'i chos yang 'aspang ba ste// 'byung lan srid pa sel medad pa// 'khor ba zad ma dzad shes rab can// tshul zhes tshul la longs spyod pa// rdo'i rtsa
87b1(mdo): mtsho snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpal dge ba che/ 'byung ldan rab 'byam shes rab cad// ma lus grags pa 'od bzang ba// sa'i snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren// 
87b2(mdo): dpas tu byed pa dpag byed rdzogs// byung par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// rab cing gams pa'i gtso bo ste// zla ba'i dkyis 'kho 'od zer bsis// dga' dang dang 'a skyed pa ste// ye zhes
87b3(mdo): bya ler gyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul la bung grag/ drag po lags te drag sel gca// rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la'o// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzod dga' bar mdzad// lu pol ti me ma la yas
87b4(mdo): khyod yum thab mnod pa ste// rin tson no rje'i snying po'i/ das gnami spyod yul mngal ba lags// rin cen 'thag ladabyung ba'i yod/ rdo rje'i dkyis 'kho ba dag gis brgyad/ 
87b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs la lku dgyes pa// shugs drag dpal rgya gzhi rte nad lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen
87b6(mdo): kyang brgyan brgyad mchog mams kyis// de rje sems dpas bsod das ni// de rjes gsum dpa mchog stsal// yon tan srung po zhes rnams kyis// mying brtsam brgyad mchog 'dzi
87b7(mdo): nyos pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa'i steng nangs ma mthong // mying brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // brim kun bral yon tan nges// 
87b8(mdo): de phyir bsgrim pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i myis// mying brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par bgyis// bying brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa
88a1(mdo): kun dag byor pa / gnas pachog blan byed pa ste// dpal yon tu chen sbyin pa yin// yid da shin tu da sa sa// pa'i stong pa'i sa dgapal ga// 'dod pa mam
88a2(mdo): rab sprul pa'i// gan tan mchog mi kangar brjod dang // dpal yon gyi chen 'dzin pa'i// sring brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mying ni gang zhig brjod byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myang du grol
88a3(mdo): mags pa la'i gang pa'i mtshan brgyam brgyad pa gzungs lags dang sa / rdzogs so// 'gas pa byag rdo rje pa bgran brgyad pa gzungs snyan pa dang
88a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na de rjes daphyag 'a denas byang chub sems dpa' dbyug na do rjes rab gi zhing po sprul pa// mA badz+racan tam sa
88a5(mdo): nya da ta pa tsa rngu baH/ des gsus 'ang bshad pa gag tu ma 'an thams par gyung te/ dgags dang log / 'dren thams cad kyang / 
88a6(mdo): nam nyam phan pa'i ga dbyung ba/ dkyis 'tshang chen po 'dus pa bsas cad ta ha zhes 'dab to// sa 'thogs pa rigasags 'ang chen po rnams kyis kyang rkun gyi mamed pam ba'o// bcom par
88a7(mdo): 'das kyis kyang las 'dus pazhidas/ rdo rje 'dza la gzigs nas bka' stsal das// sa sa sel ba 'khong 'didag tacang yang skrag par ma khyed cig/ rdo rje 'chang nas gso'adas// bcom
88a8(mdo): 'das bdag ni gzung sa 'di sa sto tugs pa lags so// rigs sngags rnams can gyi matog dang / dgegs thams cad bzlog pa dang / snang ba khams pa ses pa dang dab pa gsos pa
88b1(mdo): 'byor pa gsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / zos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don ma mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don ma mchis pa dang / stobs bskyed pa dang // 
88b2(mdo): gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / sdang ba 'jig par
88b3(mdo): bgyid pa dang / dug sel pa dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dad par bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par
88b4(mdo): bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs pa// bgyis pa sbyor ba dang / 'dod chags la stsogs pa'i nyon dmongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa
88b5(mdo): rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra myi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / bskal pa bzang zla bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / 
88b6(mdo): gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba rtsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum 'tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char myi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa
88b7(mdo): lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / myi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa dang / myi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad sems dang / mo langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang sprod pa dang / 
88b8(mdo): srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la gos kar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du/ 
89a1(mdo): lta zhing lan bdud brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las tha dad par 'gyur zhing / grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad rgyal bar gyur te/ 
89a2(mdo): sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / spyod pa ni gzungs chen po 'di lus lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar tu gyur nas/ rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
89a3(mdo): mngon par bstod pa// rdo rje sems dpal sems dpa' che// ngo rje'i rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje'i 'jigs pa dges pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che// rdo rje
89a4(mdo): 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te/ rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa ste/ chags pa'i zhags pa ma gyogs pa che// phyag dam phyag ni
89a5(mdo): ring ba ste/ rgyan dbang byar dang ldan pa lags// rdo rje mthon / mthon ka che// mthon ting dbu smras brgyad pa lags/ ral gri sngon po ral gri che// dkyil 'khor sdod pa'i dkyil 'ja
89a6(mdo): can// mtho ka'i khyad te dbu sngo ba// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje'i sngon po stobs myi mtshungs// rdo rje khro ba'i stobs che ba// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che// selang mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel
89a7(mdo): khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod// khro bo 'gyegs rigs sel bar mdzad// bcu bsdams zhags pa bsdams pa ste// rdo rje mdangs ni nges par 'gums// dbyug thogs rdo rje ral gyi bsdams// rdo rje'i
89a8(mdo): zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu che// sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris// gzig rjid bskyed pa grags mdzad pa// bzod par dka'
89b1(mdo): rgyal ma ldan pa'i dpung dang lan// das pa nyis sun pa'i'i/ ga rgyas can pas pan pas// spyod sus bags bgrangs byed gsus// lags nga ma ga ben// dmas
89b2(mdo): can mang bdas// rab bstong kya dam gso'o// sas dag napapa la mthan la shes// srid pa srung brna pas// btog 'phreng ba'i rgyan la dbyug// nyis chen pa nyim ma 'ang/ 
89b3(mdo): skye 'jigs par yad/ @ gsas pa/ sa kyad da mngapas byung // bang dgas rgyas byo pa/ pa ba
89b4(mdo): rgyal po 'gas 'cha chen pa ste// dashegs kun dbang phyug mams pa lags// khyedu rgya ga 'i skyed su// sadzes zhing stobs bskyed 'tshogs skabs// dga' ba bskyed pa dga' ba bang// da
90a1(mdo): gsul pa 'dzind lam mtshal/ la can dpa' ba chen po ste// brtan po dpa' bo las se pa// bdag chen pa'i cing ba yod/ dag pa 'tshang ba'i rmil sa ma // mdzad pa
90a2(mdo): cod pan cad// rigs sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dka' ba// pad ma chen po phyag ring ba// pad ma las byung pad ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste/ 
90a3(mdo): rlung chen pa'ang mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon ma brgya rdzogs pa// rtul pod bka' thub brtsan pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rdzi// zhi ba dbang po rdo rje mchod// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems/ 
90a4(mdo): rgyal ba'i tham po gzugs che ba// de rje'i ni dkyis mtsha rgyad// de rje'i lugs yadas srog mdzad pa// de rje'i dadas mirnam par spyod// don dod yod de rje'i dbang // derje
90a5(mdo): bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal// ye shes dag pa theg pa che/ thabs rnyed snying rje chen po lags// rdo rje chen po rtse mo can/ spyan babang rnam par gzigs pa'o// rdo rje dril bu nam dag spyan/ 
90a6(mdo): mdza' bo mug pa dam tshigs byed// rdo rje chedan po dgon pa pa// rdo rjes 'o// 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sngon// me tog chun po 'od gsal ba// dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras
90a7(mdo): nges pa skal pabang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te la kun pajog/ rdo rje dbyung gi dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje'i gtsug sug shes rab can// rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes bzhin tu
90a8(mdo): rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i drung chen lta bu lags// dpal po gsang ba chen po 'chang // rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis brjod// gsang ba po ste gas pas gsum// skyes pa bud byed
90b1(mdo): tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje'i thog log sgra chen sgrogs// rdo rje'i sprog ste rnam par 'joms// rdo rje lugs kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar pa cher 'bar ba// nor bus sras pa yin bzal gsol// 
90b2(mdo): spos dang me tog 'phreng gis brgyan// dbu'i stan cha gdug 'khor btags// sangs rgyas bsta nad pa stond pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// 
90b3(mdo): dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor stond pa po// dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings// sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon
90b4(mdo): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bdag gis bstod// de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa'i/ rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// mying ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / 
90b5(mdo): snang ba thams cad zlog byed pa// mying ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'di// dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa// grub pa zas cad 'thob 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ 
90b6(mdo): lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje yon tan che// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// de ni sdig pa kun las 'grol// ngan song kun las za
90b7(mdo): par 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// su zhig nang par langs nas brjod// rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba// gnyen rnams kyang mi dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su
90b8(mdo): 'dod pa// 'jig rten zas cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa la dam pa 'i// bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/ 
91a1(mdo): su zhig rang par langs nas ni// lag ma rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsom myed/ mying brgya rtsa brgyad 'dod pa la// dgegs dang log 'dren
91a2(mdo): thams cad dang // 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis gnan par myi nus so// shes rab can ni gang zhig gis// bying brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// gzugs bzang stobs ni
91a3(mdo): skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhig mying brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'dod// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa'i// bde ba de yis 'thob
91a4(mdo): par 'gyur// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i mchad brgya rtsa brgyad dpa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// rdzogs so// @/ rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya 'jam
91a5(mdo): pa la/ na ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na// bod skad du/ 'pha pa gnod 'dzin/ kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'phags pa gnod 'dzind la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gnod
91a6(mdo): 'dzin 'brog gnas mo// gser dag gis ni legs par brgyad// rin cen kyis ni rab mdzes shing // me ni gi nang tu 'bar 'dral// srang lo can du zhugs nas kyang // gsang bdag rdo rje 'ang
91a7(mdo): ba'i/ zhabs gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas// shand tu mnyam bzhag dris pa yi// bcom ldan gnod sbyin rgyal dbang po// gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag/ rigs sngags 'chang rnams
91a8(mdo): kun gyis mchod// lha dang lha phyid phyag byas pa// ma rungs 'dul ba brtson pa po// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// mgor po sems cad kun don mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsapa
91b1(mdo): pa 'dzin // sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas// snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis su// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir// bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de// myi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang / 
91b2(mdo): bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba// mthong na sdug bsngal chen po yas// rab tu gzi rid to gsang ba'i bdag/ de skad gnod sbyin gyis spras nas// bcom ldan gsang ba pa'i bdag/ snying rjes
91b3(mdo): non te smras pa ni// legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa// mgon po gnod 'dzind dpal dang ldan// sems cad kun gyi don byed pa// dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba po// nor ro cog gi dbang phyun
91b4(mdo): gi// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan// dbul ba da'i nyes sdig sel byed pa// gang ga'i bye ma grangs snyed kyi/ rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa// 'od gzer brgya pa
91b5(mdo): zhes pa'i// zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal// chos ste/ pa ni bdag gis kyang // de ni rang gi sngon thos te/ dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan// de ni bdag gi shes rab
91b6(mdo): kyis// sems cad kun don brtsod pa po// khyod la legs par bstand par bya// khyod ni mnyam gzhag rab tu nyon// 'phags pa lnga dang lA byin za// shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus/ 
91b7(mdo): snying rtse pa'i bdag nyid bzod ldan btad// dpa' bo zhi ba dbang po thul// dge bas sdig 'joms shes nyen cad// des shing dod kun sgrub pa po// myi gnod kyi sku dpal dang ldan// mdzod bdag
91b8(mdo): gzhan gyis myi grub pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po// gter rnams spyong ba gzi' brjid can// rtag sbyir nor mi 'phel byed pa// rin chen/ 
92a1(mdo): 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul// chuli bdag po chu 'bebs pa// gnod sbyin chu skyod bdag nyid can// gter don nye bar stond pa po// gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste/ dbul ba'i gdon las
92a2(mdo): tharang byed pa// dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i 'gom// chu'i dbang po srim mdog can// 'jig rte dmyig dang 'jig rten dbra// nyi ma zla ba zer thug pa// nor cad rgyal po chen po ste/ lag na ne
92a3(mdo): le'i ma gnas pa// gzhon nu seng ge tog can te// gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che// tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa// gsong por snyan par smra ba po// bram ze 'dod pa'i lugs kyo ste/ 
92a4(mdo): che ba don grub grub pas mchod// rigs sngags 'chang ba 'khor lo sgyur// ku be ra dang myi la zhon// bum pa lto can myig ya ngas pa// lce'i dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs// khyab bdag bde
92a5(mdo): 'byung nor bzangs sras// sems can nams ni spyod la dga' 'dod rgyur sbyar gzugs yid kyi lha// cod pan can te rigs/ dga' ba// g.yon phyogs cod pan lag na dbyug/ lag pa
92a6(mdo): brgya pa stobs po che// sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul pa/ zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can// ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po pa// gnas kartan tshong pa bskal bzang ba// yid bzhin nor bu bum
92a7(mdo): ba bzang // dpag bsams ljon shing myili bdag/ mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste// mchog sbyin myi'u tung khyab 'jug pa// skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po/ rin cen 'breng bas rnam par brgyan/ 
92a8(mdo): lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gi bdag/ rab tu dang ba nor byi zad// seng ge'i rtsal gyi mthu rtsal cam// sto dad pa'i 'jig rtend gsum las rgyal// gtso bo tshor ba
92b1(mdo): rigs kyi mchog/ pad ma'i lte ba thub myed rgyal// tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che// gnod 'dzidad bdag nyid che ba yi// mying brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed cing // 
92b2(mdo): dbul ba'i nyes pa sel byed pa// 'byor da dang skal bzang bskyed pa po// glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa// gza' dang rgyu skar rmyi lam ngan// ltas ngan sel bar byed pa ste// nags sam/ gal te grong dang
92b3(mdo): midur khrod ya na ri yang rung // mkhas pa gang da klog pa der/ g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba// sbrul dang me chu chom rkun rdzogs// stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che// rgya mtsho bgrod dka' myi bzang
92b4(mdo): las// myi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dpa' bo me dang chu la dang // gshing rje srid bdag rlung lha dang // gnod sbyin/ dpal ldan ku be ra// nor bu bzang sras lngas rtsen dang / 
92b5(mdo): rtser mo can dang 'brog gnas dang // lha dang gnod sbyin gnod dag kyang // g.yel ba myed par nyin mtshan du// rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed// gang na mying 'di klog pa der// glang cher rta
92b6(mdo): dang ba lang dang // lo tog rnas pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel// myi nad dang mi 'gro ba'i dang // gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams// thams cad du mi bde legs 'gyur/ 
92b7(mdo): lhag par byis pa rnams la shis// de la yi dgas klu rnams dang // ma mo dang mi gdon drag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang myi 'am ci// srin po rnams kyang lam kyi byed// nad do cog las nas
93a1(mdo): par grol// de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan// bu dag dang min po dang // dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis brgyan/ rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang / longs 'khyod chen/ 
93a2(mdo): po'i rang du skye// tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang // rang myed rims dang bral bar 'gyur// tsher rabs kun tu skye ba drad// lobs rkyend thos pa 'dzi dad pa dang // skal pa bzang po nyid du 'gyur// 
93a3(mdo): phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gdod skyid che// gsang ba dag khyod la phyag 'tshal te// marung 'dul ba brtsod pa po// lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sems can dad la mnyes bshin pa// 
93a4(mdo): nor bzangs sras kyi grags pa 'di// dbul ba'i nad na ni bye da pa// rab tu bshad pa legs par ga dasungs// don kun grub pa gsungs pa'i sngags// bad
93a5(mdo): gis kyang ni 'dir 'bul te// de ni legs pa dran tsas kyis myi dbul lasagrol 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyis myi tshugs srung bar 'gyur// dgra rnams kyis kyang / 
93a6(mdo): myi choms shi / skal pa bzang dang skal dang ldan// lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// lha'i glang po rini chen dang // rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang // nges par myur du thob 'gyur te// 
93a7(mdo): rgyal srid kyang na yi nom myed/ na mo rang sa tra yA ya/ ma mo ma Ni pAd tra la/ ma hA sa ku sem pa ta ye/ mdzan rnang/ glang / dzA / hrIH/ das byas ra nolus/ pa ri ga
93a8(mdo): a ti bka' de lta ga nas sa / ba nu swa ra/ hrI hU~M ba ta mAH/ 'phags pa gdod 'dzin kyi mtshan brgyam brgyan pa/ rdzogs so// bodas tu/ 
93b1(mdo): lha mo nag po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag kyis zos pa tus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sa rba/ 
93b2(mdo): rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/ byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so// de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ nad to cog gi bdag mo gshin rje'i lcam mos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
93b3(mdo): la gyi thos gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'i snying po 'di 'bul na/ btsun pa btso/ 
93b4(mdo): ldan 'das kyis gnang ba'i skabs dbye' bar gsol/ de nas bdag gi lha mo nag yo'i bstod pa brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ til yang gis bsdus lan pu gcig pa'i ro nyes brgyad cing cha luH/ 
93b5(mdo): ma lus 'chang / rgyan tu rkang sprog lpags las byas pa kaN+Daka gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa ste/ mtshan mogacer bur bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni/ lha mo// 
93b6(mdo): khyod nyid kyis ri bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyi gzhan lta khyod kyi 'ayod pa'i mtsho cher don dag su yis shes// 'khor ba 'jig pa'i chen gyi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul pa na// lA mo
93b7(mdo): mche ba myi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig cam kyis zhugs par 'gyur// lha mo phyi mod thogs pa khyod mirnal 'byor dgrub pa'i rnal 'byor da can de dur khrod dgyes// khyod ni g.yon cad man/ 
93b8(mdo): zhing mya ngan byed// 'chi ba'i 'jigs sel myi bzad dril yang sgrogs// khyod mi dpa' bo rang gi mgo bo cod pa ma legs dkris g.yul du mtshon gyis bcad// lag pa'i gnyen/ brkyang 'phreng ba pog
94a1(mdo): shig pa// kar byed brkyang sum che chub chos che la// klu dbang ka shibs pa'i skye rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ba dang thogs// khyod ni khrag dang chang kyis myos gyur da te
94a2(mdo): byig rtsa dbar por byas nab dung khrod rgyab 'byung po lal chernams kyis mthong // ko rlod cher pos dras te nang pa mags kyis snyam gyi phyed g.yogs phyed ni ri ldes dkris// phyi'i rgyam sar pa'i sbubs kyi
94a3(mdo): zhes kyi zla la la rgyan cing zhag dang zhag yang 'dzag pa'i chol bu shig le yig seng bris// phyi ga la mo 'as ches ches gcod mdzad cing // zod pa can 'das la spong 'gyur cig/ drag po drag ma 'i khan gyi/ 
94a4(mdo): sha thogs pa khyod/ sdod ma byung khyod mthong bas// mu s+ho rnams kyang spangs te sdam pa mthor cing dmyig rtsa rig rig khyod la dud// lha mo bzang mo lus mdog bzang zhing dka' ba rnams
94a5(mdo): kyang 'dud// gshin rje nyid kyang 'dar zhing rtag tu khyod la 'dud/ brgya byin la sogs rnams kyang nyin cig bzhin du 'dud/ ny+tsa rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus kun// 'jug rtul ba man pa
94a6(mdo): ma cig brang gis 'gro ni 'go po song gan rgyang du byas// na la ya cig seng ge'i mtshungs byed pa gzhi ma lus gnod// rgya mtsho la kro das me 'bar khyod// chu rnams snyems pade rus pa ste/ 
94a7(mdo): bud byed thams cad ni mdzad phyir// lA chen sku'i phyed du bzhugs// rdzong dang bka' rdzogs nag mo che// myi nad 'di ni su 'am byas// 'di la 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur// sau ru ru ro ru bide di swA
94a8(mdo): ban to sad di swA hA/ bdag la srungs cig srungs cig/ lha mo chen mo dag mo chen mo'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// zad tu tha oM ru ru ro ru ber de sta ban do sid di swA hA// bstod pa dang / gzung
94b1(mdo): kyi snying po 'di dus gsum du myi brjed par/ rang par 'ja ba dang g.yar don tu bzlas te/ lha mo nag yo yid la bzung na/ gdon che phra gang gis kyang myi tshugs te 'byol lo// lhag par yang
94b2(mdo): rims nad dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ ldog pa 'am/ zab pa la stsogs pa cis kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rmi ltas ngad pa thams cad zlogs s+ho// / rdzogs s+ho
94b3(mdo): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba bla mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
94b4(mdo): to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba li bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcangs par 'gyur ro// myi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro// 
94b5(mdo): tshe rabs thams cad du de yang gnod sbyin gyis de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed pa de la nad zas cad kyis 'dziH/ pa myed do// s+ya ya thi dan/ bud de bud de/ dza yod
94b6(mdo): ta ra bo dA ni bo dA ni/ sam g+ho d+ha ni/ ma ha sa po da / mar+thi ta pa ta/ bo da ni/ ha la hA la ha la hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud da/ d+harma a ba bo d+ha ni/ sU ta su ta/ 
94b7(mdo): ku tan ti/ sarba pa pA ni/ bud da d+hi shi ni ni sa ta// 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// @/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 
94b8(mdo): AM e ka mu khi/ dI mu khi/ dri mu khi sa hA// de bzhin gshegs pa srul pa'i sku'i mtshan brgyaHbrgyad pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi mgon cig pa// thams cad mkhyend pa thub pa
95a1(mdo): yache// yon tan rgya mtshoms 'a yas pa// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dgus par mdzod// bkra shis kun gyi bkrashis pa// sdig pa thams cad rag 'jobs pa// sug bsngal lan
95a2(mdo): cad sel ba po// sonod pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa po// lus can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa// shin tu bde ba sbyin pa zo// zla ba mdzes la bdag phyag 'tshal/ 
95a3(mdo): bkra shis thams cad yang dag rdzogs// sems can kun gyi thugs brtse ba// sems can kun gyi 'gon po mchog/ thams cad mkhyend la bdag phyag 'tshal// rigs pa thams cad legs sgrub pa/ 
95a4(mdo): sangs rgyas logs byed rtogs pa po// gnod pa thams cad se/ mdzad pa// dod kur grub la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs yang ngas rgyas la 'gro ba'i gnyes// lAli lA la bkod pa'i// mtshan
95a5(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa po// mchog tu dge ba bdag nyid bshad/ don kun grub pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// shag kya'i skyes mchog thams cad mkhyend// chos kun dbang phyug brtan pa po/ 
95a6(mdo): drang srong chen po yon tan mtsho// dgra bcom bde gshegs de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan 'jig rten kun mkhyen pa// nyes pa'i dro la kun las 'das// chos kyi sdang ba mdzad pa'i mchog/ 'jigs
95a7(mdo): spyod zhag rgya mas gtsang sras/ bu ras shing pa'i rigs dga' ba// ko ta ma ste nyi ma'i rigs// thub dpal nyi ma'i rgyu bdag go// 'jig rten mgod po stobs bcu pa ldan// bdud dpung nges par 'jom
95a8(mdo): so// nyes pa yangs zhing dag 'jams pa// kyi tshul la lo babang po pa// rigs pa grom pa kun cem pa// rgan dus la dbang po thog// chos thoms nas da/ dris byed// 'dod gas / 
95b1(mdo): ning se ga byed/ dpag tu byed cing 'jogs byed parnyes// chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa po// mtha' yas dpe khyed gsung ldan pa// bams kyis kyi khyab la mchan skabs// 'jig nyid gsum mkhyed du/ 
95b2(mdo): gsum rig pa// dus gsum sa khyed ci nyes gsum 'joms// co 'phrul gsum dang ldanapa po// phung po gsus kyi lung yod pa// macon brjod byed rims myed pa// bdag gi byed cing rgyal gyi/ 
95b3(mdo): cher ma byed cing gros pa myed// 'jigs myed kha na ma tho myed// dpa' bo mchog sbyin mchog dor 'os// smra ba'i seng ge myi'i mchog/ rnam par dul zhing nyon mongs bral// nam dag bdag nyid na par 'dre/ 
95b4(mdo): rig dang zhabs su ldad pa po// khyal bdag kun rgal rnas par mdzes// sems dul dri ma byed mnga' ba// rdul dang bral/ ba rig pa'i mchog/ zhi bar mdzad cing sdig pa zhi// bsil/ 
95b5(mdo): bar gyurd cing shis par mdzad// stonod pa 'gro ba'i skyabs 'os pa// dpa' bo dag la bsnyengs myi mnga'// yang da/ ga mtshan rdzogs dpal dang ldan// dmyig 'khan zug rngu 'byind/ 
95b6(mdo): ba bo// shag tu sed ge dge sbyong dbang // dgel ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyo// sangs rgyas chos drug spyan mngal ba// chos drug dri ma myed pa'i bdag/ mdzor shes drug dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 
95b7(mdo): 'gro drug rgya mtsho 'i pha rol gshegs// rang 'byung ba de gshegs grub pa po// 'jig rten dkun la phan par dges// shes rab myi mnyam mnyam par bzhag/ ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu 'du// sems can/ 
95b8(mdo): kun rtsi bar rgol// bden pa gsung zhing dbang po bsdams// 'jig rten dkun la dge pa po// sems can snying por kun gzigs pa// 'khor ba'i dgon las rgal ba po// dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs/ 
96a1(mdo): 'gyur ba// dbang ldan yul las rnam par rgyal// bden pa bzhi ni rab stond pa// pha rol gshegs shing sgrol ba 'gon// 'dren pa shin tu mya ngan 'das/ bram ze tshangs pa
96a2(mdo): thu bo btsun// gtso bo bde mdzad bde ldan pa// bsrung mdzad nas rgyal bdag nyid che// rnam grangs 'jig rten dazhi bar mdzad// sems can kun la pha pa po// sems dpa' kun gyi dam pa
96a3(mdo): lags// 'jig rtend mchod gnas 'jig rten mkhyend// 'jig rtend sdang mdzad legs mdzad pa// brnyes ldan 'jig rten bya ba 'das// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam du gshegs// chos
96a4(mdo): kyi mnga' bdag chos kyi rgyal/ ded dpon legs par 'od mdzad dpa// nang gnyis gtso ba skyob pa po// bzod par bzung zhing bzod par ldan// gzugs bzang blo bzang zhi ba ste// 
96a5(mdo): ngang tshul bzang zhing bde ba sbyin// mdza' bo bzang po gser mdog can// rab bzang tshul bzang dge ba sbyin// sangs rgyas dpal chen myi seng ge// dpa' bo gcig pu mun sel ba/ 
96a6(mdo): 'jam pa myed pa 'gro ba'i sbubs// rgyal ba bla ma gyi mnyam mnyam// zhams las grol cing srid pa myed// myo'i skyes mchog brgyal bcom// s+yad dang ldan pa kun tu gyud// phyi rnam sa dbyin/ 
96a7(mdo): te gsung ba'i mchog/ mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// rtag tu gang zhig klog byed pa// de ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las rgal// go 'phang mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims
96a8(mdo): te/ nam par langs nas mkhas pa dag/ brjod dam yang mnyan pa'am// ya na yid la byed kyang rung // rgyal ba'i mtshan bstod dge ba mi// bkra shis bsod nas mchog tu 'gyur// dag/ 
96b1(mdo): byed dran tha mas pa ste// dan kun grub cing bskrad pa yin// sdig pa kun las rab tu thol// sug bsngal kun dpa 'jigs las grol// nyon mongs kur las nas grol zhing // sangs rgyan
96b2(mdo): nyid ni bde bar 'thob// de ltar bdag gis thub pa'i yon tan mtshan bsngags pas/ dge ba rgya chen yang dag bsus pa gang yin pa// 'di yis 'jig rtend lha yul dang ni sa steng du/ 
96b3(mdo): de nams thob nas bde ba mchog gis sangs rgyas gyad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i maHbrgya rtsa brgyad pa// rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya kar skad du/ a r+ya prad nya pa mgyi
96b4(mdo): tan ma a stan ta ka na// bod skad tu/ 'phags pa shes/ rab kyi pha ro// tu phyind pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
96b5(mdo): byin lam mo// 'das dang ma 'ongs dam kyi/ rgyal ba gang lags dkun gyi// yum ni dges khyed lags te/ khyod de lam rgyal ba'i mas// rang bani byed pa'i rang bam
96b6(mdo): cad/ sangs rgyas sum 'gyur de'i sacan// dgel ba bdag gis brjod par bgyid// 'byoras par 'dod pas mnyan par gyis/ shes ragus rol dbyin pa pa dang / thams cad ma byed pa nyis
96b7(mdo): dang / lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa 'i de bzhin nyid dang
96b8(mdo): bded pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / phyi rnyed ci ma log pa nyid dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma byed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dngos
97a1(mdo): po byed pa ngom nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos gnas pa nyid dang chos kyi 'gyur ba nyid dang chos spyon byed pa nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos zadag byed pa nyid
97a2(mdo): dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa nyid dang / sems cad myed pa nyid dang / srog myed pa nyid dang / gso ba myed pa nyid dang / skyes bu myed pa nyid dang / gang zag byed pa nyid dang / brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba ma
97a3(mdo): yin pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa myed pa dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / bdag gi byed pa dang / rgyags pa myed pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / 
97a4(mdo): gros pa dang bral ba dang / sros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad las shinang tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa dang
97a5(mdo): nyan thos thams cad 'dzind pa dang / rang sangs rgyas spu dad pa dang / 'jig rtend thams cad 'dzind pa dang / bsod nams kyi chog pad myi shes pa brtsegs pa dang / ye shes 'bab pa dang
97a6(mdo): rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i phyog rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / lha len pa rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang / pha rol kyi sems zhes bar mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su drad par mdzad pa dang
97a7(mdo): 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba rjes su drad par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsngags pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa la gnas par
97a8(mdo): yangadag par spang ba'i thugs dang ldan pa dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bzhi'o rnabs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po sbyong bar mdzad pa/ dang / skabs mdzad pa dang / khan ma tho ba myed pa dang / byang chub
97b1(mdo): kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stond pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu ston/ 
97b2(mdo): par mdzad pa dang / dbang bcu smrab pa dang / sa 'phru la gnas par mdzad pa dang / gnas pacu yongs su rdzogs pa ma mdzad pa dang / zad par kyi snye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang / shes pa
97b3(mdo): sgrub pa dang / bag la nyal bcu'i dgra 'jig par mdzad pa dang / bsam gtan rnams sgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams las yang dag par 'ang bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs
97b4(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod pa dang / shes rab thams/ cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang // phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
97b5(mdo): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
97b6(mdo): dor pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
97b7(mdo): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i rngab nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / chad pa byed pa dang / rtag pa myed pa dang / dod gcig pa ma yin pa
97b8(mdo): dang / don tha dad pa ma yid pa dang / 'ong ba byed pa dang / 'gro ba byed pa dang / rte nad cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / rab tu brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba sa
98a1(mdo): yin pa dang / ka zhi myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa myed par mdzad pa dang / g.yo ba myed/ 
98a2(mdo): par mdzad pa dang / gnyis myed pa dang / gnyis myed pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / blo 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa dang / gnyen po myed pa dang / ma gos pa dang / nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang / 
98a3(mdo): yod pa dang myed par brjod pa ma yin pa dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang / 'gal me bskor ba 'dra ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do// su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol
98a4(mdo): tu byi rid pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dod pa de/ ngad song ces cad las rab tu tha dad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad dkyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
98a5(mdo): kyis kyang ta par rgyad tu bsrung ba dang / slob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i gsang sngags kyi zhi 'dra da ga kyang rtag pa rgyad tu dran par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma
98a6(mdo): mazhes ras kyi par ya tu myed pa mas pas byams ma yan tan dpag tu byed pa dnga' das/ de bzhin gshenas pa thams cad kyi legs kyis rnam par babyed pa nyid/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems das
98a7(mdo): thams cad kyis phyag bzhes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ au prad nye brad nye/ ma ha prad nye phrad nye/ a ba ba se/ brad nyam log ka re/ mad nyan bi da ma ni/ sid de su yidi de/ sid da/ 
98a8(mdo): mad pa ka pa ti swa rang ka ba te sa rang ka sun da ra/ bA ka ba de pad sa le pra sa re ta ha ste/ a ma shA sa ka ri/ ti shwa ti sha/ ke pa ke pa/ tsa la tsa la/ ra ba ra ba/ ka rdza ka rdza/ a ga rdza ma gad dza
98b1(mdo): ba ka pa ti/ mnam bi laM ba swaswA hA// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'bum phrag gzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na de'i las kyi
98b2(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos ngas kyang skye ba drad pa dang / yid bzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa myed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos la
98b3(mdo): lus par bzung bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / rig sngags thams cad kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa na yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// 
98b4(mdo): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / bcom ldan das la byang chub sems dpal phyag na rdo rjes mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
98b5(mdo): bstod pa// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings// kun gyi don de yang dag nyid shag kya'i rgyal po ye shwe che// rdo rje nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' khyung ba sapa
98b6(mdo): dag dod// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems dpa' chen po don byed pa/ sems can sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos te chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo
98b7(mdo): bskor ba ste// cher sma shi nad tu rig pa'i mchog/ sems can la ni phyag 'tshal lo// las chen bsrung ba chen po ste// las kun rab tu bsgrub par byed// mthu chen sems can spyod pa'i mchog/ 
98b8(mdo): sems can rgyu la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol da phyind pa kun thob pa// ye shes kun te shes 'bigs pa// sems can kun gyi thabs chen po// shes rab che la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje chen
99a1(mdo): po'i mchog yin te// snying rje brtse ba dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po kun la sbyin// kun pa snying rje phyag 'tshal lo// shag kya seng ge shag kya che/ nus pa shag kya mthu chen te/ 
99a2(mdo): 'dul ba chen po tshul dang ldan// 'dul ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi dbyings te snyoms thob pa// chos kyi dbyings te de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje mgon po mgon che ba// sems can
99a3(mdo): bsdus la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba chen po 'od chen te// brtson 'grus chen po stobs po che// shin tu dpa' ba dpa' chen po// rang 'byung dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa rang byung ba rtse/ 
99a4(mdo): ldan 'das// shag kya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun dang ldan pa thub patsan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag 'tshal lo// lus myid lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus gsum lus su bsgom
99a5(mdo): pa ste// kun gyi lus te lus chen po// rdo rje lus la phyag 'a/ tshal lo// ngag myin ngag ste ngag gi mchog/ ngag/ gsum ngag tu gcad pa ste// kun gyi ngag ste ngag chen po// 
99a6(mdo): rdo rje ngag la phyag 'tshal lo// sems myin sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems su stond pa ste// kun gyi sos te sos chen po// rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje ngo
99a7(mdo): myid rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba'i rdo rje ste// kun gyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// stsogs pa'i rtse mor khyab pa'i mchog/ bde bshegs dbang po rgyal ba ste// khams
99a8(mdo): gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po// rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan du brjod pa rtsa brgyad 'di// gang gis lan cig thos sam ni// bsgoms sam yang na klags kyang rung // kun kyang
99b1(mdo): sangs rgyas thob 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes mtshan brgyam brgyad kyis bstod pa// rdzogs so// / rgya kar skad du/ a d+ya sa rba ka rma
99b2(mdo): a kha ra na ba sha dA ra na na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad tu/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyong ba la zhes bya ba'i gzungs// na mo rad da tra yA ya/ mA~M ka ka ni/ kAM kAM ni/ ro tsa ni ro
99b3(mdo): si/ trota ri tro ta ni/ tra sa mi rdzas ni/ pra ti ha na/ pra ti ha na/ sarba ka rma ba re ba ra be swa hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag su bzlas brjod byas na
99b4(mdo): las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed do// dus gsum bu bzlas brjod byas na/ mtshams myed pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas
99b5(mdo): brjod byas na/ ltas ngam dang rmyi lam ngan pa dang / bkra myi shes/ pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam khregs pa ma la bris sam/ mgul tu btam
99b6(mdo): te 'chang dang / de la dus ma yin par 'chib rnas pa thams cad kyi sems cad du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// gang zhig snying rjes mi da pas mi dgas dang bya dang / gyi dang phyi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'a
99b7(mdo): ba'i dus kyi che na khung du brjod na/ de ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// shi ba 'am dus las 'das pa 'am shi 'phos pa'i mying nas bos te/ de'i ched du byams pa dang snying rjes lam brgya'am stong ngam/ 
99b8(mdo): 'bum brjod na/ sems can de/ sems can dmyal bar skyes u zi rad kyang / de'i mdo la tha rad par 'gyur ro// / sa 'am til lam yungs kar ram u yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus
100a1(mdo): a sa gtong ram khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bzed go// yang na mchod rted kyi nang tu bcugs/ bzhag la/ rigra sngags kyang bris te 'go bo la btags na/ des ngan song du skyes pa yang / 
100a2(mdo): nag bdun gyis gdon gyi sa par bar te bde 'gro la po ris kyi 'jig rtend du skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i che/ khrus byas la gcas
100a3(mdo): mar byas te/ dus gsum la gos rje zhipa khams khyiza pa 'am/ khabs kar bkab zhing / sku gzhung dang ldan pa'i mchod rtend bskor ba bzhin du/ gang gi mying nas byung bas lar mod cig brgya bzlas
100a4(mdo): brjod byas na/ de ngan song las thar te/ gnas gtsang ma'i lA'i ris su skyes nas/ sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs nas// mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas
100a5(mdo): lan gsum bstod pa byas nas mying snang bar gyur to// de'i myong khres la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing / mchod rtenas/ cig brgya byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bdan / 
100a6(mdo): las bsdogs pas legs par mchod nam/ rgya mtsho chen po 'am/ yang na chu dru 'dra bo da / des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas tha dad par 'gyur ro// yang mde ltar mchod rten pa byas nas
100a7(mdo): 'dug tu lam gyig ni mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la stsogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa 'i dge 'dun kyang mchod rtend gsol// yon tan yang phul te
100a8(mdo): legs par mchod nas/ 'di che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyurd cig ces kyang byas nas de kho na bzhin du skyes nas kyang bstod cing / legs so zhes bya ba byin nas myi sdang bar gyurd to// las kyi sgrib
100b1(mdo): ba thams cad rnam par spyod pa la gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// // phyag stong su la stong mang la ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhugs rje chen po thon
100b2(mdo): pa myed pa shi nad tu rgyas pa chen po'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gyis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thug/ 
100b3(mdo): pa/ ri bo ta la'i kha na/ 'phags pa lhan ras gzigs kyi dbang po li pho brang / ring po che rnam par bkod payi nang ra/ seng ge ring po che'i bdan rin po che sna tshogs kyis kun tu smras pa/ 
100b4(mdo): rin po che mi gdugs dang / rgyal mchar dang / ba dan gyis klubs dashing spangs pa'i bdam la bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das bdan de nyid la bzhugs zhing
100b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' grangs byed pa rnams la / 'phags pa kyi naras gzigs kyi bzungs 'di bshad pa dgongs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di sa de/ 
100b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang po dang bya su pa dang ni mas pa dang byam pa dang gyu lo dang byang chub sems dpa' skad kyi lnga dang / byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa spyan ras ga
100b7(mdo): kyi dbang po dang byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sdong pos brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpal bkod chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po dang / byang chub
100b8(mdo): sems dpal dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun
101a1(mdo): tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gno nu ma gyurd pa dang / de dag la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun kyang chos kyi rgyal por dbang bsrung ba sha stag go// 
101a2(mdo): gzhan yang nyan thos chen po grangs myed pa 'od srung chen po la sogs te/ kun kyang dgra bcom pa sa bcur gnas pa sha stag go// gzhan yang tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa san ta la stsogs pa grangs myed pa dang
101a3(mdo): yang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang lha'i sras po ku ku pa ka la sogs te/ lha'i sras po grangs myed pa dang yang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang 'jig rte rang skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung las
101a4(mdo): sogs te/ grangs myed pa dag dang thabs gcig ko// gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ri dpal chen po la stsogs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
101a5(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang mya ma yin pa la stsogs pa grangs myed pa dang yang thabs ka/ ste cig go// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i sras mo gan
101a6(mdo): nu nyid la sogs te/ lha'i sras po grangs myed pa dang yang thabs gcig go// gzhan yang nam mkhal la gnas pa 'i lha grangs myed pa dang / chu dang chu bo'i lha dang / chu rlung gi lha dang / rtsa dang sman gyi lha dang / 
101a7(mdo): shing gi la dang / khyim byi lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi sa dang / sa'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / gnas dang gzhal myed khang gi lha la sogs te/ grangs myed pa dag kyang so so nas 'dun
101a8(mdo): shing lhags par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'khor ma pa po de'i nang du 'dus nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend dang / stong gsuM
101b1(mdo): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams rnams gser gi kha dog tu sdang ba li 'od du byid kyis rlabs te/ lha dang klu la stsogs pa'i pho brang dang / mtsho dang / chu dang rlung chen po dang / ri rab dang khor yug dang
101b2(mdo): ri dang / ri dag po la stsogs te thams cad kyang shi nad tu g.yo bar byas/ nyi zla dang skar ma dang / me la stsogs pa'i 'od kyang zil gyis myi sdang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpal gzungs kyi
101b3(mdo): rgyal po po mtshar rmad du gyud pa sngon pa byung ba'i ltas te mthong nas snyam las langs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ltas 'di sus mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das la dri ba'i
101b4(mdo): phyir tshigs su bcad de gsol da pa// su zhig dngape 'dir sangs rgyas na/ 'di ltar 'od ces phyogs btang bas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams 'di dang // stong gsum 'jig rtend
101b5(mdo): gser du snang // su zhig deng 'dir mthu brnyes na// ngo mtshar mthu chen 'od btang bas// mtha' yas shing kun g.yol maHda de// lha klu la gnas dag myi bder byas// rgyu rkye pa'an
101b6(mdo): dag su'i mthu// 'khor gyis myi dpogs the tsom na// rdzu 'phrul 'di dag ci slad du// bcom ldan thugs rjes bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
101b7(mdo): kyi rgyal po la bkal stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ltar 'khor 'di'i ring nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa bya sa ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba de sdod bskal pa grangs byed/ 
101b8(mdo): pa nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po sun sum ngogs pa dang / gzungs kyi rno grangs myed pa shi nang tu bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la khan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'i macu
102a1(mdo): 'od 'di btang bar khyod kyis zhes pamagyis zhig/ de skad ces bka' stsa lang pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ltand las langs te/ nam/ 
102a2(mdo): chags bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags mchis te/ sems can
102a3(mdo): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba thob pa dang / nad thams cad bsal ba dang / tshe ring por 'gyur ba dang / phyug cing 'byord pa dang / sdig pa myi dge'i las thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgrib pa zas
102a4(mdo): cad bsal ba dang / bsod nams dang rnam par bkar ba'i chos rnam pa thams cad spel ba dang / sa bon thams cad phun sumatsho rags pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad bskyab pa dang / 'dod pa
102a5(mdo): dang ren/ yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bshad par 'tshal da bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can gyis gas nang du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' su lad pa rigs kyi bu khyod snying
102a6(mdo): rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde' ba'i phyir sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab gyis myur du spros shig dang / nga dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang
102a7(mdo): pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyar ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa bskal pa bye ba grangs myed pa
102a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'das dbang po zhi bar gnas shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag dang sems can thams cad la shugs rje'i slad du shi nang tu rgyas pa zhugs rje chen po sogs pa byed/ 
102b1(mdo): ba'i gzungs 'di bshad de/ gser gi kha dog can gyi phyag gis bdag gi spyi bor byugs nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ngan pa'i sems can thams cad la phar pa dang bde ba chen po'i phyir/ 
102b2(mdo): gzungs sngags 'di zung shig ces bka' stsa la te/ bdag de'i dus las dang po la gnas pa las/ sngags kyi tshig 'di lan cig zos pas sa brgyad par gyur da te/ bdag de'i tshe na sems mgu ba dang
102b3(mdo): rangs pa rnyed pas smon lam 'di skad ces btab po// gal te bdag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba nus par 'gyur ba zhig na/ lus 'di nyid las phyag stong spyad stong mngon du phun sum
102b4(mdo): tshogs pa dang ldan par gyurd cig ces smon lam de skad btab/ ma thag tu lag pa stong dang myig stong yang lus la ldan par gyur da te/ phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ phyogs
102b5(mdo): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis so so nas 'od btang ba'i snang bas lus la reg par byas nas kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten pa gi khams tshad myed pa rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs
102b6(mdo): ba grangs myed pa'i thadas 'khobam pa po'i nang du/ gzungs 'di nyid yang dang yang du zos pa dang / gus pas 'dzind par gyur cing dga' ba dang / mgu ba tshang byed pa yang skyes pas bskal pa bye/ 
102b7(mdo): pa grangs myed par 'khor bar 'khor ba'i cha phra mo las shind tu 'das par gyurard pa tshun chad/ rtag par 'dzind cing 'don pas/ nam du yang 'chad la myi brjed par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyi tshig 'di 'dzind pa'i
102b8(mdo): tshig gi dbang gis/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar pad mo las rdzus te skye zhing ma'i mngal gyis ma gos par gyur to// gang yang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / 
103a1(mdo): dge bsnyen pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi thu mo dag 'don cing 'dzin par 'dod pas dang por sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed cing smon la 'di skad ces gdab zo/ phyag
103a2(mdo): 'tshal spyan ras / gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje che/ bdag gis chos rnams myur du rtogs par shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis myu rang du ye shes myig thob shog/
