164a4(mdo): cing lung bstadad pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod rtenadagacig gi nang du bcug ste/ srog shing bsgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bras kyi
164a5(mdo): mchod rtedad zhes bya'o// kang dag de la bkur sti rnam par byed pa de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
164a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// than dud 'gro skye gnas su gtogs par rnasas dang / gzhan yang thog chags kyi dges sna tshogs gang dag der 'dong pa de dag kyang byer myi ldog par 'gyur ro// yan grib mas pog na yang sos
164a7(mdo): su grol bar 'gyur na/ bkur sti mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci rkos te/ de'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par myi nus so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpos chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
164a8(mdo): dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lu'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu
164b1(mdo): dang bum dpa sa tshas byed pa dang / sa yam gas pa dang dngag can da btsas yan 'as la sadagasas 'gang gyu/ san 'dasams pa 'anas mams rgya
164b2(mdo): pa 'dud sa yad 'das la 'di ga ces gas / bcas la ngas 'gas mthu che pa 'das/ yid 'azhin gyi dang tha rin pa'i na po ga/ zung sag pa dang / thas pa ga
164b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag can yun cig tshogs das/ skad pa'i tshe smad pa'i dus na yid ka'i rgya no bu langod pa 'i 'di 'azung bar bya'o// rgyas par 'gyul/ thams ca thams cad ma bslan papa
164b4(mdo): 'ad 'dzadad pa'i sems can ched pa de'i skad bzhin 'brang zhing / rtag tu rgyud kyi' bar bsrung ba dang / bskyab ba dang / sra bar btum// thu bzhin su yongs su bsrung ba 'byin
164b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas la da pa/ thogs pa dag lem legs pa/ khyed kyis de ltar gyis shin/ rig sngags kyi rgyam ma yid bzhin gyi nom na rin po che 'di ngas byed
164b6(mdo): gtad do// / 'thags pa kun das gang 'dug pas 'di gapar gtsugator dum byed par spang ba// de bzhi gshegs pa moms cad kyi slong po dang dam tshan pa rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba sa su
164b7(mdo): tas sa nas su bya tu ga rad gsung ldan la d+ha ra Ni la ta yan srad tram// bod zha du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyi phung po gas pa pa rim tha mas kyi ma ngon/ 
165a1(mdo): ces bya ba'i gzungs meg pa ched ma las // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di dang 'das kyis mos la nus cig na bcom ldan 'das/ 
165a2(mdo): yul ma ga da na/ dri ma byed pa'i kun dga' ra ba na/ rin po che snang ba'i rdzing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
165a3(mdo): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldang dang / myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa mang po rnams dang / yul gyi myi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing
165a4(mdo): mdun du byas nas tha bra ga cig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'khorade'i nab de na/ bram ze chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu maHngas pa 'dzangs pa gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa// mthong na
165a5(mdo): dga' ba dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba dri myed legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la/ phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i
165a6(mdo): bsam pa dang ldan pa zhib mo// brtags pa sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtsod pa/ nor che la long spyod che ba/ phyag pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yid no// 
165a7(mdo): de nas bram ze chen po dri myed legs snang / bcom ldan 'das ka la ba deng song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang 'dug pas
165a8(mdo): mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin cen 'bum ri yang gsol// bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum yang gsol nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
165b1(mdo): kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sa tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi snum par gtugs chod la spyan 'dred na/ de'i slad du/ bcom
165b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis ka nang bar mdzad pa ci ga nang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dro myed legs sdang gis/ spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas cang myi gsung bar gyur da nas gnang ngo // de nas
165b3(mdo): bram ze chen po dra myed legs sdang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad snga ngas/ ca myi gsung bas / gnang bar rig nas/ de rings pa rings pas rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang
165b4(mdo): zhal zas dang yo byad dpa zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas/ bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal myed khang chen po dang / gzhal myed khang sna tshogs dang / me tog dang bdug pa khyer te
165b5(mdo): 'khor mang po dang / sil snyad dang pheg rdob pas/ bcom ldan/ 'das ka la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ dus la bab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
165b6(mdo): bram ze chen po dri ba myed legs sdang gis/ 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod la b.lan
165b7(mdo): bdag la kanang bar mdzad par cig dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze chen po dro myed legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te/ bka' su lad pa/ 'khor ji ltar lcags
165b8(mdo): pa thams cad dang chen po mdzad par 'gyung kyis tshung sheg/ de nas bcom yan 'das ba dan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'dan de las bzhengs ma thag du / bcom ldan 'das kyi su las/ 
166a1(mdo): 'od zer pa dad pa sa tshogs blang ste/ 'odi gzis gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te/ 
166a2(mdo): gzigs nas gshegs par ches so// de nas bram ze chen po dri myed legs snang gis mchod pa dang bkur sti chen pos mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs yul mdzeg par ched byas so// 'khor mang zon
166a3(mdo): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am mi dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang
166a4(mdo): phyug chen po dang / sred myed kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi des kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom la na 'das dang ha cang spyi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na/ bskyed
166a5(mdo): mos mal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod do// bskyed pos sa de'i napan/ mchod nyen da rnyis pa chen po zhig yod de zhig pa tsher mas gang ba/ rtsa dang shing dang / bya mas kun tu gang
166a6(mdo): phyag dang kyi phung po 'dra ba zhig yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dang kyi phung po des bu de yang / kun nas 'bar zhing 'od gzer 'bar ba/ kha don lnga
166a7(mdo): tshogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa legs so legs so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ltas bzla
166a8(mdo): ngo/ bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa ni yang khyod legs so// deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rtend rnying pa phyag dang gyi
166b1(mdo): phung po de lta bu de la/ yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/ lan gsum bskor ba mdzad do// nyid kyi sku las ma bza' bsil nas/ mchod rtend rnying pa phyag da kyi phung po de lta bu la gsold te/ bcom
166b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis mchi ma dbyung ba chen po phyung nas/ pa shums pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstand te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu 'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag 'thil na
166b3(mdo): bzhugs pa bzhin tu mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od gzer bkye ste/ mchod rtenang rnying
166b4(mdo): pa'i phung po der zhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de draka ya mtshan chen por gyurd cing yi chad de 'khod par gyur da to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'bar
166b5(mdo): snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der song ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
166b6(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsod to// bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan mchims gang bar bstand pa'i snga ltas gda' ba// bcom ldan 'das mi lags
166b7(mdo): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang tu zhu ba/ 'di skabs dbye bar rtsig nadang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na
166b8(mdo): rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtedang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rtend kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje
167a1(mdo): zhes bya ba snyed kyi dru gdul ring bsrel nams gnas so// chos kyi phung po brgya sa khri bzhi song gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bus mas bye gtil gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tod dang
167a2(mdo): ma yang de banan tu gnas po// pa da dang ga cos kyi nam zangs 'a gnas pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pam mtshad nyid du lung ba gad do// lagan rdo rdzob byed pa mangs 'di 'di spang ban
167a3(mdo): yod che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag ma rdo rje chos kyi nam grangs 'di ni phan yod che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas
167a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis cho kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// 
167a5(mdo): kha cig gis mi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob po// btsug gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// kha cig gis mir byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir bya 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cigs
167a6(mdo): ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstand pa 'thob bo// kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o// kha cig gis nis gnyis so// 
167a7(mdo): kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa/ bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha zag gis ni sa drug pa'o// kha cig gis nis bdun pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o// kha cin
167b1(mdo): gis ni sa dgu pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyu da pa'o// kha cig gis ni pha rol du tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs so// bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa la thob cing dri ma dang
167b2(mdo): bral ba dang / ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar gyurd to// de nas gnod sbyin ka sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur da te/ bcom
167b3(mdo): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi nam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang / phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thos na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phu dud
167b4(mdo): dang bkur stin nad tu yang po bgyid pa 'gyur ba/ lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan pa/ dpa 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
167b5(mdo): lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ 
167b6(mdo): lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dku'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de
167b7(mdo): rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sden pas klags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig chos kyi nam kram
167b8(mdo): 'di lta bu/ 'dzind pa de dag phyogs bcu 'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bul bye ba khrig khrig til ge gang bu snyed dku bcu rtsa dku dang / phyogs re re li de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
168a1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur zhi pa nyi ma zhag gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang
168a2(mdo): me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen pa des
168a3(mdo): phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog 'phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang
168a4(mdo): na bza' dang / lA ba lu ba dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro// phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin rin po che bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan la
168a5(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyi/ dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa
168a6(mdo): de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang / ya mchod du gyur da nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rtend rnying pa phyag dang dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
168a7(mdo): byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po stond pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na de rjes 'di skad ces gsol da to// 
168a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dang kyi phung po bgyis pa las/ rin po che'i mchod rtend du gdal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni phyag dang ki phung po chen
168b1(mdo): po ma yin gyi/ 'di na ri po me lnga bdun las byas pa rin po che'i mchod rte dad chen ma yin no// lag na rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par spyod pas stond pas nus par 'amang nga
168b2(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyin bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bsres kyi chu pa' mchog rten rnams ni / 'jigs pa 'am dgyes pas gyi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mang po'i lung ltar dges par 'gyur
168b3(mdo): 'on kyang sems cad rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par spyon pa snang ba las kyang nub par 'gyur ro// lag ma rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / 
168b4(mdo): dmyal ba la gzhos pa/ shinang tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin da zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par myi byed de/ rgyude
168b5(mdo): dang tudang des dam pa mchos nub bo// lag na rdo rje dem phyir ngami myig 'di gnyis mchims kang la de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad kyang mchim byung ngo // das pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
168b6(mdo): lta bu ni nub par 'gyur kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'i mchod rte dad ri la gtogs kyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod kyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod
168b7(mdo): sbyin gyi sde dpod chen po la ga na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsold to// gang zhig chos kyi nam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog da / dge ba'i rtsa ba co nig skye bar 'gyur// bcom yan
168b8(mdo): kyis bka' sa lad pa/ la ka da de dze kang zhig chos kyi nam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rtend kyi nang tu bzhag pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'dur
169a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin kyis brlabs pa'i mchod rtend du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod
169a2(mdo): rtend du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tong dang / spyan gyi mchod rtend du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// kang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rtenang
169a3(mdo): thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan don po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang / dril pu g.yer ka dra bar
169a4(mdo): 'brel pa dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang char kab kyi gan dgas dang / dril bu bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa zas
169a5(mdo): cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyis rlang sa dang / bden pa dang dam tshig gis/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang
169a6(mdo): dag mchod rte dad de la su dud dang / sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyid myi ldog par 'grum zhing / bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// phyag
169a7(mdo): 'chal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis ma dang myed pa la thug pa la sogs pa rnams las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par
169a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// gnas gang na mchod rten nas gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu ka des pa'i sa phyogs de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der klu myi srun pas
169b1(mdo): kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags myi srun pa 'am/ bdug pas kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya myi srun/ 
169b2(mdo): ba dang / ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mong dang / sha spang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sdig sprul dang / sbrang bu mchu gsum pa dang / mchu nges dang / rta baR+Ya'i 'jigs pa yang mya
169b3(mdo): 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul bdug pas kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / dad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa yang myi 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
169b4(mdo): 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang 'dre dang / brjed byed kyi jigs pa yang myi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang ma yin
169b5(mdo): nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / phol myig dang ldog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa mdzes kyang myi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong ba tsam
169b6(mdo): gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mu'i
169b7(mdo): nad kyis kyang nam yang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ dus ma yid par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar myi 'gyur/ tug gis ma yin pa mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang chus kyang rnams kyang myi tshugs
169b8(mdo): par 'gyur/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas nam yang myi tshugs par 'gyur/ byang stem gyis 'jigs pa yang myi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po
170a1(mdo): bzhi yang rtag tu rgyud myi 'chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyob par byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag kyang rtog par rgyun myi 'chad par srung ba dang skyob pa dang
170a2(mdo): sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / 'jug rings chen po yang nying mtshan du mthun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par
170a3(mdo): mdangs/ myi 'phrog cing legs pa kho dang chad kyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rtend de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas
170a4(mdo): dus gsum du 'ong ngo // yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rtend dang gzugs brnyad de'i drung du dus gsudu 'ong ngo // bstod par byed pa spod par byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang
170a5(mdo): pa brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cigatu rgyun myi 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan gyi drung tu nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod
170a6(mdo): pa 'ang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so// mchod rted dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'i 'am/ dol 'am shing gi ni
170a7(mdo): dngul gyi 'am/ gser gyi 'am/ zangs kyi byed pa dang dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin pa rlab par 'gyu
170a8(mdo): ro// 'phar dang them sras dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i 'greng ba dang / bkra shis dang gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang ring po che sna bdun gyi rang na n+da/ 
170b1(mdo): du 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs gnas par 'gyur mo// de bzhin gshegs pa khams cad tu phyan gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'i mchod rten ngon po che dang / sku gdung na
170b2(mdo): snying po 'i mchod rted dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og byin gyi gnas kyi lus kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su bzub bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
170b3(mdo): la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos kyi nam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur gyur da// bcom ldan 'das kyisel bka' stsal pa
170b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snying po gsang b.ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag mardo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin
170b5(mdo): kyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzind kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzung kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par cig nang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
170b6(mdo): bka' sul dpa / lag na de'i nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byod pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ka bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcol ldan 'das thams cad kyi
170b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum dag ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du phrul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi ba ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos
170b8(mdo): kyi rnam grangs yin no// / nams s+yAd d+hi ka nan sarba ta thA ga ta nAn/ au bu bi ba na ba re ba tsa Te/ tsu lu tsu lu/ dA ra d+ha ra/ sar b+ha ta thA ga ta p+ta tu dA re pad mas b+ha ba ti/ dza ya ba re/ a tsu le/ 
171a1(mdo): sA ra ta ba ga ta drAng pa tsag kra pra pa pa ta na bad dz+re/ po dum man/ a lang ka ra la a lang kr-i te/ sarba ta thA ka tA ma dIs Sh+Te te/ b+ho dA yA b+ho dA yA/ bo dA da bI dIn/ bud d+ha / bud d+ha/ saH/ 
171a2(mdo): nu tsun sam tho / mal mal/ tsa lan tu la pham pa rad daM/ sam pA lA bi ka te/ hu ma su / sa mashog 'i ka te/ sa rba ta rba ga te bI ta la yang phrad/ sas b+ha gsas b+hA ba/ ta thA ba ta sa N+ya / 
171a3(mdo): ni mud rje/ bud d+he su bud d+he sa rba ta thA ga ta/ a d+his Sh+Thi ta dA tra ka d+he sA tra/ sa ma ya ma d+his r+thi te sA hA/ sarba ta thA ka ta hri drA la pA tra mud dre sa ta/ su pra tisaThA ta sU be ta thA ka ta ma d+hisi \u0f7f
171a4(mdo): hu ru tu ru/ hum hum sA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tauSh+Ti Sha da tu mu dad drA ni sa parba ta thA ka ta na/ sarba du bi pU shi ta a d+hi saSh+Ti te/ da hum hum sA hA// / bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsre/ 
171a5(mdo): gyi za ma tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re kun nas// de bzhin gshegs 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa rgu gshegs nas bcom
171a6(mdo): ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la/ shag kya thub pa sems can thams cad kyi don du/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter 'azhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin
171a7(mdo): kyis brlabs pa legs so legs so// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / byin gyi rlabs yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya
171a8(mdo): gzungs 'di stond par byed dam/ mchod rtend kyi nang du 'jog gas/ gzugs brnyad kyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rjes su wa/ 
171b1(mdo): nang bzhugs par 'gyung ngo // thams cad tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byid kyi rlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ba/ de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / cis pan ma chod nyen rnying pa byag dang gyi zung za
171b2(mdo): lta bu dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin khyimatshan nyind tu mngod pangs par 'phags shing/ 'pha dang legs par rnas par 'byam pa dang / 'khor lo'i 'greng ba dang / bkrags dang gnas par 'a
171b3(mdo): ro// bcom sad 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo lag na de rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyid dang / dri ba dang / na mkhal 'dri/ 
171b4(mdo): dang mya 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lA dang kyibacas pa'i 'jig rted bcom ldan 'das kyis ka sungs pa la yi rang ste/ mngon par bstod do// 
171b5(mdo): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gas rang bsrel gyi ba ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po la mdol// rdzogs
171b6(mdo): rgyag kyis 'an po su red 'dra bad de dang / bu chen legs par byas so// 'phags pa snang brgyad ces bya ba'i rigs sngags kyi mdo// sangs rgyas dang bya
171b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig da / bcom ldan 'das pi ya dang ma yangs pa can na/ 'khor dam pazhi phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dang
171b8(mdo): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po thogs pa myed pa zhes bya ba/ dge slong gi 'khor der 'dus par gyur da te/ 'dug pa las langs nas sangs rgyas
172a1(mdo): ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 'di dag ni/ gcig gis gcig bskyed de/ 
172a2(mdo): thog ma ma mchis pa nas rgyud ma chad pa'o// de la shes pa dang ldan pa ni nyung / myi shes pa ni mang / sangs rgyas la dran pa ni nyung / 'dre gdon la zhen pa ni mang/ tshe ring ba ni nyung / tshe thung ba ni med
172a3(mdo): shes rab can ni nyung / gti mug cad ni mang / btsan phyug pa ni nyung / dbul 'phongs pa ni mang/ mnyen nges pa ni nyung / khro gtum pa ni mang/ drang po na nyung / yon po ni mang // chos bzhin byed pa ni
172a4(mdo): nyung / chos khrims bzhin myi byed pa ni mang bas/ skye bo zhes cad chos bzhin myi byed de/ khral dud ches pas 'bangs kyang sdug par gyur te// // de ltar log par lta ba la yid ches
172a5(mdo): pas 'di 'dra bar nyon mongs par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis log par lta ba'i sems can rnams la/ yang dag par bltas pa'i chos bstand te/ sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs
172a6(mdo): pa las grol zhing tha dad pa mdzad du gsold zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ shi nad tu legs po ni nang tu legs so// thogs pa myed pa khyod snying rje chen po dang ldan pas
172a7(mdo): sems can log par lta ba rnams kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i chos zhus pa bsam gyis myi khyab po// rtag par nyon la yid la zug shig dang / gdab dang sa yang snang brgyad kyi mdo/ 
172a8(mdo): sdes bye ste/ de la bstand par bya'o// 'di ltar ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs so// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs so// da ltar pa'i bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung
172b1(mdo): so// gnas dang sa'i ba par phyi'i mchog gtso ba/ dam pa thams cad las 'phags pamo// phyi zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa/ drang po sems la g.yo spu byed cing / lus kyis yang dag par drang bar byed pa
172b2(mdo): ni phyo zhes bya ste/ yang dag pa'i chos spyod cing rtag tu drang po'i las byed pa ni/ phyi zhes bya'o// de bas dpyis ni chos spyod par 'gyur la/ chos kyis ni kyi lus la blar 'gyur ro// phyis ni chos la brten pas
172b3(mdo): 'phags par 'gyur ro// thogs pa byed pa'i sems can thams cad ni/ myi lus thob nas kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs myi byed de/ yang dag pa la rgyab kyis 'phyogs shing sgyu ma la lta ste/ sdig pa sna tshogs
172b4(mdo): byed do// gal te gang zhig gis mdo sde 'di thos ste log pa kyi b+he dang dra sdig pa kun las krol zhing tha rad te/ sdug bsngal gyi marko da las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lal srung zhing bskyabs pa
172b5(mdo): dang / gdod bgegs byed pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / dus ma'i na par blo bur du myi 'chi ste/ 'di la yid ches pas/ de 'dra'i dpal thob par gyur to// gzhan yang thogs pa byed
172b6(mdo): pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig/ log par lta zhing log pa la yid ches na bdud ldig cad dang / su mu stegs can dang / ltas ngan mang po dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pas rtag tu 'tsha
172b7(mdo): zhing/ glo bur gyi nad kyis thebs pa dang / spang ba dang / shu ba ma rungs pa 'byung ste/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gal te dge ba'i ga shes gnyen dang 'phrad de/ snang brgya
172b8(mdo): kyi mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags na/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pas myi tshugs shing nad rnams kyang 'tsho ba dang / mthu stobs dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags na/ bsod nas
173a1(mdo): 'di dag go// sems can gang zhig 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug che zhing ser sna dang 'phra dog byed pa dag/ mdo sde 'di la yid ches ste/ sti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas nas/ 
173a2(mdo): lar gsum grags na/ gti mug las rdzogs pa'i nyes pa thams cad 'byang zhing byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos skal pa yang yod pa yid no// 
173a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis 'du byed kyi las ci byed kyang rung ste/ sngar mdo sde 'di lan gsum klag go// 'di lta ste/ khab khyim rtsig gas sa rko 'am/ khang khyim byed dang
173a4(mdo): khang khyim chen po byed dam/ khyams sam/ tshang bang ngam/ dbakad pa 'am/ sgo 'dod dam/ chu dong ko 'am/ zab rtsig kum/ rgud dang / rang thag 'dzugs sam/ bang mdzod byed dam
173a5(mdo): phyugs kyi bres sam/ ra ba byed na/ nyi ma'i gza' 'amazla ba'i gshed dang / tshang rkun dang / lo skong dang / 'brugarje dang / sa lA dang / lha'i sa dang / 'brug sngon po dang / 
173a6(mdo): stag dkar po dang / bya dmar po dang / hen bu dang / lha drug dang / lo skod kyi lha bcu gnyis las stsogs pa/ lha dang gdon thams cad kyis gnod par myi byed de/ de las 'byol zhing 'bros so// 
173a7(mdo): de byas na bkra shis chen por 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad myed pa yang 'bab po// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byas te las byas na/ khang khyim gzhang brtan pa dang / bcan phyug pa dang / dor 'dra bar
173a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// gal te g.yul ngor 'gro 'am/ rje blas la 'gro 'am/ tshong byed du 'gro na yang / khye spogs phyind cing nyes pa myi 'byung ste/ btsan zhing dang pa dang / bu tsha brgya stong du 'phel ba dang
173b1(mdo): pa ni byams ma ni sre zhu che/ pho ni chu gang che/ mo na srun pa dang / phu nu dang khyo shug mdza' zhing 'dum pa dang / re zhing smon pa thams cad legs shing myi 'grub pa myed do// sems can gang zhig gyod la
173b2(mdo): thogs pa 'am/ bcon tu zin pa gang kas mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags na/ de ma thag de las tha dad par 'gyur ro// sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzind nam klog
173b3(mdo): ka ma/ 'don tam/ gzhan la ston dang de ni byim yod pas kyang myi tshugs te/ ri la gnas na yang stag dang spyang gi la spogs te/ kacan zan ma rungs pa gnod pa byed par myi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lus
173b4(mdo): srung bar 'gyur zhing bskyab pa dang / mtha ra bla na myed pa'ibyang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi buHgang zhig pha ma shi nas sdig pa'i las kyis/ sems cad dmyal bar
173b5(mdo): ltung ste/ sdug bsngal tshad myed pa myong ba las/ de'i bus mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags na/ de'i pha ma sems canadamyal ba las tha rad te/ mtho ris kyi lung skye zhing / sangs rgyas
173b6(mdo): mthong ba dang / chos mthong ba dang / myi skye ba'i bzod pa dang / byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// thogs pa myed pa/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/ de'i tshe na dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma zhig
173b7(mdo): log par lta ba la yid myi ches te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad pas mdo sde 'di yi ger bris nas/ gzungs su bzung ste/ klog pa dang / kha don du byas te/ ci dka' nyas byas pa dang / yang dag pa la
173b8(mdo): yid ches shing / sbyin pa yang spyod pas zag pa byed pa'i spu grub ste/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub du grub nas/ kun tu 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
174a1(mdo): su 'gyur ro// bskal pa ni 'ga'ag chen po zhes bya'o// yul gyi myir ni mtha' byed pa zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i myi thams cad kyang / byang chub lce/ smad pa'i spyad pa dmyigs su
174a2(mdo): myed pa'i chos spyod do// rigs kyi bu dag sngang brgyad kyi mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu gling na bzhugs pa'i gnas de ni/ byang chub sems dpal brgyad dang / tshangs pa lha'i rgyal po dang / 'phrul dang ldan pa'i thams
174a3(mdo): cad kyis mdo sde 'di la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar spos dang / me tog gis mchod par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis sems can rnams la/ mdo sde 'di stond cing 'chang ngam
174a4(mdo): yang dag pa'i don khong du chud cing rtogs na/ des ni sangs rgyas kyi cho sku chos kyi thugs yin par rig par bya ste/ de ni shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa'i myog kos rtag tu zad myi shes pa'i gzu/ 
174a5(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ste/ gzugs kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pas/ de ni gzugs dam
174a6(mdo): pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// nakhas rtag tu 'ad phyo shes pa'i spa rnam pa sa tshogs yos kyang sgra nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sla ste/ de ni gsung dbyangs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
174a7(mdo): bya'o// sngas rtag tu zad myi shes pa'i drirnam pa sna tshogs sdom yang / dro nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dri yin pas/ de ni spos brtsegs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// lus rtag tu
174a8(mdo): zad myi shes pa'i ro rnam pa sna tshogs myong yang / ro stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro yin pas/ de ni chos kyi dbyangs de bzhin gshegs pa bya'o// lus kyis rtag tu zad myi shes pa'i reg bya rnam pa sna chog
174b1(mdo): tsho ba yang / reg pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg bya ste/ de ni ye shes kyi snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// yid kyis rtag tu zad bya shes pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la bye brag 'byed kyang / chos nyid/ 
174b2(mdo): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos yin pas/ de ni chos kyi snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu dbang po drug po mngon tu snang ba de dag thams cad kyis tshig tu brjod pa ni shes te/ gal te dge
174b3(mdo): ba'i tshig smras la/ dge ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor na 'phags par 'gyur ro// gal te tshig sdig pa smras na/ sdig pa'i 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor te/ ngan song du ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bas na/ 
174b4(mdo): dge ba dang myi dge ba la ni yid myi ches su myi rung ngo // gzhan yang thogs pa myed pa lus dang sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod yin la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcu gnyis kyang yin te/ 
174b5(mdo): thog ma byed pa nas glags kyang / zad byi shes te spu li nyag sa/ tsam yang mgod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo sde ni rnam par shes pa gcig gi sems yin te/ rang bzhin
174b6(mdo): mthong ba dag gis ni shes par nus kyi/ tshig tu brjod pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ ma rabs rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu kang gis mdo sde 'di glegs te/ don rtogs
174b7(mdo): pa dag ni lus dang sems sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod yin par rtogs so// gang bdag gi sems sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dngos po yin par ma gtogs te/ de la rmongs shing bskrad na rgyud kun tu 'khor zhing
174b8(mdo): ngan song du ltung ba dang / gzhan sdug bsngal gyi rgya mchod 'bying ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mtshan tsam yang myi zos so// byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa myed pas yang sangs rgyas la gsol pa
175a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtend na gnas pa'i mying 'di dag ni/ skye ba dang / 'chi ga/ las su bam 'dzid pas/ skye ba'i tshe na yang nyis myi 'das ste/ dus rang pa dang skye'o// shi na yang ci
175a2(mdo): ma myi 'dam ste/ dus la bab byan 'chi ba'i slad du/ shing bgyid pa 'ab zhig nyi ma bzang po dang sbyar te/ shing pa bgyi yang shing bgyid pa'i 'og tu gnod par 'gyur ba dang / dbul 'phongs pa yang mar la
175a3(mdo): rabs chad pa yang myi nyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das log par lta ba'i sems can dag ni/ ci'i slad du de ltar gyurd pa ma 'tshal na/ de yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod cing / byi nad ci log las bsal tu
175a4(mdo): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge'o dge'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can shi ba dang skye ba dang / shid byed pa dris pa legs so// khyod kyis legs
175a5(mdo): bar nyon cig/ khyod la bstand par bya'o// shes rab kyi tshul dang las chen po chos gnas ma yangs par rtag tu bab+ba/ nyi zla yangs pas rtag tu gsal te/ lo gcig bzhin du dge ba dang / 
175a6(mdo): legs pa ni tha dad pa myed do// rigs kyi bu myil rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems cad kun la bu dang 'dra bang snying brtse bas myi'i dbang por gyur te
175a7(mdo): pha ma lta bur gyu da pas skye bo'i chos su lo skor gyi yi ge/ legs zhing zhes bya ba byas nas/ thams cad kyi dus dang zla tshigs shes par bya ste/ nyi ma mnyam pa dang gang ba dang / grub pa dang / sud pa dang
175a8(mdo): dbang ba dang / gsal ba dang / 'dzind pa dang / g.yang za ba dang / zhi ba dang / gsod par bya ba zhes bstan te/ gled pa dag de la yid ches te/ de bzhin byas na nyes pa las tha rad pa myed do// 
175b1(mdo): gzhan yang bon pos bcad pa dang / gnod pa dang / gsad par bya zhes tha snyad smras nas/ lha dang gdon la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ bdag la gnod pa dang nyon mongs pa'i kha lo byed par zad de
175b2(mdo): 'di lta bu dag ni gnam gyi dus chod dang / sa'i gzhung lugs las 'gal zhing / nyi zla 'od la rgyab kyis 'phyogs pa yin te/ rtag tu mun khung du mthoms nas/ yang dag pa'i lam gces pas/ yangs pa
175b3(mdo): las log nas/ log pa'i lam du song bsam cad yang phyind kyi log ces so// rigs kyi bu kang btsas pa'i tshe mdo sde lan gsum klags na/ nyes pa ci yang myi 'byung ste/ shes pa dang yid gzhungs shi
175b4(mdo): shes rab rdo ba dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / da blo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// shi ba'i chedelan gsum klags na/ nyes pa ci yang myi 'byung ste/ legs pa
175b5(mdo): grangs myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nyi ma yang rtag tu bzang / zla ba yang rtag tu bzang / lo yang rtagatu bzang / yang dag par nyes pa myed kyis/ nam yo byad 'byor dpa
175b6(mdo): na shing btang ngo // shod btang ba'i che/ mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags ra/ bkra shos chen por 'gyur te/ bsod nams chad myed pa thob cing / rigs che zhing btsan pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / shi nas kyang
175b7(mdo): 'phags pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chung btab pa yang / sha ra dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gar yang rung ste/ gang bde ba myi'i gnas myi'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba de la/ 'dre
175b8(mdo): gdod yang dga' bar 'gyur te// mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags te dur btab na/ nam du yang nyes dmyigs myi 'byung zhing / phyag pa dang / myi 'phan pa dang / bkra shis chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
176a1(mdo): ldan 'das kyis don de ngag bzlas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// skye ba'i nyi ma 'phang la dge/ 'chi ba'i dus kyang 'a'ang 'a ste/ skye 'pho'i dus da 'di grags na/ phan pa ched pa
176a2(mdo): thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba rtag tu bzang zhing gsal// lo yang rtag tu rab tu bzang // mdo sde grags te shid byas na/ gzhi ru legs shing dge bar 'gyur// de'i tshe 'khor de na myi bdun khri bdum stong/ 
176a3(mdo): snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos ras/ sems rnam par grol te/ log par lta ba spangs nas/ yang dag pa la phyogs shing // sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi skal pa thob ste/ the tsom zad nas/ bla dgye/ 
176a4(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po// de nas byang chub se mas dpa' thogs pa myed pas/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rabs thams cad ni phan tshun yol bar dus
176a5(mdo): bzhi dang / zla tshigs brgyad kyang mngon par bsal lo// chu dang me brgyud pa las thams cad gsos so// mo phrad pa las bu cha skye ste/ 'di yang gnam sa'i kezhu lugs yin te/ 
176a6(mdo): tshul gyis de ltar 'jug pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// rigs kyi bu gang glen pa shes rab byed pa ni bor la yid ches te/ 'akra shis su re bas mo 'debs kyi/ dge ba myi byed pas/ sdig pas
176a7(mdo): tshogs byed pa'i rkyedad kyis/ shi nas phyir yang myi lus thob pa ni sen mo'i steng nas yod pa dang 'dra'o// sems cad dmyal bar ltung ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song du skyes pa mi/ sa chen po dang dz+ra
176a8(mdo): 'o// rigs kyi bu gal te gnyed cig byed na/ chu dang me ste gcig la gcig 'phrod ces ma lta bar dbang tang dang / tshe rabs rtsi ba'i yi ke bltas na dbang tang che chung mngon te/ gnyen du 'gyur myi 'gyur yang
176b1(mdo): mdzan do// gzag sa yin pa ma nyid par mna' ga 'dilan gsus grags das/ rlung ma thangs na/ 'dan migs pa'i steng du legs par 'grub la snang ba'i sring du gsal bas ba san pa sa mas
176b2(mdo): pa dang / bcad pa dang / bu ma 'bad pa dang / 'di bzhungs pa dang / shes rab rdo ba dang / shes pa dang lan nang smra rtsal che ba dang / sro ku me bar 'gyur te/ shinang tu ba mashis pas tho zung du phyi
176b3(mdo): zhing bsod napas dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// de'i mi byang chub sems dpa' brgyad cig/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis/ rtag tu phyi'i nang sa gnas te/ thams cad dang / mthun pas/ 
176b4(mdo): spyod kyang / log pa ni bcom/ yang dag par gzhung ni 'dzugs/ ni 'od pa bzhi las rgal te/ rnam par grol ba brgyad thob pa'i myong la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ba ta ho zagapa
176b5(mdo): zad pa sna/ byang chub sems dpa' len na/ kar zag pa zad pa hA/ byang chub sems dpa' ko'u 'bod do zag pa zad pa hA / byang chub sems dpal su byin shin zag pa zad pa hA
176b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpal ma la yan zag pa zad pa da/ byang chub sems dpa' min ne pa zag pa 'ad pa tra/ byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs rtogs byed pa lag pa med pa hA/ byang chub sems dpa' cis
176b7(mdo): yang chags pa myed pa de la 'dzin zag pa 'ad pa hA/ byang chub sems dpal 'di brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas mang po la gzungs su bzung ba mi
176b8(mdo): rig sngags 'dis ka ba snang brgyad kyi mdo 'di 'chang dam/ 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dod pa la nyes pa dang / 'jigs pa nas du yang myi 'byung zhing / myi dge ba thams cad kyis gnod pa srung
177a1(mdo): zhing / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rigs sngags 'di 'bul lo// / 'di lta ste/ a ka ni/ ni ka Ni/ a b+hi la man ta le/ man Ta le// 
177a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sdig par sems dpa' gang zhig chos smra ba la/ log par byed pa 'ongs na rigs sngags 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus mtha'
177a3(mdo): myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du snang brgyad kyi mdo zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po bye zhing bstan te/ rtogs shing khong du
177a4(mdo): chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis mkhyend cing gzigs pa la the bcom yongs su ka cad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa ka' su med pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod
177a5(mdo): rtogs par nyon cig/ khyod la snang brgyad kyi mdo bstan par/ bya'o// brgyad ces bya ba ni rnam grangs so// snang nasabya ba ni gsal bar bya'o// theg pa chen po 'dus ma byas rgya
177a6(mdo): chos gsal bar rig cing / rnam par shes pa brgyad rgyu dang / rkye rang spyong pa dmyigs su myed pa 'dam par 'byed pa'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rgyu dang rkye nad snang zhing gsal ba'i spyan gyis
177a7(mdo): mdo sder gyu dad pas/ snang brgyad kyi mdo zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa brgyad ces bya ba ni dbang po drag ni rnam par shes pa drug ste/ myig ni gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa/ na bal+li'i rnam par shes
177a8(mdo): pa/ sA ni dri'i rnam par shes pa/ lce ni de'i rnam par shes pa/ lus ni reg bya'i rnam par shes pa/ yid ni bye brag 'byed pa'i rnam par shes pa ste/ kun bzhi 'arnam par shes pa dang / 
177b1(mdo): su sa ma sa # bya pas rgyam pa ma rgya nga nas
177b2(mdo): yid kyi rnam par shes pa brgyad de/ rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa ba stong zhing ci yang myed par rtogs na/ myig gnyis 'od snang ba'i gnas yin par shes te/ 'od snang ba'i gnam du de bzhin gshegs pa
177b3(mdo): stodang to// kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas las ni mdo sde mang ga ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni mdo sde chen po 'byung ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnapa las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177b4(mdo): phyi nad pa'i 'grel pa'i mdo dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs pas ni sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od gzer gyis thal le bong mtha' myed par snang bar byas nas/ mun dag thas
177b5(mdo): cad kyang 'od gzed kyis snang bar byas/ sems cad dmyal ba/ thams cad kyang / zhi ste sdug bsngal las za dad nas/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyurd to// 
177b6(mdo): de'i tshe 'khor de na byang chub sems dpal 'argya zhi bzhi stong snyed/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas su grub nas nyi zla 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas su ston to// na ba gnyis ni sgra thos pa'i gang+gA/ 
177b7(mdo): yin te/ sma zos pa'i gnam du tshad myed pa de bzhin gshegs pa stod to// sA gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi spos kyi gnam yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi spos kyi gnam du/ spos brtsegs pa de bzhin gshe
177b8(mdo): pa spyod to// kha dang lce ni chos kyi ro'i kan ma yin te/ chos kyi ro'i gnam du chos kyi ngo'i de bzhin gshegs pa stodad to// lus ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnam yin te/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi
177b9(mdo): kanam du rnam par snang badzad lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rnam par snang mdzad 'od ke zar gyi sangs rgyas dang / rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan gyi sangs rgyas su stond to// yid kyi
178a1(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i gnam yin te/ rnam par gyi rtog pa'i garab tu/ myi g.yo ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'od gzeng chen pol de bzhin gshegs pa stond to// sems ni chos kyi dbyings kyi
178a2(mdo): gnam yin te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnam du stong pa'i rgyal ba zhes bya ba mtshan yang nam mkhal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to// bskal pa chen
178a3(mdo): po'i myong ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya/ yul gyi mying ni mtha' myed pa zhes bya ste/ de na gnas pa'i myi thams cad kyang bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba myed pas/ rtsod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob po// dge slong
178a4(mdo): pa dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyed pa dang / dge bsnyenadam drug khri drug stong na/ gzungs chen po thob par gyur to// da lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
178a5(mdo): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang myi ma yin pa las rdzogs grangs myed pa ni/ chos la chos kyi myig rnam par dag pa thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa/ 
178a6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang zhig yig gcad ngam thabs thob pa'i nyen par ram/ khang khyim gsar du brtsig pa'i nyen par mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags na/ bkra shis chen por 'gyur zhing bsod
178a7(mdo): napas tshad myed pa 'thob po// rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di lan gcig klags na/ mdo sde thams cad lan cig klags pa dang 'dra'o// mdo sde 'di lan cig bris na/ mdo sde thams cad bris pa dang 'dra'o// 
178a8(mdo): 'di'i bsod nams ni dpag tu myed brjod du myed de/ nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mtha' myed de/ myo des 'phags pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mtha' myed
178b1(mdo): pa 'di lta rig par gyis shig/ sems can gang zhig chos la ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba ni/ mdo sde 'di thos na mdo sde 'dini sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no// zhes srung ba 'drems te
178b2(mdo): myi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba ma rungs pa rnams dang / nag khrag kun nas 'dzag pa/ brtsog cing gnas pa kun gyis myi 'dod pa ni rad kyis thebs shing shi nas kyang mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar
178b3(mdo): lung ste/ steng gi me ni 'og tu phal/ 'og ki me ni steng du phal te/ mdung dang shaka tis lus la btsags pa dang / kha nas sngags khu rdzogs pa dang / rtsa dang nus pa yang zhig nyams te/ nyin zhag gcigs/ 
178b4(mdo): lan bdud khri ni 'chi/ lan bdud khri ni 'tsho ste/ suka bas dal chen po rgyun gyi 'chad par 'byung ngo // de yang mdo sde 'di dal skur ma 'debs pa'i phyir de 'dra ba zhig myong ngo // de nas
178b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis ldog sa de dag tshigs su bcad de bka' du lad pa/ sus ne ye nas yod pa'i lus/ yan lag yang ye nas pa// skye yang ye nas rang skyes te// rgas kyang
178b6(mdo): le ras rang nas so// shi yang le pa rang na'o// ring por 'dod kyang ring myi 'gyur// thung bar 'dod kyang zung gyi 'gyur// bde skyid khyod kyis rang myong ste// yang dag log pa khyod kyi dbang // 'du
178b7(mdo): byed las dag gang byed pa// kazhar la ma dri mdo sde lhogs// dam nam zha zha'i bar du yang // lam thob chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas 'khor yang po
178b8(mdo): thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur sems yid gsal bas thob nas/ rab tu dga' mgu yi rangs te/ thams cad kyis mtshan dang mtshan ma yin pa thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyis mkhyend cing gzigs pa la
179a1(mdo): gzugs/ sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa la rtogs kyang zhugs pa yod / rtogs pa yang byed/ mthong ba yang byed/ shes pa yang byed/ ros gcig kyang sa ma
179a2(mdo): pa re/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dben pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o// 'phags pa sngang brgyad ces bya ba rigs sngags kyi mdo// / rdzogs so// 
179a3(mdo): rgya kang skad du/ a pa rA mye ta a yu ka ny+dzan nam sa tA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyed/ 
179a4(mdo): ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa chus ni dag na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ 'dze ta'i mal 'gon byed zas sbyin gyi kun dga'ang ban
179a5(mdo): dag slong sa rgya zag byed dang 'a gsas kyi dag slong gad/ 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sadapa' chen po yang smon gabs kaci tu bzhugs te/ denas
179a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho nung gyu dad pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shar da phyogs na yon tan dpag tu byed lang brdzogs pa zhes bya ba 'i 'jig rten dkyi khams yod de/ de na ma
179a7(mdo): dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa sha da tu rnam par gdon skye ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing sbyong ba sems can
179a8(mdo): rnamapa mtham med to// nyan cig 'das dpas shin dung smos pas kyi// sgrub kau de dag la la 'jig yang bar bstan to// de seM sa
179b1(mdo): dpal sems nan gang gis che dpag tu myed pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi gzhung 'di bris sam/ 'drir bcug kam/ mtshan tsam thos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 
179b2(mdo): klog pa nas bam por byas shing khyim na 'chang la/ me tog dang gdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang / byug pas mchod na/ de dag tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya par 'gyur ro// yang 'jam dpal mes
179b3(mdo): can gang gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu byed pa shind tu rnam par gnod myi ba'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos na/ de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel lo// sems can ga
179b4(mdo): tshe zad pa rnams de'i mtshan 'dzind na de dag gi tshe yang rnam pa ma'aphel lo// de lta bas na 'jam dpal tshe ring por rtsol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos/ tshe dpag tu myed
179b5(mdo): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dri ra 'jug pa de dag la yon tan gyi legs pa/ 'di rnams su 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das che dang ye shes
179b6(mdo): dpag tu myed pa shind tu rnam par gdon myi za'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ au sarba sa ra skAr pa ri shud d+he/ d+harma te ga ga na sa mud dgA te/ sarba
179b7(mdo): shud d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ra~M pa de mA hA/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ su gang gis bris pa dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / bris shing bam por byas la
179b8(mdo): 'tshang ba dang / klog pa de/ tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya par 'gyur ro// 'di nas zhi 'phos dab kyang yon tan dpag tu myed par rdzogs pa'i 'jig rte dad kyi khams/ che dpag tu myed pa'i de
180a1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bya'o// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu spyad pa shin tu rnam par gdon gyi ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal so// 
180a2(mdo): tad ya hA/ oM sa rba sa pa ska ra pa ri shud d+he/ dAng ma te ka ka da sa sud dgal te/ sa b+ha la la khe shud d+he ma ha na ya pa pi pa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgengs pa gcig
180a3(mdo): dbyangs gcig tu tshe dpag tu myed pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gdon myi za'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad yaH
180a4(mdo): oM sarba sang skA ra/ pa ri shud ste/ d+har sa te/ ka ka na sa rbadad dka' te/ sA bA ba bi shud d+he sa ha na ya pa ri pa re swA tA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dgongs pa
180a5(mdo): gcig cing dbyangs cig tu/ che dpag tu myed pa'i mdo 'di gsu ngas so// bcom ldan 'das che dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shin tu rnam par gdon myi za'i rgyal po de bzhin gshes pa la
180a6(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya hA/ mA~M sa rba yang skar pa ri shud d+he d+hang ma te ga ka da/ sa mud dka' do b+ha b+ha ba bI shud d+he ma ha na ya pa ri pa re sA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu
180a7(mdo): bdun dgongs pa gcig cing dbyangs cig tu/ tshe dpag tu myed pa ni mdo 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gdon myi za'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
180a8(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ au sArba sang ska ra pa ri shud d+he d+har ma te/ ga ka na sa mud dka' te/ sa b+ha pa pri shud d+he ma hA na ya pa ri pa re swA hA// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu
180b1(mdo): ts+yai lnga dgongs pa gcig cing dbyangs gcig tu che dpag tu myed pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das che dang ye shes dpag du myed pa shin tu rnam par gdon gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
180b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// tad lasa?/ oM sa rba sapa skar pa ri shud d+he dang ma te/ ka ka nas mud dka' te/ sA khu ba bi shud d+he/ ma han ya pa ri ba re sA hA// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa la
180b3(mdo): dgongs pa gcig cing dbyangs gcig tu tshe dpag tu myed pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das rdo dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gdon myi za'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal / 
180b4(mdo): tad ya k+Sha/ mA~M sarba sa bskAr pa ri shud d+he/ dwangs te/ ga gnas yud g+ha te/ swa b+ha ba ba shud d+he ma ha ya ra pa ri/ ne pa me swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu
180b5(mdo): rtsa lnga dgongs pa gcig cing dbyangs gcig tu tshe dpag tu myed pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes da pag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gdon myi za' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin
180b6(mdo): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya hA/ oM sa ba sang ska pa pa/ ri shud d+he dang ma he ga gams su dag te/ sa b+ha pa bi shud d+he sa ha na ya pa ri pa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag su
180b7(mdo): rgya rtsa drug dgongs pa gcig cing dbyangs gcig tu che dpag tu myed pa 'i mdo 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gdon skye ba pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
180b8(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ au swarba sa skA ra pa ri shud d+he d+har ma te/ ka ka na sa mudak+Sha te/ sa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma ha ya na pa ri pa re sA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lha'i
181a1(mdo): mo la rba sa skar ba ri shud ra ma te ka ka nas yud dag
182a1(mdo): 8/ la thal ga pa na \u0f7f/ nanam man dmabya ba bzhud ces snyan pa 'a 'ams // gang gis ga tu byud pa'i ma
182a2(mdo): bris sam/ 'drir bcug na de la bdud kyang myed/ bdud kyi ris kyi lce yang myed/ gnod sbyiran yang myed/ srid pa yang byed/ ye 'drog tu 'chi ba'i dus kyang byed par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
182a3(mdo): dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shinang tu rnam par gdon gyi ba pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshas so// tad la hra/ oM sarba sang skAr pa ri shud d+he dang ma ta ka gnas sud gA te/ sa phul bzhud
182a4(mdo): mnyad la pa ri ba ris du// gis tshodag tu byed pa 'dathams/ 'drang bcwag dang 'chi ba'i ma sangs rgyas bye ba zla/ dbu lub su mdod sum tu mthong bar zad/ zas
182a5(mdo): gong rnams de la phyag nye bar 'dud/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas myi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bya thar ro// de la the com dang ne sa nung byed do// bcom ldan 'das che dpa so shes dpan
182a6(mdo): tu myed pazhin byan pa par gdod kyil ba'i rgyal po de bzhi gshegs pa la byag 'as 'o// ma sa yang zhang ri shud ma 'angs teg gnas bud da 'dres bya ba 'i grad pas
182a7(mdo): rnal pa'i sams pa/ ga gas mo ngag tu skyed pa'i mdo'ad thos sa / 'drim pa zhen de'i zhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'brang zhing / bslang ba dang / sgrub pa dang sbed par byed do/ 
182a8(mdo): sems 'das sa dang migs dpag tu byed pa shod bladapa 'a nyi kyis pa rgyas kyi so// nga pa 'i seMsus sa skal pa'i bud mo dang sanyen gnas zung de// 
182b1(mdo): bkud ces gnas pa da/ gas slo pa ma 'du shAthAka da bzhi gagags pa snang ba yul las kyin pa brgyan kyi'ang sa
182b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das che dpa la zhes rapag tu byed pazhid tu rnam pa gdon kyi po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa sa phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya3/ sa tha sang snyar pa shedan/ 
183a1(mdo): thal dag nyed kyi 'bas thams pa rin po men bdun rtsam ba sogro Ti tu gnyis dran btsun par 'gyur ba// bcas pa 'das pa dang le shes rab tu byed gi nas pa da
183a2(mdo): byis pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'das so// tad las sa rdza sang napa par shud bye dngas te gaganas mu ga te swa b+hAb bi shud te ma phad la pa ri ba ris hA// gang gis chos kyi gnyus
183a3(mdo): 'di smra ba la mchod pa byas na/ des dam pa'i chos thams cad rdzogs par mchod par byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das me dang ye shes dpag tu myed pa shin tu rnam par gdon myi thal ba'i rgyal po de bzhin/ 
183a4(mdo): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ au sarba sa skAr pa ri shud d+he dang pa te ga nan sa mud gA te/ sa pA ba bi shud d+he ma ha na ya ba ri pa re swA hA// 'di lta ste/ rnam par
183a5(mdo): gzigs dang / tsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shag kya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin
183a6(mdo): po che lnga bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i ched na bkrang su nus kyi/ me dpag tu myed pa'i tham pa dpes kyi phung po'i chad ni bkrung du myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes
183a7(mdo): dpag tu byed pa shi da tu rnam par gdod phyi za ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya Tha/ oM sa tre sang skA ra ba yud d+he d+har ma he ga ka na sa mud dga' te swa pA ba bi shud d+he ma hA
183a8(mdo): mal pa pa res pa// 'di lta ste/ ring po me'i phung por rab dang mnyam par byas te/ sbyin du byin pa'i bu sod nams kyi phung bro'i tshad myi bgrang byar nas kyi med dpag tu myed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po
183b1(mdo): ni ma na / @ lda 'a ga su na tu mig / sa ya nam da
183b2(mdo): kyi phul po'iched ni bgrang bar myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das medang ye shes dpag tu myed pazhonang tsun pas pa gdod kyil ba'i rgyal po de bzhi gaganas pas hA mams ma// tad pa la/ 
183b3(mdo): sangs pa ri bud ste pa sa te ka ka da sa srung sa te/ sa b+hA ba shud ma ma nyams la ba 'a // gang gi mtsho dpag myed pa'i mdo 'di bris sam/ 'dri bcug pa dang / ma
183b4(mdo): byas shing mchod na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga / bzhid gshegs pa thams// dal phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'agyur ro// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dag tu
183b5(mdo): myed pa shind tu rnam par gdod myi za ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad yan+ta/ mA~M sa was bskar pa ri shud d+he pos te ka ka na sa lud g+ha te sa b+ha ba ba shud d+he ma ha na ya pa ri ba re
183b6(mdo): swA hA// / sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // myi'i song gis sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs pas/ sbyin pa dag gi stobs kyi sgra yang grag/ snying rje cad kyi khang par rab tu
183b7(mdo): shugs// tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // rgya'i seng ges tshul khrims stobs rtogs pas// tshul khrims dag gi stobs kyi sgra yang grag/ snyi rje chad gyi khang par rab
184a1(mdo): tu zhugs// bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang da/ 'byung // bya'o seng ges bzod pa'i stobs rtogs pas// bzod pa dag gi stobs kyi sku yang grag/ snying rje nad kyi sa
184a2(mdo): par rab tu zhugs// brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // myi'i seng ges brtsod 'grus stobs rtogs pas// brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyi sgra yang grag/ snyi brje can
184a3(mdo): gi khang par rab tu zhugs// bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // mya'i seng ges bsam gtan stobs rtogs pas// bsam gtan dag gi stobs kyi sku yang grag/ snying rje
184a4(mdo): can gyi khang par rab tu zhugs// shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung // mye'i seng ges shes rab stobs rtogs pas// shes rab dag gi stobs kyi sgra yang grag/ 
184a5(mdo): snying rje can gyi khang par rab tu zhugs// bcom ldan 'ad sa tshe dang / ye shes dpag tu myed pa shi nad tu rnam par gad/ na myi za ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
184a6(mdo): tad ya thA/ oM sarba sang skar pa ri shud d+he dUr ma te ga ga na sa mud gA te/ sa b+ha ba bi shud d+he ma ha mas pa ra pa mes hA// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing / de skad ces bka' stsa lad nas
184a7(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha myi yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten da yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// / 
184a8(mdo): 'phags pa me dpag tu myed pa zhes bya theg pa chen po'is do// rmogs s+ho/ rma kar skad du/ ga wA pA ya dA ra ni// bod skad du/ tshigs su brtsa
184b1(mdo): pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'chal so// sangs rgyas dang ni ma wa ba rus pa dang / le ma dang cung tsam chog par 'dzid pa// 'dod chags dang ni brgyam smon
184b2(mdo): pa dang // 'gyod pa dang ni ma nges 'byed pa rnams// sems cad rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste// de'i gnyen po theg pa mchog bstadad pa// de yis rab tu gcod pa de dag gi// nyes pa zas
184b3(mdo): cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur// tad ya thA/ oM badz+ra prA ka ra/ badz+ra prA ka ra/ badz+ra tsag kra dpany+dza/ mA yA na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ni ma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu
184b4(mdo): sarba bud d+he sa hA// tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi gzung sa la ni// tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba/ sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu
184b5(mdo): dag thob par 'gyur// khams rnams mtha' dag rgyas par 'gyur la dang // 'chi ba'i tshim mchog dga' das pa yo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang // thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran
184b6(mdo): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de dag la ni theg mchog gos// mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang // sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob/ 
184b7(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs// rdzogs so// rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya kAn mu khi na ma d+ha ra ni// bod skad du
184b8(mdo): 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag/ 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus tsog na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gnas gtsang mal
185a1(mdo): steng / nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa 'i ngon po che sna bdun gyis rab tu phye bas sbas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs byed pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 
185a2(mdo): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zung shig/ 
185a3(mdo): de ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag du bdag gis suka bsngal gang ci khyod pa de/ sems cad thams cad mnyam pa nyid du myi shes pa 'i mtshan nyid can du ma gyur da cig/ 
185a4(mdo): bdag gis 'jig rtend pa'i phum sum tshogs pa'i bde ba gang ci myong ba de sems can thams cad dang thur mong du yongs su spyod par gyurd cig/ bdag gis sdig pa myi dge ba li las gang ci
185a5(mdo): byas pa de so sor bshags pa bla na myed pas so sor ma bsha/ gas par ma gyurd cig// bdag gis bdud kyi las// gang ci bgyis pa de yongs su shes pa bla na myed pas yongs su
185a6(mdo): ma shes par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa la 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa yang drang / gang mi yod pa de bla da byed pa'i ye shes kyi
185a7(mdo): 'bras bur gyu dad cig// bdag gi rnam par grol ba gang ci sod pa des/ sems can thams cad das par tha dad par gyur cig/ 'khor pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par ma gyur cig// 
185a8(mdo): tad ya thA/ oM ka me k+kam/ klan te krAd te/ da med me/ dan te dAn de/ bA dre b+ha dre/ su bA dz+re su b+ha rbe/ can tre can ne/ su can tre can de/ tsan d+ha ki ra ne/ tsan dra pa ti te mo pa ti/ d+harma paH
185b1(mdo): bra h+ma pa ti/ sa rba gre sha/ bshod ni/ sarba a rA sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nang tha pra sha ma ni/ pa ra mA ra thA sa d+ha ni/ ka ya bi sho d+ha ni/ bAka? bi sho d+ha ni/ ma na swam sho d+ha ni sA hA/ 
185b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid lan gsum mtshon lan gsum brlags na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams
185b3(mdo): cad byang nas/ skye ba bdun gyi bar du des ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de rga/ 
185b4(mdo): ces bka' su mda' la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar/ bcas pa'i 'jig rtend yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 
185b5(mdo): 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs// / rdzogs s+ho// // rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya tsan dan ang ka da ma d+ha ra ni// bod skad du// 'phags
185b6(mdo): pa tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag kyis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban/ 
185b7(mdo): dge slong gi dge 'dun ched po khri nyos stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dud chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gzhan yang la khyad par can mang po dang / thabs
185b8(mdo): gcig tu bzhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das padad parnams pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mo 'bral kyis lus me ldan ne yang nge bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khod des
186a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur da pa gnyis la bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dka 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di'i pha rol kyi
186a2(mdo): yang ches pha rold/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'brum phrag gang ga'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ tsan dan gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rtend kyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
186a3(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stod to// gang 'jig rtend gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad ni phyir myi
186a4(mdo): ldog par gyur pa sha stag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can danagyi yan lag des/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ 
186a5(mdo): tsan dan gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi gzhi gsu ngas pa 'di thos nas phyir myi ldog sde/ sdig pa dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sos dang myi 'bral lo// bcom ldan 'das tshe dpan
186a6(mdo): tu myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / gzhan yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sngon chad gsungs te/ ngas kyang da ltar khyed rnams la bshad kyis
186a7(mdo): sems cad thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ legs par nyon la rab tu yod la zung shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/ thams cad chos dang myi ldan pa
186a8(mdo): mtshams myed pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mchod rtend 'dral ba/ dge 'dun gyi rdzas la tu phrog byed pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po spong ba dag
186b1(mdo): 'byung ste/ de dag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir tshad dan gyi yan lag gi gzungs kyi gzhi/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di shad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa la nyod ci// de nas bya
186b2(mdo): chub sems dpal spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyu da pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bskul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 
186b3(mdo): gzhan yang sems can bye ba khrag zhig 'bus lag nams la zhugs brtse ba dang / rdeg pa 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das thagad drug so 'ang/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gas med/ bdags
186b4(mdo): gis kyang gzungs kyi sngags kyi gzhi de dag bzung bar bgyi ste/ sems cad thams cad kyi don du rgya cher rab tu bshad par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
186b5(mdo): tad ya thA/ tsi ra te/ ma ri tsi ke/ dUd da me/ dung dan te/ du nra/ pra bi shI tsan da na/ ang ga tshe/ sa man ta/ pa ri sho da ni/ bi shud d+ha/ shi le/ tsi reng tra pa ti/ ma ha pra ta se ma na tse d+ya ya/ 
186b6(mdo): pra ti b+ha ne/ sarba bud d+ha/ a d+hi ShI te/ ba ga ba ti/ pa pA k+ka mo/ a me pa ri pu ra ya sA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
186b7(mdo): 'dzind tam/ klog gas// ston da tam/ kun chub par byed na/ tshe 'di nyid la myig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems das/ 
186b8(mdo): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ zla ba byed kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang
187a1(mdo): zla 'od gzhon nus gyu ra pa mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshams byed pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas kyang lhal rnams kyi nang du
187a2(mdo): skye bar 'gyur/ khyim bdag chen po spyod de bdag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skye bo thams cad dka' bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar sa chen po ma lus pa ni grum par 'gyur yang srid/ rgya mtsho na skems kyang srid/ 
187a3(mdo): de bzhin du ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni 'jig par 'gyur yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni sa'i steng tu lu pa yang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pas mnan du rung yang srid
187a4(mdo): me mi chur 'gyur yang srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'a gyur yang srid/ sems cadan thams cad kyi sems ni gcigatu 'gyur yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing byin
187a5(mdo): gyis brlabs pa 'di ni gzhan du 'gyur myi srid do// / sus kyang bskyod pa 'am bskul bar myi nus so// 'di la ni bdud sdig can gyis klags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// 
187a6(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di
187a7(mdo): 'chog bshad par bgyi'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten rang bsrel dang bcas pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sel ma gtor
187a8(mdo): la/ tsan dad gyi btug pas bdugs te/ zla ba ches nas brtsams nas/ tshes bcwo lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing / gos kyang lan gsum du brjes te/ kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing / 
187b1(mdo): gso sbyong dang ldan pa sa sems cad thams cad la sems snyoms par zla ba nya' nyin zhag gcig/ bsrung ba bgyis te/ rtsa bam gyi steng tu mchis shing rtsa bam bting ba'i steng bya nyal nas/ sems rtse gcig tu
187b2(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyid cing / me tog dri zhim pos lan brgya stong du gtor na/ sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag byed dang / spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug
187b3(mdo): mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur thos pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa tsan dam gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i gzungs// // rdzogs su
187b4(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ badz+ra bi pAr na ma d+ha ra mi zod skad du/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
187b5(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lag na rdo rjes/ lus thams cad
187b6(mdo): rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rje'i sa sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thas
187b7(mdo): cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ rdo rje khro bo las byung ba/ rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ myi chod pa/ byi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/ brtand pa/ thams cad du thogs pa myed pa/ thams cad dus
187b8(mdo): 'phas pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems cad thams cad 'jil bur byed pa/ rigs sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rigs sngags thams cad gnod par byed pa/ las
188a1(mdo): thams cad 'joms byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las tha rad par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod par/ 
188a2(mdo): byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'jugs par byed pa rigs sngags kyoms thams cad byed du 'drag pa/ ma thab pa rnams grul par byed pa/ zlab pa rnams chud byib par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad
188a3(mdo): da pa sbyin pa/ bas camams cad spang ba zhig nus so/ sems can thams cad ring sa par byed pa/ sems can mapas cad rmugs par byed pa'i gas sa kyis chen po 'di/ ngas
188a4(mdo): kyi la lus lanan rdo rje'is rab tu smras so// na mo dadan rdzal ya/ nam cad da bzlapa ma ya/ sataprakak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad ya / ma Ta dzaH/ rdzom pa rjon
188a5(mdo): s+yAta s+yata/ bauta yA oM ta3/ sun kun/ kun pa sa su/ na pa / sarba sa twa ni/ b+hor+Na yA ts+tshed+ha yA/ marbad+ha/ As ma g+ho d+haya/ bA ma bA ma/ me bA sa yA sa~M pA ma
