298b6(mdo): da 'gro ba dang ga 'jug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// de nas chos kyi nam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to/ 9/ bcob
298b7(mdo): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyis pa dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su bzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / btud thams cad tsham gcad pa'i slad tu/ 
298b8(mdo): gzungs kyi gas pa sngags gzhi nams rjes su stsal pa pam 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir
299a1(mdo): cad myi gsung bar gyu dad pas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldam 'das kyis ca gyi gsung bar gyur dad pas gnang bar rig nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de 'di lta ste/ 
299a2(mdo): da nad te/ de nad te/ ya ha nad te/ dzas pa de/ sum pa de/ Ta Te Ta Ta ne/ ma ha maT ne/ kud de kud Ta ne/ ma ha kud Ta ne/ da ma le a ma le sa hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur
299a3(mdo): gdal ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mog pal las gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzind pa dang / bzlas te bton nas 'chang ba de ni sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang
299a4(mdo): 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// de la ni dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag
299a5(mdo): khyed bstand pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byen no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa
299a6(mdo): kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ long shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shika/ kun chub par gyis shig
299a7(mdo): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas par bgyi ba'i slas tu bdag gis bzung lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstand pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshis
299a8(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag bkal stsal da to// gzungs sngags kyi mdo sde 'di sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste/ sems can rnams la khad pa'i phyir// de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin// gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di// 
299b1(mdo): 'dzidang tam yang na klog byed pa// me rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// de ni tshe rabs drad par 'gyur / gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed de la/ phyi myod gang yang rung ba dang // gnod sbyin kul bum srin po dang / nams kyang lnga
299b2(mdo): chad myi byed do// gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed de la// 'dod 'a khams dbang phyug gang yin pa// sdig can btud de nam du yang // bar chad byed par myi 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags 'di ni 'dzi nad byed pa'i// pha ma dang
299b3(mdo): ni pu mu dang // sring mo mja' ba shes gnyen dag kyang // log par ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// de phyir gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di// 'jigs myed gang gis thob gyurapa nas// gzungs sngags 'di brjod/ byed pa des// nams kyang
299b4(mdo): 'jigs par myi bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed de'i// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa// zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nas
299b5(mdo): gang// bskal da pa bye ba bskyabs pa kum// gzungs sngags 'di ni 'dzind byed des// zhag btun gyis ni zil gyis gnod/ phyogs bzhi 'jig rtend skyong ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag
299b6(mdo): lus ngang dang ni yul 'khor srung // myig myi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan pa// 'khor bas blon bcas de dag kyang // gzungs sngags 'di mi brjod byed pa// de la rtag tu bsrung bar/ 
299b7(mdo): byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang // nyan thos chen po de dag dang // 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'jam dpal la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sos
299b8(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po bzhi dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa la 'jig rtend yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo smon
300a1(mdo): ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so// / na mo rang na shi khe ne/ sa pa ha he/ se myag sa ma bud dra ya/ tang d+yas / dar me dang ne/ dang ma ni khe re swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran nangan
300a2(mdo): song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum ka nam gyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas gtsug gi mtshan rjes su dran pa// rdzogs s+ho// 
300a3(mdo): srid pa sgrol mdzad sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa yum ni khyod lags sug bsngal myed par mdzod// byang chub bgrod par 'dod pas gtso mo khyod bstend te// suka bsngal ldan pa bdag la thugs rje mdzad dug sa
300a4(mdo): thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'bras bu bdag la grub par mdzod// byang chub lam mchog khyod las brten nas thob 'gyur ba// nyon mongs myi bzad dgra'i me rnams 'bar ba la// ye shes chu'i ched gyis ban+de
300a5(mdo): bar mdzad du gsol// 'jig rten gsum na dbyings kyi ses can ma lus pa/ sgrol ma khyod ni rlung lha'i ngo bo'o// bdag nyid de/ yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin cen sku 'dra ba/ 
300a6(mdo): sems cad 'jigs par ltung ba byed pa bslab par mdzod// khyod kyis ram rnams 'jigs pa a lus myur du gsal ba mdzod// klu'i dug ni khrung gis bcos nas zhi ba kapa/ khyod kyis dpal ldan/ 
300a7(mdo): sru mchog gang gis mthong 'grum pa// sdig pa kun bcom bsod nams dpag myed thob par 'gyur// don grub khyod mthong grub pa rnams mi 'grub 'gyur zhing // thugs rdol bdag nyid sems can thams cad sgrol mdzad
300a8(mdo): pa// khyod kyi byim brlabs bkal drin 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur bas// blo ngang bsod nams chung ba bdag ni bzub tu gsol// rtag tu bdag gis khyod kyi gzugs ni gas pa dam bsgoms/ sa gzhi 'dra bar byams
300b1(mdo): bas 'bras bu sbyin mdzad na// kye ma lo rtag tu bdag ni sdug bsngal zhir ku rad te// ma bzhin phan pas dngos grub 'bras bu cis myi gsol// lha mo khyod kyis 'gro ba ma lus bde bar mdzod// dben pa'i seMs
300b2(mdo): kyis srid pa'i rgya mchong 'khor gyur da pa// de dag skyabs byed gyur da te shi nang tu sems gdungs la// gtsol khyod kyis 'gro ba yang nas yang du basbal// zhi bar byed pa'i gzugs can khyod nathugs rje'i bdan/ 
300b3(mdo): zhal ni nyi ma'i 'od pas shi dab tu khyad par gsal// sdig pa'i gti mug shind tu myi bzad 'joms mdzad pa// sgrol ma dam tshig grub mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal stod// tshangs pa ru tu la stsogs rtag tu phyag 'tshal
300b4(mdo): zhig/ rim chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par sras gyu da pa'i dbu brgyad rnams kyis khyod kyi zhabs gnyis brgya gyu rad to// dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu bstod de 'dud par byed// mtho ris
300b5(mdo): lha rnams ltung bas shi nad tu 'jigs skrag pa// de bas sems ni sho nang tu dang pas dad pa skyes// 'phags ma sgrol ma de phyir khyod kyis sbubs 'grol mdzad// bskul bas thugs rje skyes nas gsung
300b6(mdo): gis myi 'jigs sbyin// lha rnams 'khor bcas yang na sems mi dad pa skyes// man bA ba in tri pA ra 'phreng la stsogs// pad ma lta bu'i zhabs la lha rnams mchod mchog mchod// sna tshogs mchod pas mchod
300b7(mdo): de khyod la stong phyag 'tshal// mchod pa mchog gis lha rnams khyod la mchod byed pa// bsod nams 'bras bu rang gis thob par bya ba'i phyir// mchod pas dges dang myi dges khyod la myi mnga' yang / 
300b8(mdo): thugs rdo'i bdag nyid ldan pas la rnams gzung bar mdzod// sngon tshe myi zhig mtshon myed don gnyer lam 'gro ba// don sar ma phyin lam du dgra dang phrad pa las// shi nad tu 'jigs skrag spangs te sgrol
301a1(mdo): ma rjes su dran// byin gyi brlabs kyis dgra de bran bzhin skyabs su gsol// sngon tshe mi zhig don gnyer nags dkyil glang chen phrad// grang chen khros nas mche bas rab tu gzung ba la// ha ha zhes smras/ 
301a2(mdo): ngu'abod sgrol ma sgrol mdzad pos// de ma thag tu gtso mos glang chen 'jigs pa bskyabs// sngon che myo zhig dogs myed khyim na nyal ba la// dgra chen bdug pas/ de'i khyim la me btang nas// skrag cing spangs te
301a3(mdo): langs nas spol ma sgrol mdzad pos// de ma zag par char gyi rgyu nad kyis me 'bar zhi// sngon tshe smad 'tshong mdzes ma rol daphyir nags tshal phyind// langs te a sho ka'i yal ka bzung ba las// yal ka Na
301a4(mdo): rtsa nas sbrul naka khros pas de la bzung / \u0f7f/ sgrol ma dran pa tsam gyis sbrul gdug rab tu zhi// sngon che tshong dpon nor ldan don gnyer lam 'gro ba// grong khyer ma slebs skabs su myi rgod phrad pa las/ 
301a5(mdo): de'i 'jigs pas yum chen sgrol ma rjes su dran// byin gyis padz+ra bas kyis dgra rnams bran bzhin dbang du 'dus// sngon che myi zhig phongs nas rkun mar long pa las// mdzod khang nang du
301a6(mdo): phyi nas rgyam tha'i nyal mas bzung // byang nas brtson lang nang tu lpags skrag mang pos bcings/ skrag ste smom ma dran pas bcings pa'i sug bsngal bral/ sdod ci 'phags pa'i dge bsnyed nan phrag bye/ 
301a7(mdo): de// 'khor bcas rgya mchor krung zhugs kyu de lam ru zhig/ sgrol ma dran te thal mo sbyor nas rjes su bstod// byin brlabs mngon du zhas bstan d+hu las gling du chags/ rgyal po gcig tu 'chang khang nang du/ 
301a8(mdo): nub mo zhugs/ skabs su bgegs kyi bdug pas de la bzung ba las// shi nad tu 'jigs skrag/ spangs te sgrol ma rjes su dran// gtso'o khyod kyis bsrungs pa'i 'byung po la 'jigs pa bral/ 
301b1(mdo): 'jigs pa chen po brgyang mi de sang byed par yad // thugs rje'i bdag nyid sgrol la khyod kyis yud tsam gyis// srid pa ma lus sems can rnams ni 'dogs myed mdzad/ bdag ni shinang tu skrag pas gtses
301b2(mdo): khyod la skyabs su mchi// 'jig rten sems can khyod kyi mtshan tsam sus thos pa// zos pa tsam gyis sdig pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par mdzad// bdag gi dad pas na nub khyod bsngags rjes su dran/ 
301b3(mdo): zug bsngal bdag dran gtso mo khyod kyis bskyab par mdzod// kye mo bdag gis khyod mi 'grub par dka' ba ste/ nang rub khyod kyis sngags mi bzlas brjod brtsod par bgyis// bdag ni sdig ldan de phyir khyod mi
301b4(mdo): grub ma gyur// 'jigs sems ldan pa bdag la lha mos dngos sku rapa gsol// ma rungs sems can rmongs pas dge sbyong myi dadran la// gti mug drag pos bsgribs pas lam mchog ma
301b5(mdo): mthong ste// bsod nams chung bas bdag ni srid pa'i gsang sar lhu / sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad sgrol mdzad smon sa khyod la skyabs su mchi// dgra dang glang po che dang me dang sbrul dang ni/ chom mo// 
301b6(mdo): bcing ba chu dang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa rnams// sgrol ma thugs rje' ldan pa bdag gis bstod byas nas// srid gsum sems can ya lus sdug bsngal kun bral shog/ lha mo dam tshig sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ 
301b7(mdo): rdzogs so// / rgya ga skad tubod skad / 'phags pa yun ras gzigs dbang phyug ha la 'gro ba
301b8(mdo): gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshas lo// na ma rid na rdzal sa/ nam sa rgya ba lo ka ta na ma tho tas ta ya/ ma hA sad pA la/ ma thag du ni ka ya/ sarba sad tu byas na
302a1(mdo): ga ti nI/ na ma sarba sa da tA/ byA sa na/ A pa ha ri ni/ nams sarba sad tra bA yod ta ra na ya/ nams sarba g+ha ba pra sha ma na ka ra ya/ nams sarba sad tA bo d+ha/ tsaM ga da sa na ka rA ya/ nams
302a2(mdo): sarba bA d+ha na/ d+ha na ka ra ya/ na mas sarba dug ka/ pra mog sha na ka rA ya/ na mas sarba an d+ha ka rA/ bI d+hi ma na ka ra ya/ na mas sarba bid d+ha radza/ pa sha prA pa ta ye/ ma ha yo ga/ yo ka shwa rA ya/ ta s+ya
302a3(mdo): nams sprid tra// ma dan a ra a pa/ lo ki ti shwa ra/ mu khrod grin/ ri shi b+hid da dA de ba mag/ yag sha rlag shas/ shag kya bram mA/ lo gA pA la/ pa shU ba tA sha ra/ na ra ya na/ snyan da ku be ra
302a4(mdo): a su drem dra/ mgri ga na/ na na s+thi tan/ badz+ra khur sa ti yan/ h+ya yan grI ba na na ma/ ba ra ma hI da ya/ ma ba rta yi rta yi sh+ya mi/ a pa pra me yA D+ha sa rta ka na/ a sa t+yan/ sarba bud ta nan/ sa rba
302a5(mdo): bis mA/ bi na ya kaM/ a mo gan/ sarba kar ma man/ sha nan tsa/ bi na ya kan/ tad ya tha/ auta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta nu la/ sarba pa sha g+hA ta ka/ sarba pu ta bi tra ba ka dzA li ta/ a na la/ 
302a6(mdo): bi s+phu li dag/ a ta ta sa/ ke sa ra/ a to ba/ pra bi ta ka yaM badz+ra khru ma na ra/ ga ti ta/ tsa li ta ba/ su pA ta la/ badz+rod shA sa ta/ ti si ta ma ru/ tok+sa ti/ pra sha ma na ka ra/ pa ya duSh+Ta bid phyag na/ saMp+ta
302a7(mdo): san ka ra/ swa bid b+h+yo ba te/ sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shan ti ka ra/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya byi te/ ba ka ban/ ha ya grI ba/ sarba bid d+hu b+hed ya ma khar rta yi/ Sha myi khad kha da/ ma ha ro gu tra man tran/ rak+ka rak+ka/ 
302a8(mdo): ad ma swa/ tiShA ta/ man tran/ sid p+ta si da d+ha/ sarba kar rme Sh+ya ma/ sid de de hi dwe hi/ ma bi sha a bi// pra ba sha pra bi sha/ sarba gra he shu/ pUn pUn/ bi pUn bi d+hun/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma za pra ma tha/ sarba/ 
302b1(mdo): pha lo ba kram krig thu'o nga/ dung lang gi ta mu zhig bshe/ gang ba sha/ dang shu bi Sha/ tsun mos bisngar/ ba leg man/ sid da man dzan/ cag bu mo nyan// tsid ta/ big she ba nag ngag nid t+ya/ a bam the na
302b2(mdo): tA la ya tra sa la/ ma ha rgod di/ sad tA/ ring spya sen/ sarba bA ye bas/ sad ta tam/ rag Na ka Sha/ ma ma khyu ta/ dang ma sang ga/ a nud nya taM/ me kar ma shig kAng / ku ru ku ru/ phaT/ ha ya gri ba pa
302b3(mdo): badz+ra zhwa la la par+tha/ badz+ra drang blo 'od kaT/ bA ya be ra/ ba ya phaT/ pa ma san tAn/ na sha na ka ra sa phaT/ ba ra drASh+Ta/ bid b+hag nag ba~M bag ga ya Na ka ra ya phaT/ sarba kra hod sa dan / kar ya phaT/ 
302b4(mdo): sa rba mra te gu la a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ ba da ba mu kha ya phaT+Ta/ da me ge tsid ta/ ma ma ma hi he shin/ ka ye kra yin te/ mam hA ya ngan rdzi/ ya man ti dzA tan ti/ kA lo dang ku rban ti tanas rban pa dbye bem
302b5(mdo): be klid ta a baT/ rnams sarba du b+ha/ kA hod/ sa da na ya/ ta ya naM/ pa ya si dun tu man tra ba da sa hA/ oM a myi tod b+ha ba ya / t+ye phaHphaT sa hA/ oM na mo a a ya swa dA ga oM na mo ba shA mu rta ye saH
302b6(mdo): rnams sarba sad tA nan/ sid dad du man/ thA ba d+ha ya sa hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ta ya 'gri ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs so// 
302b7(mdo): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// gapal la thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin
302b8(mdo): gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dzind pa des kong du smos pa'i skye ba rnam pa bcwo lnga po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad dul dang bya thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod cing gzung bar bgyi ste / de la skyo ba skyed par myi bgyi'o// 
303a1(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa su na ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras na/ de'i rjes la 'khor mang po la dbus de nyid du 'dug ste/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas sems can thams cad la
303a2(mdo): snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed te/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/ rgyal po chen po kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa myed pa myed pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen mo bzhi mdzes pa 'di
303a3(mdo): smras so// na mo ra da na tra ya ya/ na ma ar+ya ba lo ka ti shwa ra ya/ bi d+hi sa d+ha ya/ ma ha sA ta ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ sarba ban b+han tshe/ da ma ka ra ya/ sarba pA pa sa mud drod cho Sha na ka rA ya / sarba b+hu d+yi pra
303a4(mdo): sha na ma ka ra ya/ sarba si t+yu pa tra ba bi na sha ka ra ya/ sarba yod ta ra ka ru ya ru ya/ bo sti swa ta ya/ ma ha sa tA ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka yA/ sad dAn du me man tra pa ta ni swa hA/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 
303a5(mdo): chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dud la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag btsal nas/ rig pa
303a6(mdo): 'di brjod kyi/ rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur da cig/ tad ya / ha ha has de ni bas sa te/ ta pa ta ba ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la? ne/ tsa la tsa le ne/ bud pa yog ma nu s+phar pad ma ya sA hA// gang gis rig pa
303a7(mdo): 'di bla gas pa de tshe rapas brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos na yang bde ba cad kyi 'jig rten tu skye bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog dang ma rgyab lo rjes su dran pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 
303a8(mdo): rgya kar skad tu/ sarba dur ka ti/ pa ri she da na/ a shI na bi dz+wa la na sa pAr ni/ bod skad du/ gnod pa'i rgyun thams cad yongs su skyong ba/ gtsug tong na par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
303b1(mdo): gzungs/ dkon bachog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// ma mo dad na wa ya yA/ mam pa ka ba te/ mam rje log kya / pra ti bi shi b+ha ya/ bud d+ha ya ba ka ba nyel tad ya thA/ oM bshod la zi zhi la sa man ta/ a b+ha ba
303b2(mdo): sa ska ra na ka ti/ ka nas pa bi shud de/ a bi shis tsad du ma na su ka ta pa ra tsam/ a mri ta ma bi she ke pe ma ha ma ma pra ba te/ ma ha re a ta re/ ma lu san par ni/ sho d+ha la sho dA ya/ ka ka ni bo shud de/ e hrI na tra/ 
303b3(mdo): dza ya pa ri shud de/ sa ha sra ra smi sa ma dzo ta kai/ sarba ta tha ka ta hri ta ya/ ma ti sta na a b+histi the ma ta mun rdze/ badz+ra badz+ra ka ya/ sar ta ra na shud de/ sarba a pa ra na bi shud de/ pra ti ni parta ya/ a yu ra ba
303b4(mdo): shud de sa ma ya sa dit+ti te/ ma ti ma ti ma ti/ ma ha ma ti ta tha ka/ da bu ta ko ti pa ri shud de/ ba sUta bud d+he shud t+te/ he he tra ya dzA bri dza yadzA ya/ sA ra sA ra/ sarba bud d+ha/ a tiSh+Tha na/ a
303b5(mdo): shrI d+he shud d+he/ badz+ra badz+ra ma ha badz+ra/ badz+ra ka rbe/ badz+ra ma bA ba turmam sarba sha bi ra nan/ sarba sA tA na na/ tsa ka ya pa ri shUd d+he/ b+ha bA de me sa d+ha/ sarba ga ti pa ri shung d+he/ sarba ta thA ga za sa man/ 
303b6(mdo): pa ma zh-i d+ha/ sarba ta tha ka ta thA man/ sa ma shA sa mar tu/ bud du bud d+ha/ bo dA la po pAs/ bi bo dpa ba zod pa/ sa mam ta pa ra~M shud de/ sarba ta pa ka ta wAg pa/ a dag nas na ti ma ha mug
303b7(mdo): sahA/ ma badz+ra can pa sarba tu stan/ dka ha na da ta pa tsa hUM phaT// // rgya kar skad du/ a mri ta be'i shad dz+nyA na sa dar ni/ bod skad
303b8(mdo): bdud rtsi'i zhes bya ba 'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rad na tra ya ya/ na ma kha ga ba te be ro tsa na/ ta tha ga ta ya/ a ra ha da d+he/ sa myag sa ma bud d+hA ya/ tad ya tha/ pra ta ba ne hri
304a1(mdo): ra ka dang ma hA/ pra yid de yi de de sa de / med d+he/ si da a chu ka de ma ha bi ba nu ka nu te/ sa rba dpa la a pa bo da sa hA/ tshig gzhan gyis spabar so zhipa la lan bdun bzlas te thos la/ nas la
304a2(mdo): dang pos bzlas te thos na / zhag bdun gyis spyan thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// zla ba phyed du bston par byas ra thos pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// zla bar byas dade bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ 
304a3(mdo): bdud kyi sA pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'aras lo// gnon sbyin gyi me dpon chen po la ga na rdo rje drag po la pa/ 
304a4(mdo): 'tshal lo// de nas khro ba bdud rtsil pa la sbyo gyis/ 'khor thams cad la glang po che'i lha sangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom 'ang 'das la 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'do mi
304a5(mdo): can rnams ni bsod nams kyis man pa dang / tshul la myi gnas pa dang / ba ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing
304a6(mdo): la zham pa dang / rtag tu log 'dred dang / mche ga can dang / sha la rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgyegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar btugs pa'i slad du/ gsang sngags bshad par 'ama'o// 
304a7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdud nim smyor gang byed/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so// khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ 
304a8(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig/ de nas khro bo bdu myig la sbyor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas/ gsang sngags bshad pa// na mo rad na rdza
304b1(mdo): ya ya na ya shram da badz+ra pa na ye/ ma ha yag wA/ se na pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro ta ya/ pra dz+wa la ti/ dI ba Ta dang / badz+rod ka ta pA ya bai ra ba la ga mas yu la la badz+ra pa ra shu ba shu ha stA ya/ tad la zag
304b2(mdo): h+ya lu hra su a mr-i ta kun da li/ kha kha Sha Sha/ kha na khan/ Shadrad 'dra pa/ khA ti Sha ti/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ han ha na/ de ha da ha/ pa tsa paH/ kI na sI da/ pan du bas d+ha/ ka rdza ka rdza/ ta dza ta dza/ pra
304b3(mdo): tAs/ bi s+pho tas/ bka ban/ ma mr-i ta ku da li/ mu tan ta kad sa/ pal 'dren/ thaban/ banas/ na ni 'am/ ma ta kan saha~M/ dzaM li ta ta ka/ a karaya/ hU~M d+hu @
304b4(mdo): badz+ra kod da kan la sa rba// bdud rtsi lal spyor kyigs pasags/ ra da mthal// dmo rad na tra ya ya/ na po zhud d+ha badz+ra ba na 9/ ma ha yag na sem pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kr-i ta ya/ dang Sh+Thad/ 
304b5(mdo): ta be ra bA sa/ sa mi ba sha ha sta ya/ he he/ pa ta pa ta d+hab de l+ra kha/ kha tri khA hi/ me wi pa kun b+ha li/ titi sh+tsa/ ban d+ha bad d+ha/ ha na han/ ka pa dza kar rdza/ gan
304b6(mdo): dze li ta/ an ta ka ra ya swa hA// bdud kyi thal spyod gyi gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na po ra dan lnga la ya/ nam shud d+ha badz+ra pa na ye/ ma ta yag k+ka se ma pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro ta ya/ bi ma la ka
304b7(mdo): na ka/ dz+wa la ba shan 5/ ke ka na sa mri ta sa pa pa ya/ rag ta ma l+ya/ sa pra le/ pa ni pra ya / badz+ra ba ni pri la ya/ badz+ra pa ni tu l+ya be wa ya/ de pa na ka/ ya ka/ rak+Sha sa pra la ya na ya/ 
304b8(mdo): kya/ go tsa ra ya/ sha ta s+ye na ta ba na ka ra ya/ tri rad na/ kar bod ta/ ma ya sa mr-i ta kun da le/ I he he/ dang Sh+Tod ka ta pi ra ba kI/ bId dud dza la sU li kA sha ni/ tru l+ya ru bo di ta/ se pu ta
305a1(mdo): oM kha kha kha ka/ gri nagrin/ ban dA ban dA/ ha na ha na/ gar rdza kar rdza/ bi swo ta ya bi s+pho ta ya/ dA ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dzA la pra dzA la/ kra sa gra sa/ sarba ba ke na/ bi na ya ka da
305a2(mdo): hrid yan swa ta/ gan dang rba hrid yan swa ta/ raka sha sa hr-i da yan spata/ bI ma raka k+ka sa trid+ha ya sA ta/ swarba ra hr-i da yan spa ta/ sarba tsa tur ta ka hr-id yan swa ta/ sarba na ka nan/ hri da yan satra/ 
305a3(mdo): hUM hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ a bi sha/ a bi sha/ i da tsam/ ker kyang ku ru badz+ra d+ha/ ad nya ba la ti swA hA// bdud rtsi thal spyor gyi gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya
305a4(mdo): dang sh+lo ka ta bI ra ba ya / tad ya tha/ hu lu du lu/ kha kha ShataSha ti/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban pu pan d+ha/ swa hA// khro bo bdad rtsi zal spyod gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o// de nas de dag gi
305a5(mdo): snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsku bas na/ bdag gis kas pasngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / bsgrub par 'gyur ba re
305a6(mdo): bshad pang 'tshal lo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// mo a mr-i ta hU~M phaT// bdud rtsi thal spyod kyi snying po// rdo rje khro ba bdud rtsithal skyor kyigs bsngags rnams bshad ma thag tu
305a7(mdo): sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs myed cing rten myed par gyu rang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi/ 
305a8(mdo): skyabs mdzad su gsold/ bde ba ba gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad pa gsal zhes smra zhing 'go bo thub tu gtugs so// kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i bka' nyon cig/ rdo rje
305b1(mdo): kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas/ khyed kyi spyi bo bshags sa re/ ngas ras pa ser po can rnams kyi gas pa sngags kyis/ lha'i lo stong gi bar bu log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtugs pa dang
305b2(mdo): gtungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig nga 'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol da gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig/ gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzind cing 'don
305b3(mdo): pa dang / sgrub pa dang / des bsrung ba byed pa de la grags ma tshol cig/ til smras pa 'am/ zas ngan pa yang rung / grong gi chos khyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad bsgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig/ 
305b4(mdo): zan thal ba'i tshe yang kham dang po la sngags kyis btab ste/ dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma shar pa'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo // log 'dren rnams kyang glags myi tshol
305b5(mdo): lo// sha dang / nya dang / til dang / sran chan dang / 'bras yos dang / ben tshe dang / snum khung par pa ta dang / la phug kyang rung ste/ zas thams cad zos zin kyang / ngari gas pa
305b6(mdo): sngags 'dzin de na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yon tam dpag tu myed par shes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud kyi la spyor zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs so// 
305b7(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ kri sA de bi ma ma da ra ni// bod skad du/ la mo nag mo nag mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang
305b8(mdo): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon pa byang chub kyi shing drung na
306a1(mdo): bzhugs te/ bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i sring mo lha mo nag mo chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa der song ste phyinang nas/ phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs/ 
306a2(mdo): gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug bdud kyi sa gshin rje'i sring mo nag mo chen mo 'ase/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
306a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa dbul na/ bdag gi der gshegs su gsol// tad ya tha/ oM ru ru be du ru tis smras pa to sa/ ru ru ro ba tiSh+Tha ba to si sa hA// 'di bton pas/ 
306a4(mdo): gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang mya ngas thams cad dang / nyes par blta ba thams cad dang / nyes/ par bor ba rnams dang / bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la
306a5(mdo): myi shis pa dang myi mthun par byed pa'i phyogs ris thams cadasteng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed man chad la thug pa chings shig/ zlogs shig/ zad kar ni khor ra khor yug gi ri la thug pa tshun chad
306a6(mdo): chings shig/ zlogs shig/ 'og tu ni sems can dmyal pa la thug pa yan chad cings sheg/ thogs shig/ swA hA// lha mo nag mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs// / rdzogs so// 
306a7(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ a d+ya ma ta shri su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen po 'i mdol/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad 'dra/ 
306a8(mdo): gsags ca ga sa/ ma ldan 'das pa na btsun denas kyang dus la sus dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa myed pas gzigs dbang byug bcom yan 'das gal ba deng ba na
306b1(mdo): phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lam gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo gzigs nas/ 'phags pa byam ras gzigs dbang phyug la
306b2(mdo): 'di skad ces la stsal to// gang gis dpal chen po'i myong bcu gnyis pa shes pa dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyedan nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang la la zhig 'chang ngam/ klog ka/ 
306b3(mdo): yi ger/ bris sam/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de dbul po spangs nas phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung ba'i tsho gas thams cad kyis de ltar gyur da cig ces kun tu smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
306b4(mdo): kyis dpal chen mo'i mying gcu gnyis pa bka' stsal dpa/ 'di la daste// bkra shis ma dang/ dpal dang / pad ma'i 'phreng ba can dang / nor bdag ma dang / dkar mo dang / snyan pa chen
306b5(mdo): mo dang / pad ma'i myig dang / byed pa mo dang / gzi chen ma dang / zas sbyin ma dang / rin chen sbyin ma dang / dpa la chen mo la// sad s+ya the dan/ dzi ni gri mis rba aR+sha
306b6(mdo): sa ta ni/ shashi ni/ a lag zhis men ga sa/ sade pyan bus ma hA pad dza sa twa// swo ba lu ni pa lam su ka ges twa// lan gsum brjod par bya'o// gang la sa dus gsum du grogs
306b7(mdo): de'i gnyen po thams cad nges par rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// 'byor pa myi zad par 'gyur ro// gtso bo la bltas te blta bar bya'o// de la gcog
306b8(mdo): yig du shes bskyen par 'gyur ro// dbang du 'gyur ro// gang du smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par klags shing bram zhes drag shul byas pa 'am/ 'ong bar myi 'gyur ro// sangs
307a1(mdo): rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa 'ad nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
307a2(mdo): la mngon par bstod to// / dpal chen mo'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// @brgya kar skad du A y+ya da ba tsun de na ma d+ha ra ni/ 
307a3(mdo): bod skad du 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
307a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das lha mo bskul byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das lha mo bskul byed ma'i mthu dang / stobs dang byin gyi brlab sa dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan papha rold
307a5(mdo): gnon pa grub pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags shing byin/ gyis brlabs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag rnam pa sems cad kyi thams cad du dge bar gyur da cig/ nams gtan
307a6(mdo): sa lcag mthu dko tan ma/ tad la sa/ m-i ma me chu me tsun de ye sa hA/ brtson 'grus chen po// thogs pa byed par 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ ba ros dganon pa grub pa che ba yin te/ yid dge sa krung
307a7(mdo): thabs che ba// dkyil 'khor la/ dgu rnams kyis brgyan// sngo bsangs sku mdog zhal gsum pa// na chung gzhon nu'i cha byed can// nyid kyi rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rig sngags thams cad grol
307a8(mdo): mdzad zan/ dang po'i zhal 'dzum spyan gsum ldan// g.yas kyi zhal mdangs rngam pa'i tshul// mud pal sngon po la 'dab ma 'dra// mche ba bzhi ni tha tshes bzhin// lce ni klog ltar 'jigs par mdzad
307b1(mdo): nam g.yon med po ma mchu'i zlos// tshems kyis gnod pa'i rol stabs can// ma bya'i khri la legs par bzhugs/ kadub pu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// brgyan phyag nyi shu rtsa drug la// dang po gnyis
307b2(mdo): kyis rtsa ba 'as// phyag rgya rang gi thugs kar bcings// kayas rnams myi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // ral kri rin cen sbyin pa dang // bi dza pu la mda' dang ni// dgra sta dpag pa zo ba dang // lugs
307b3(mdo): kyu rdo rje sa gos dang / bkrang 'phreng 'dzin pa g.yas rnams so// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan dang // pad ma ril ba kyi thugs dang // zhags pa bzhu dang mdung thung dang // 'khor lo dung dang 'jig
307b4(mdo): 'dzub dang // bus pa bzang po zhag mdung dang // shes rab daglegs pa ma g.yodan rnams so// 'od sem dmar po'i 'phreng ba bcan// pad ma la bzhugs dpa la mdapas/ rgyan srud dang
307b5(mdo): An rtsig gu can/ nom pa sna tshogs cho 'phrul mdzad/ sa bon dgu las rgyal ba'i sku// rnam par 'phro mdzad thabs chen marnyes/ drag po 'i dgra tshogs pam mdzad pa// bkyes/ 
307b6(mdo): rnams shi dang tu 'jigs skrag nas// thal sbyar nas ni rnam par btud// de 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing // bsgrims te gas pa sngags brjod pa des// sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'thob na// dngos
307b7(mdo): grub gzham lta ci zhig smos// ting 'dzin dngo bo 'di mthong na// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// sdug bsngal thams cad rtag 'phrog cing // 'jigs pa kun las rgyal bar 'gyur// ji lta ba bsams pa
307b8(mdo): thams cad 'grub/ de la stan pas bsrung bar 'gyung // yon tad thams cad rdzogs par byed// thos chen mo'i kho mo'i dbang phyugs// drag po'i gzugs cad ma// zhal ras mtha' yam sa/ d+yan/ 
308a1(mdo): de rje rje drems/ rdo rje'i mtsha canas/ rdo rje'i snyucan pa/ da kri'i byan gad sa la'i ga dgasas canas/ drag yus can las kyang drag yul can gyigazugs can su spru pa snang bas sprul
308a2(mdo): ruru/ meng+ga 'gre lnga/ sa be / ma be shA/ 'awa~M snrubs kyi snab sa/ sa rA sa rba/ ma nas hA/ sa rA ya ma mA la tha ban tra 'ban tra/ dkad ha/ @/ hA 'dzi
308a3(mdo): gang ba yi pa dang / gnod pa'i nanan dang / mya yi de pa dang / ngas dang / rims na// gcig pa dang / ga gnyis pa dang / dgagasuMb dang zhag pazhi pa dang / dag bdud pa dang / rtag pa'i mi
308a4(mdo): phu rtsas pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro 'dus dang / yi dag sa dang / sha' dang / dad sbyin dang / srid po dang / shes bras kyi gdon nam po dang / mangs nas skyes pa dang / las pas skyes pa dang / 
308b1(mdo): brtse ba ldan 'das lha mo sprul byed ma'i mthu dang / stobs dang / byin gyis bdag lo gnod pa thams cad las 'dag/ dge bar gyu da cig/ 'phags pa lha mo sbrul byed ma'i gzungs// rdzogs pa
308b2(mdo): 'phags pa stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkod mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed la phyag 'tshal lo// 
308b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpung phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad d+ya tha/ oM dza ye dza ye/ ma ha dza ye/ dz+wa ya pa hi ni/ dza yod ta ra
308b4(mdo): ka l+ya ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ kriN k+kiN/ sarba karmas pa ra Na di mi/ sarbad nyan la sa d+heSh+Ti ti swatra/ na mo bka pa/ ti/ sa ha sra thA bi te/ sarba bud p+ta/ a ba lo ko tai/ tsam+bur+tha
308b5(mdo): kASh+Ta/ dza ba hA ka ya ma/ no bdi kanyalan/ bdi not+ta na sa ti pu ru pu ru/ su ru su du/ pra su mu pra su ru/ pu ra phu ra pra pu ra pra phu ra/ sarba bud d+ha/ A dISh+Ti te sA hA/ d+ha mad+ha
308b6(mdo): tug za sa tra/ a pA la sa da/ sarba dar ma/ a ba b+ho d+ha ni sa rba// / gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas skal dpa stong su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed do// 
308b7(mdo): sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thob par 'gyur ro// bskal da pa stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar byed do// tshe brjes na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lan stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus
308b8(mdo): na sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mtshan dus gsum nyid dus gsum yul na nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na/ de nas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la
309a1(mdo): ci 'dod pa'i rmi lam mi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gser mdog 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la/ de'i sems kyi dad pa myi byed par
309a2(mdo): 'gyung ngo ro// 'dil phan yon ni dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa stong 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @// phyag ba skad du/ a mya ngan
309a3(mdo): 'dzu bri ri/ bAn ta ra ka s+yad prad nya bud d+he bar dA ni/ na ma da ra ni// bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 
309a4(mdo): namo man 'dzu shrim ye ku ma ra/ pu ShA ya/ tad ya sa/ mam patsho/ bi ri tse/ shud d+he/ ba shud ste/ sho d+ha ne no ne/ bi sho dA ya bi na d+hu ya/ bi ma le/ dza ya ba ti/ dru ru ma le/ hUM hUM hUM/ paT
309a5(mdo): phaT/ swA hA// gang zhig 'di 'dzind pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang par 'gyur ro// lan cig glags na skal pa
309a6(mdo): stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mo khas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na/ rig pa 'dzin
309a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshams myed pa lnga byed kyang 'grub par ma gyur da na/ de'i tshe nga nyid 'tshams myed pa lnga byed pa yin zhing
309a8(mdo): rang nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ro// rje btsun 'phags pa 'das dpal gyi zhes rab blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rdzogs po
309b1(mdo): rgya kang skad tu/ a r+ya ma me dra ba ma ma/ dar de// bod skad tu/ 'phags pa snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag/ 
309b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lan/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
309b3(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya Tha/ mA~M ma mri ta ma mr-i ShI/ d+ha ba be/ oM ma mri ta a mr-i ti/ sa ma pa be/ a mr-i ta a sr-i ti/ bi ta bi gan ga ma ni/ ka ka ni ki
309b4(mdo): ra ti ka ra/ sarba bA yang ka bi swA hA// gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni 'di rnams te/ bskal pa stong du bstsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa/ yang / 'di lan gsum bzlas na/ de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// 
309b5(mdo): lan nyi shu ma gcig bzlas da / rtsa pa pana'i srung ba yang sdig pa sod sa su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dges shong de
309b6(mdo): sa gang ba da 'a nam pa dang / zhedang / mi dang/ sbyin nga/ drib sa sa pa'i 'jig rte sa ras te/ btsam 'du das kyis gsungs pa la ma ngadabang banyid / 
309b7(mdo): bldang ba latha' las zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkonas chog gsum la byug 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
309b8(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman kyi la bye bu khyod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad la hA/ oM bIg bya/ oM baM sha dza/ ma ta be+e na h+ya/ sa mum gte swA hA/ smad gtong ba'i tshe sngags kyis gdab pa/ 
310a1(mdo): rdzogs so// @/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya Tha/ oM mu ni drA
310a2(mdo): ne/ sa gra dA dArma/ ma nu kra tA d+ha me/ bI muka de da me \u0f7fs+ya tA nu grA dA d+ha r+the/ bI shra ma na/ pa ni brta na dArme/ sArba kar+ya ba ri pra pa na/ dArme/ sA mA ta nu pa ri pa rti na/ dAr+the swA hA/ au prad nye bru ti ba
310a3(mdo): rdza ye sa dA / dA d+ho rI ni swa hA/ oM prang nye ba le swA hA// 'di bzung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'bum bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i snying po rdzogs so// 
310a4(mdo): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// he b+he ba ka/ ban/ an hAshi ri ku ma ra ka te/ swA hA/ a bA pa/ swa pa bA/ sarba rArba nArmas pa b+ho d+hi ni swA hA// gzungs sngags 'di'i chog
310a5(mdo): ni/ 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang skal pa stong gi bar tul sa kyi sgrib pa brtsa gas pa thams cad zad par 'gyu ra ro// sangs rgyas stong gis bstsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thom
310a6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// che rjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i slad thob par 'gyur ro// shi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
310a7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum cu lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na/ ci 'dod pa skye lam tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can
310a8(mdo): yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang myi byed pa'i sems dad pa cad tu gyur te/ de la stsogs pa phan yon tshad myed pa 'byung ngo // stong smra ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
310b1(mdo): rdzogs so// / @#/ rgya kar skad tu/ a r+ya ma hA badz+ra me ru shi kha ra ku DA ka ra da ra ni/ bod skad du 'phags pa rdo rje le ra ba chen po'i
310b2(mdo): rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la lhun po chen po'i rtse mo na
310b3(mdo): khab pa bsnyegs pa rdo rje chen po la ting nge 'dzind kyi sa 'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa chen pos legs par brgyan pa / rdo rje cher po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa
310b4(mdo): sa phyogs rdo rje chen po la bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor lo 'i khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dab dpo brgya byin gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
310b5(mdo): gyis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstand pa'i cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa// chos zhes cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams ma khyedad pa nyid kyis
310b6(mdo): nges par 'byung ba na byang chub sems dpal bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa
310b7(mdo): mthu chen po thob pa// rdo rje chen po'i rnam par tha dad pa dang / hU~M ting nge 'dzid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston dpa/ sems kyi skad cig zang cig lud tsam gcig la son
310b8(mdo): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dus pa de bzhin gsheg
311a1(mdo): pa ma mchod pa chen po phrin gyis bzod pa dang / rnam par bdad pa'i sgon pa/ gzungs dang / rkyong ma 'dod dodapa/ dab dang / mngod par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi lanas
311a2(mdo): dang ga lam dpa sa dang / pha rol tu phyidad pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po na byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dka' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben
311a3(mdo): pa dang / yongs su byal ba'i sems kyi rgyad dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di la ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i byig dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang
311a4(mdo): lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje bsregs pa dang / rdorje phung po dang/ de rje do dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
311a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum khrag brgya bcu rtsa/ bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgrang kyi
311a6(mdo): pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sred pa kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shind tu rnam par grol ba// rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis myi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu
311a7(mdo): ched ma thob pa/ lwa ba chags pa skyed pa// thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bka chags kyis bon nges par gasregs pa shasag la 'di lta ste/ me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / 
311a8(mdo): tshe dang ldad pa byams pa'i bug pa po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga na dang / tshe dang ldad pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gas kyi bu ched po dang / me dang ldan pa bskul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag byed
311b1(mdo): dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lte brgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la stsogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po la stsogs
311b2(mdo): pa/ gzhan gtsang ma 'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs myed dpag tu myed pa/ gzhal tu myed pa dag dang / myi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu la stsogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang
311b3(mdo): la'i bu rab 'bab thal g.yog 'bab bral gyi ros kyi la'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dag la ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la ma bu thams cad kyi 'bod dang
311b4(mdo): lama' yin gyi dbang po lag bzangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sem dang / sma gcam dang / rnam par snang byed dang / ded dag la sogs pa lta ma yin gyi dbang po tshad myed grangs skyed dpag byed
311b5(mdo): pa pos dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma rmos pa dang / 'jog po dang / nong rgyas kyi bu dang / drab sprod dang / spobs kyi rgyud dang / pad ma dang / pad mo chen po dang / mtha' yas dang / 
311b6(mdo): de dge la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu byed pa rnaMs dang / myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa/ myi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog dum can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa / dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma
311b7(mdo): can dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog bya ma na dang / nam mkhal ldeng gi rgyal gser myig/ dam mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang
311b8(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / dor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gi rgyal po g.yog dum can dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten kyim bdun dang / 
312a1(mdo): srin mo chen mo 'dun dang / trab srong chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu ska dang / gza'i la thams na rje/ phyogs kyi lha rnams ma dang / phyogs 'tshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lA dang
312a2(mdo): dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgyegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtshor
312a3(mdo): lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi bzang dang / lag nape con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa sna chog
312a4(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred myed kyi bu'i rgya nga g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / 'phreng ba can dang / ljags cad dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / srin ta la la dang
312a5(mdo): log 'dren gyi dbang po bgyegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi la drug bcu dang / sring mo bzhi 'i mying po dang / bcas pa dang / ma bdun dang / rdo rje lugs kyu dang / rdo rje'i
312a6(mdo): lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang/ lag bzangs dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor du me dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang
312a7(mdo): chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 
312a8(mdo): sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / bsgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzi nad bcas dang / gnod po tshad myed dpag tu myed grangs myed pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang/ lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshigs
312b1(mdo): kyi lha dang nub ki dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / kanam sa'i lha rnams dang yang thabs gcig go// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni shi nad tu bskob/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shind/ 
312b2(mdo): tu yongs su mthar da phyind/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shind tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen de nyid kyi byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyi dad pa dang / sa brnyes pa ni shi nad tu yongs su yod
312b3(mdo): su bzung / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku brgyan/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad rnam par spras/ phyi gtsug ni sems cad thams cad kyis
312b4(mdo): bltar myi mthong / bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni bkrugs/ de kho na thams cad ni thugs su chud/ s+yan rnams ni mnga'/ rnam pa khris cad kyi mchog dang ni lAn/ thams cad mkhyend pa li ye shes dang ni ldan
312b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rko/ la ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni barma grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags khyu mchog
312b6(mdo): dang seng ge'i sgra ni smog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal da/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs myed dpag tu myed par/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
312b7(mdo): bsam gtan dang shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / dkal ba spyad pas mngon par 'grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 
312b8(mdo): dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje chen po la pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ rin po che dpa/ rdo rje'i pad ma li seng ge li khri ri rab tsam/ rdo rje dang
313a1(mdo): rin pa che dang / ma tag dang 'an pa 'dral phrag pa la 'ad 'a tum mams sol sa 'byung na/ de rnyed tshad pos dus gags byas nas legs pa ga da pa/ dod pa sa sa da
313a2(mdo): kyi kha nas byung ba'i grwa tig dmar po'i 'breng pa dang ldan pa'i snam te nad btsugs pa// rin po me du ma'i pad ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po e ke ke mra dang / ke ke mu ched mo dang / man da nA~MH dang / mtho ga chen zong
313a3(mdo): dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bam pas snang bar gyu dad pas kun tu mdzes pa/ ring po ched dpa rdo rje thur mas brgyan pa'i bdugs yulas bstod pad/ bye ba khraka khrig 'bus phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bsnyungs pa/ 
313a4(mdo): dpag bsams kyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa/ rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ kaser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong pas lug pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas phyogs mdzes par gyur da pa/ 
313a5(mdo): zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag/ bsams kyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi nas yang dag par rgyas pa/ chos stond te tshangs par spyod pa
313a6(mdo): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don babang za/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston/ 
313a7(mdo): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spunas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu stonod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum rkyen rje
313a8(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyu rad to// gang ga'i rlung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur to// sangs rgyas
313b1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' can yod// dang / da songs dang / dag bsnyen dang/ na pa dang / dang / dang / gnod byin dang / nibadang / mam yin dang / nam

313b3(mdo): snang ngo // skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde bsasems cad kyis tshis par gyur to// 'on pa rnams ni smramos so// long banams ni phyog thon mo// spyod pa rnams ni
313b4(mdo): drad pa rnyed do// ma gnams rnamos par gyur to// rnams rnams mi bde bar bcas so// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni myed par gyur te/ sud ma ma rnam
313b5(mdo): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gzhid rje'i 'jig rtend pa rnams kyi mying yang myi grag par gyur to// 'jig rtend kyi bar gang dag mun pa yun nag dang / kun pa mun nag chen por 'dun
313b6(mdo): pa de dag thams ca smrasas par snang bar gyur to// des sems can gang da/ skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig zhes so// denas sems can
313b7(mdo): de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dgal ba thob ste/ bde ba mchog gis tshim par gyu rad nas kun tu bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
314a1(mdo): rgyas mthong ste/ de dag gis gser gyi mchod sapa ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mdod par 'phags pa de mthong nas/ de nyid la skyabs su dngango // srubs su dong pa thag tu de dag de
314a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa 'i 'khor gyi dkyil de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du sems/ snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyurd par kun tu
314a3(mdo): snang ngo po// bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyams thag pa'i slar bya zhing smag nas byed do// bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rAm+bI por gyur da cing / lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la
314a4(mdo): smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bab rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar me we gcig tu gyur da pa dang / dge sbyong kolu ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa nas chos ston/ 
314a5(mdo): pa 'di ltos/ des bdag cag phung po// so 'tshams so// phyogs gangan gnas su gtol myed do// longs la da/ spyong kau luta ma de li gam tu dong ste/ bdud kyi yul 'di nub par byas
314a6(mdo): par ma gyur da tshun chad du gzhom mo// de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi la'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rjes/ bka' bzhina'i tshal zhes sbas nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ste / lag mtshon
314a7(mdo): mas tshogs pad/ lus la go masna tshogs bgos pa/ ma pyad dang rgyan sna tshogs dang / mche ba myi bshad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin gyi mug par gyur da pa// byig dang bzhin dang / sA kun tu 'bar zhim
314a8(mdo): rab tu 'bar ba dag skad ci/ de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas/ bdud sdig can ka la ba der dong ste phyind nas/ bdud sdig la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhengs pa zhengs thog par bzhud pa/ ji tsam du dge sbyong
314b1(mdo): goluta ma nyad thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dud dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang myi skyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul la gnod par myi gyu rad pa deng nyid du bye mar klog na/ 
314b2(mdo): rnam par gzhom mo// de nas bdud sdig can dka' zhing mgu ste/ shi nad tu dga' bsang / spu'i khung bu khyab nas/ du dang / rdza dang / rdza rnga dang / khang dza dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lugs kyi sil khrol dang /

314b7(mdo): pa lnga'i bcing pas bdag nyis bcings par mthong ngo // de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas/ po mtshar du gyu rad cing da/ 
314b8(mdo): ba zo za ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo // bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dkrol bar 'dod na dkrol ma nus te/ de bzhin / gshegs pa'i 'khod kyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan sngar shing rtsa ba
315a1(mdo): nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por bsgyel to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byabs pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos badrad pa'i s+yad gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor

315a3(mdo): bar thard pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzind rnam par 'phrul pa'i byedad kyi rlabs bsam gyis kyi khyab pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba kang kis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / 
315a4(mdo): bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dod pa rnams dang / gzhan yang ga bdag snang ba'i gagag sa dang / log 'dred dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang /
