315a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mi bstan da pa la ma lus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa/ de dag thams cad ka gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mog/ gsum la skabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang
315a7(mdo): mdad cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des dad 'gro log par ltung bar myi 'gro la'i phyir ro// de skad ces bkal yul pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
315a8(mdo): nas/ rin po che'i pad pa'i de rje la stan las langs te/ bla gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gakhad nas/ pul mo gams pa'i lung ngon pa che'i pad ma'i snying po la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gas pa'o/ 
315b1(mdo): logs su lal po sbyang ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// / sems can kus kyi nyod mongs pa/ ga bshig pa'i slad du 'dred pa byed
315b2(mdo): khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal/ 'jig rted rtsa la ka/ gcig pu khyod/ ba dad pa'i grong khyer 'dug pa'i lam/ ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus// yang dag brnyes nas zhugs rje yis/ 
315b3(mdo): brnyan pa'i thugs kyis bstand pa mdzad/ khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bzod dang brtsod 'grus bsam gtan dang // shes ras las stsogs yon tan gyis// bdag mdzad slad kyis sos/ 
315b4(mdo): can 'azud/ khyod kyis chos rnams kyi byed par// bkod de bzhin rnams kyi'ang// 'bras bu mdogs pa ma mchis pa kyel lo mgan po khyod kyis bshad// 'amad ma yan lag bcu
315b5(mdo): TIb// khyod nyid ma byed pa na la rab tu ba nas// mu stegs cad dang bdud 'dus te/ chos kyi zhab pa gsas par mdzad/ nyon mongs zag ce nas kun tu/ ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom dam
315b6(mdo): sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i// byang chub bla ma byed la brnyes// gang gi mtshan kyang rdzogs pa'i// byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba// khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig bu// dam pa rab sbyin bdag po la
315b7(mdo): skye na 'gon po byed nis// khyod spabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags// thugs rje chen po'i ye shes nyid// mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod// khyod kyis gshegs nas sems can rnams/ mas
315b8(mdo): kyis pamanas par tshal// ra ge la pa ba bta/ khyod kyis sgog cags nangs kyang 'azungs// sam pan can gyis mab ma// lashes byed kyis brgya gan ga ga/ 
316a1(mdo): 'jig nyid rnams kyang 'grol// kyis kyad ni yan lag bzang // 'gon tho 'khyod kyi 'ad bar gyi// dran pas 'jig rten na khams chub ste// mya ngan 'das las lug 'a bde// 
316a2(mdo): can kun gyis thob par mdzad// khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom mo// gza' rnams kun dang dgu zla dang // gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang // nor bu lam mer ma gyur da to// de nas gas pab bos
316a3(mdo): bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ yang rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas
316a4(mdo): rdo rje'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzind bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
316a5(mdo): rten kyi khams 'od rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho ni shar phyogs dma'/ lo phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dam
316a6(mdo): byang phyogs mapo na lho phyogs dmal/ steng mngon 'og dan la/ 'og mtho na steng zhena' bar gyur da to// phyogs thams cad dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur da nas
316a7(mdo): lam ye yad te ltung de'o// gsang pa pa'i bdag po la ka na rdo rje'i yan lag dang / nying lag gi/ 'tshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba rab tu 'bar pa kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar pa/ se we ka cin
316a8(mdo): gyung pa dag 'byung bar kun tu snang ngo // rdo rje snang ba'i 'bad pa des// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend gyi khams cad myed grangs myed dpag tu byed pa ji snyed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar/ 
316a9(mdo): dbus mtho na mtha' dmyal mtha' mngon dbus dam thal dmas mthal la
316b1(mdo): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mam dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ pa yang dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa
316b2(mdo): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa/ nyad thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa yi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag 'khor gyi khyams rgya ma zhing / rgya che ba dgar
316b3(mdo): kun tu snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag thas cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan sngar rdo rje 'bar ba snang ba chen po des snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa
316b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das spang ba chen po kun tu gdal ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub se mas dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rigs kyi bu
316b5(mdo): dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba/ myi mjed kyi 'jig rten kyi khams na ri rab kyi sted na chos stond te/ bcom ldan 'das des
316b6(mdo): bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel pa gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du
316b7(mdo): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston da cig ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thard pa'i sgo chen po 'i ting pe 'dzind la snyoms par
316b8(mdo): zhugs pa de'i rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi brlabs so// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu
317a1(mdo): de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis kyi khyab
317a2(mdo): pas 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dang / kas pa la pa li bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i srin
317a3(mdo): dang / gdugs kyi srin dang / rgyan 'phreng gi srin dang / dbul brgyan gyi srin dang / me tog ka srin dang / na bza'i srin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shag
317a4(mdo): kya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pararin po che'i pad ma'i rdo rje bdan la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das la logs su lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 
317a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas gnas nas/ rang rang gi rin po che'i padam li rdo rje'i sta nad de dag la 'khod par gyu dad to// de'i tshe shar phyog/ sa kyi logs na 'jig rte nadad kyi khams rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin
317a6(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i stong pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ba zhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
317a7(mdo): gzungs 'di nyid la brtsams te/ chos kyang stond to// rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten kyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyurd to// de nas 'jig rtend kyi khams de na/ byang chub
317a8(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa de 'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyu dad pa des po mtshar de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
317b1(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snye pos rab tu 'jom pa de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten kyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mug
317b2(mdo): bsngal thams cad rgyu dang chad tsas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'grol skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gzhan rje'i 'jig rten kyi sdug bsngal yams cad kyang myi gda' bar 'gyur/ lu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dpa
317b3(mdo): drim dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' li pa dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i 'grin ched pos dka' ba dang
317b4(mdo): yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'di su'i dgas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub
317b5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad cesabaka' stsald to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na myi mjedakyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
317b6(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya gug pa zhes bya ba// rdo rje chen po la de rib kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs stond to// bcom ldan 'das des kyi myug gi 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od cis
317b7(mdo): gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snga ba chen po des 'jig rtend kyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu 'khros nas lha'i bu thams cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / dpung gi
317b8(mdo): tshogs chen po dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba'i phyir lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje li 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings nas
318a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ra 'gyel te/ de la zhugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas pa ba li bdag po laka na rdo rje la ston da tshig par bka la chu byin nam// 
318a2(mdo): gsabab pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des/ rdo rje rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba li ting nge 'dzidad la snyoms par zhugs te/ yan lag dang nying laka ki 'tshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'dod rdo rje de dag
318a3(mdo): nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar pa'i sna ba'o// rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar pa'i spang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu byed pa rnams su 'jig rten kyi khams kang ka'i rlung gi bye sa dang mnyam pa ji snyed
318a4(mdo): bsdang bar byas te/ 'jig rtend kyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul byang chub sems dpal de dag gi 'khom gyi'i kyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul
318a5(mdo): bas ngo mtshar thob par gyu da pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la la nyid so sor zhus so// rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus/ bcom ldan
318a6(mdo): 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa de'i byad snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed par yang mthong ngo // de skad ces bkal su lad pa dang / de bzhi gshegs pa
318a7(mdo): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rje'i snying pos rab tu 'jom pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ce la gas med to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten pa kyi
318a8(mdo): khams gyi mjed des / de bzhin gshegs pa ma macas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal gag tu thub pa de blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkung 'gyi ba dang / gsangs pa'i bdag pa lag da
318b1(mdo): de yang dka' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa li sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'jom pas/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpan
318b2(mdo): chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la 'bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snyib po bcom ldan 'das des gan padas
318b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snyi'i pos rab tu 'jom pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ 'jig rten kyi khams de nas myi snang bar gyur da nas// nam mkhan
318b4(mdo): dkyil gyi las nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rtend
318b5(mdo): kyi khams myi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyind nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu smra ba na bsod na/ mas kyi tshogs chen po khastsags pa las grub pas byin pa'i rin po
318b6(mdo): che de dag las 'od zeb 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / lA pa sngon dang / lAng ser dang / btsod ka dang / shol dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / gser dang / pad
318b7(mdo): ma ma ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang / ke ke yu dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go mu ta ra ka dang / mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis
318b8(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa 'i 'jig rtend kyi khams la lan 'bum zag tu mar bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te/ 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur da te/ bcom ldan
319a1(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum 'tshogs pa 'jam pa mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas pa/ snus pa/ 
319a2(mdo): long bu gnyis rtsa myi mngon pa// pad ma ke sar kha phye ba lta bu du pa dang/ nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyan mtshan dang / pad ma dang / lugs kyu dang / chu srin gyi mtshan dang / ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag tu mar bskor ba byas nas
319a3(mdo): nub par gyur dad to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya nu tshad shing rta li pang lo tsam pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / 
319a4(mdo): an da snyil dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang / shel dang / ke ke ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag mthon to// de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go
319a5(mdo): snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung / ba'o// chub ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung b.li pad
319a6(mdo): ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni dud las kyi rgyu las byung
319a7(mdo): ba'o// dngus gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byi mu las byung ba dag go// snying po na shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba yi dud las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// 
319a8(mdo): ze 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni kai ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// 
319b1(mdo): chu ba ni gser gyi rgya las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni man da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ri ke ke ru'i rgya las byung ba dag go// snying po na du las kyi rgya las byug/ 
319b2(mdo): ba'o// ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni mad da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ke ke ru'i rgyu las kha'i pad ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las bya ba sa
319b3(mdo): dag go// snying po ni/ gse las byung ba'o// ze ba de sa nad rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// me 'bru mi byi ru las byung ba'o// tun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnas
319b4(mdo): kyi rgyu 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po na an/ da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung pa'o// chub ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// be 'bru ni shel gyi
319b5(mdo): rgyu las byung ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar rin po che rnam pa yum li mU las byung ba'i pad ma dag go// rin po che'i pad ma ri la yang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpal sos
319b6(mdo): dpal chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpal re rel lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo // 'od zer rtse mo re
319b7(mdo): re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ nor bu dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba 'i zla bas sras pa'i khang phran gyi rtse mo la seng ge lin
319b8(mdo): ba'i steng na/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba da dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan sbyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khyebs pa/ pad ma lag dang / an da rnyil dang / mar gad dang / bye dur+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / 
320a1(mdo): spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka pa chen po glad la 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi shing sa la gtsigs pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par sras te mdzes par byas pa / dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi 'phreng ki/ 
320a2(mdo): mthar mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril mu g.yer kha 'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i smras med par gyu dad pas rab tu dga' zhing grag pa'i phug ron dpa/ bya ba khang dang / ne tso dang / pi skyegs dang / rma bya'ing ro dag gis nyes dag
320a3(mdo): kha/ khyabs dang 'dun khang chen po la nye 'khor stegs pus bskor pas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i sgo/ khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i segs pu cad dang ldan pa/ bkra shis
320a4(mdo): kyi gser gyi bum pa du mas spos chu dri zhim pos chag chag gdab pa rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne'u gsing mar gad kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsa li 'da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs na bde
320a5(mdo): bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / tud pa dang / ka ka na ta ka li Sh+ya gnas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bdal ba'i phye ma gtos che pa rin po che sna bdun them sras kyi 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad
320a6(mdo): dang ldan pa'i rgyas yongs su gang ba/ grangs 'bum phrag tu mas kun nas yongs su bsod pa dag byung ngo // rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum zag dgu bcu rtsa dgu byung ngo // rin po che'i pa dang
320a7(mdo): re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas/ lha'i bu modag/ glu len gang byed cing yongs su myod do// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las
320a8(mdo): kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo // sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag myed cing // de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan pa// bas gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbapa gis kun sbyor ba/ 
320b1(mdo): ye shes smod pa de la sbubs su do bar phyis// bsam kyis kyi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan// thabs dang byang chub yan laka ting 'dzind nams kyi dag/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs dang ldan pa/ 
320b2(mdo): yi// thu pa gang yid de la mchod phyir dong bar gyis// 'das rdzab nas ni pad ma rgyas pa ci bzhin du// gang zhig nyon mongs 'das gyis rtag par myi gos pa// tshe dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par gsal ba'i// rgyal
320b3(mdo): pa 'jig rtend 'gon po de la blta phyir deng // gcig kyang myi ldan myin par gyur pa gang zhig gis// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams pa zhig cing // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dpyod pa rab zhi ba// shag rgyan
320b4(mdo): tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste/ 
320b5(mdo): kha cig tu ni rin po che'i srin gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo // kha cig tu me tog gi gdugs kyi srin gyi char/ kha cig tu tsan ta/ mas mchog dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i srin gyi cher
320b6(mdo): kha cig tu nigos kyi 'grephreng ba'i srin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni ka shi ba'i ras dang / du gu la'i ras dang / ma 'ug gi 'phrin kyi char/ kha cig tu nid pag bsams kyi shing ljon pa'i 'phrin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad pa
320b7(mdo): sud pa dang / ku mu da dang / pad pa dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / ka tsa lan ta dang / ma ha ka tsa lin dang / btang bzung chen po dang / bta/ bzung chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / 
320b8(mdo): ban 'ju sha ka chen po dang / man da ra ba chen po'i 'phrin gyi char mngon par bab po// me tog gi char de dag las prika pa byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zheng tshad myed grangs myed pa kang ga'i klung gi bye ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
321a1(mdo): dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo// 'jig rted kyi khams de dag sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug du skyes pa de dag thams cad khrings mchog tu bde bas ches zhing sems dka' ba btsun
321a2(mdo): te/ sug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas/ phan tshun 'dri ba dag/ 'jig rtend kyi khams myi mjed de na/ byang chub d+d+ho rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa/ rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // 
321a3(mdo): de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems cad gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang / dka' ba dang / rangs pa dang
321a4(mdo): dad pa lob nas// skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas par sngang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhir gshegs pa raH
321a5(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dpa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i srin chen pos
321a6(mdo): mchod nas/ lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu myed par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdud bskor pa byas nas bar snang las babs te/ 
321a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal byed khang gi 'ang pa brtsegs pa dag ra/ la'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin
321a8(mdo): cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod to// gang slad ngan 'gro sdug bsngal 'khrugs paldi// myir yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du myed mdzad dang // bsod nas
321b1(mdo): mya ldan sems cad rnams la rgyal ba mchog/ byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung // bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa li// sdig pa'i las gang shind tu bgyid dkal sna tshogs pa
321b2(mdo): de dag thub pa'i bya dgas de ring blo'ur du// skad cig du ni ji ltar rnam par zhi bar gyur pa// ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun dag kun bcom dang // ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas rig rnams sreg pa dang // bser
321b3(mdo): mas shing ba la ltar yang srin 'thor ji bzhin du// de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bder gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur da na// lhan cig skyes dpapa 'od zer dra bas
321b4(mdo): sdig 'phrog pa// 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i 'phros pa zhig pa'i// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyob par 'gyur myi mnga'/ myig dang 'gro dang snying dpa sha khrag tshil rnams dang // srog dang
321b5(mdo): sug dang bu rnams btsa' ltar bor nas ni/ phyi mtshungs sems can don phyir lugs rjes thugs ldan pa// 'jig rten da 'go/ na sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas ltogs
321b6(mdo): kha chu dang ro brgya ba'i mas rnams dang // de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod sring dang ldan pa la// zugs sde khyod cing rnas pa sa tshogs tshim mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchil/ 
321b7(mdo): gang ngag ma dang med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas// mchog tu ma pa'i sems can dmyal ba pasil bar 'gyur// rang bde la myi gzigs sems can brtsod 'grus phrugs ldanas// 'jig rten 'gon/ 
321b8(mdo): bras mnyam myed de sa phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon dang bral// stong pa gsum yang las kyi 'bras bu kyi 'dor zhing / 6/ ye zhes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang zhugs
322a1(mdo): rjes badran// myod pa tag byed dpang lan de la phyag 'tshal lo// kyem dpal lan rdo rdo'i snying lo bde gshegs zas// macan gyis mngan gtab sus pa 'od stong mang byung ba'i// rbab nam
322a2(mdo): dpyasna tshogs klu'is bdag cag tshim// skad cig gis mi dmyal bas sum bcu li la dbapa 'grum// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang de bzhin rgyal mas dang // de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu
322a3(mdo): zhi la chos// gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa// des myur 'jig rted pa thams cad bder gshegs thob par shog/ de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis// bcom ldan
322a4(mdo): 'das la bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal myed khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de/ chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems
322a5(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos// byang chub semasadapa'i rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bsta dad nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
322a6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ka na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyis chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i phrin chen po nas kyis mchod nas/ 
322a7(mdo): ting nge 'dzind de las langs te bar snang las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bub phrag tu ma mtha' yas mu myed par bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa la
322a8(mdo): lha ba rin po che pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang mgu ba skyes te/ de bzhin du
322b1(mdo): ba la ldan 'das la bltam// bkas nas kyang lda skad kyang nas tsa tu bcom zhan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgags mngod par bgad to// dran pa'i gsus 'phangs shes rab pa sa / 
322b2(mdo): ma 'pham mthur ldan bdud bzhi lam mdzad cing // 'jig rtend nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas// bla ma sris byed zla pa bzhin du lhung ngo'o// dam chos 'od ma gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba'is// 
322b3(mdo): 'dul ba'i pad ma 'i nags rnams kha phye nas// ye shes dam mkha' chel dro myed 'bar ba'i gzugs// nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bya ba'i bdud sde gdungs// mu stegs cad kyi dargyal mtha' dag pa pa mdad cim/ 
322b4(mdo): 'gro ba 'i 'dod chags rab gdungs ma lus rab gi mdzad// dge ba dalo tog kyi cheg yang dag 'phel mdzad pa// dge ba'i chang pa 'ab cing 'brug gang bslag tu gsa'o// 'gon pos su thegs can gyi
322b5(mdo): brgya pa ma mdzad cing // bdud nas bcom ste byang chub de pa rab brnye/ sa nas// ma 'dres brtsegs pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthul mnga' ba// skye ba'i 'jigs las rab grol seng ge ji bzhin spogs// 
322b6(mdo): spyod pa zab cing brtan la rtag tu myi dpogs pa// sos can gnas kyu rang stobs dang ting 'dzind nor bu bkram// dri myed chos ldan 'dul ba'ing pos rnam 'dzind pa// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gsol ba/ 
322b7(mdo): chung khrims bzang po'i rtse ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel// byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ka 'thungs pas mdzes// byang chub yan lag las gyi 'bru chags 'dod byas bsnyen // bsod nas dpag bsams shis
322b8(mdo): khyod de ring ka las byung // sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan// dpe byad bzang mchog rin cen/ man shel gyis bskor cing // sa dang dbang dang dam chos phud pa brtan btab pa// lhun po bzhi
323a1(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang ste/ rin po la'i bad pa 'i snying po labyod pa tu yun no// rigs kyi bu de da/ thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i byed// de bzhin du rin po tshan
323a2(mdo): pad ma'i snying po la 'khod do// de bzhin du sbya te/ de ltar lo phyogs mde bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs nam sangs rgyas dpal gyi snyom pa brtsegs pa rnam pa bsgrags pa'i rgyal po 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
323a3(mdo): 'jig rtend kyi khams dpal byung ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rdo rje thog ces bya ba khyabyang chub sems dpa' bye ba khwag/ khrig 'bum phrag tu mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du 'ad pa nas 'jog
323a4(mdo): rtend kyi khams myi mjed 'di 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kanang nas/ rigs kyi de dag dang yun cig tu rin po che'i pad ma'i/ snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du nub phyogs/ 
323a5(mdo): na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i langs rgyas mo dpag myed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten kyi khabs bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po s+ya ngas
323a6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu che thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 'ag khrig 'bum phrag dums yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdang ba nas/ 'jig rtend kyi khams rgya
323a7(mdo): mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
323b1(mdo): brtan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa bye ba khrag thog 'breb/ rnams yangs su bzhed te/ mdun du ba dang banas/ 'jig te/ nakyi khams kyi mjed 'dir mongs te/ bcom san sa kyis nan nam
323b2(mdo): dran ma tshol pad ma'i snying po la 'dun cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang byos nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du na pa che'i bad pa'i snying po dag la 'bad pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin tu gang sgo'i phyogs na// bcob na
323b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten kyi 'ams the com dang bral ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla
323b4(mdo): gros bzang po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum zag tu mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun du 'dar pa nas/ 'jig rtend kyi khams myi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ 
324a1(mdo): rin po che'i pad pa 'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin bu rin po che pad pa'i snying po lha 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du lo nub kyi phyogs na/ bcom ldan
324a2(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rted kyi khams rin po brtsegs pa nas/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpal
324a3(mdo): chen po ngani chen blo gros zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khwa/ khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskoram te/ mdun du zad pa nas/ 'jig rten kyi khams kyi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka dang
324a4(mdo): nas/ chos nyad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'ache pa de dag dang ldan cig tu rin ma tshol 'ad pa'i snying po la wa/ nga / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phying
324a5(mdo): de bzhin gu rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'bod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
324a6(mdo): chen 'das la rab tu gnas pa'i ridabang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad la bkod pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam ma kha'i blo thos zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba wa/ 
324a7(mdo): zhus pa/ dums yongs su 'dod te/ mdun du bdang ldanapa/ 'dzig rtend kyi mas kyi mjed 'dir 'ongs par gyud te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas gnang das/ rin po tsho pad dma'i snying po la 'dug cing/ rigs
324a8(mdo): bu de da/ thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du rin po che'i pad pa'i snying po dgal 'bod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin su phreng gi phyog sa da/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
324b1(mdo): sangs rgyas gsum las rnam par dul ba'i dpas kyi langs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rted kyi khams bdud kyi cher las bzhugs pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi slob pa las rnam par byas pa zhes bya ba
324b2(mdo): 'bras zag sa pa yongs su banod/ na na pa nadzad 'daran/ ngan pa ci'i ma dpa'i bya
324b3(mdo): dgan dmang ba ma'i bdag so la ka di rje'i rnam par bdad pamig cin pa mata nge 'dzid nas par phra ladas ma byin byas brlabs kyis de bzhin du legs pas brgyan pa kun tu dnga'o// 'a nyid kyil pam des/ 
325a1(mdo): sa zhing mnyen pa matu zhan shing padam dang sa gzhanon ga gas / mdzas mang macan/ dun pa dang / rnam pa dadang / sanas kya dang / / nas byed

325a4(mdo): ka' bar bya bar byin gyis labyugs Na da kyang dzag ca 'dug rted kyi 'ams mas dag ra pa nga / 'dan pa kyi nas kyi zug kya bdud dag dang / na
325a5(mdo): mas ca ca gcad pa dang / rnam pa gzhig pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems pa tshad ni sem pa dang po tsun/ bems zhum brtsod mas brtan pa ma yin mamago ca nas/ 
325b1(mdo): rnams kyang yang dag par gzengs pastod pa rnams dang / rab tu dka' bar byas nas/ khams gsum par rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bang dag kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang / sangs/ 
325b2(mdo): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs myi gcad pa'i phyir khyod rdo rje'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzi dad bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsas kyis myi khyab pas bsogs pa yongs su rdzogs
325b3(mdo): pas grub pa'i mtshan dang / dpel byad bzang pos sras pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthus
325b4(mdo): grub pa / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/ sems can dmyal pa dang / da tud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / ya degs dang / gshin rje'i 'dzin
325b5(mdo): rtend tu ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i bdud kyi cher ma ma lus par 'don pa/ lA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / la/ ma yin da nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /

325b7(mdo): legs so legs so zhes bka' stsa lad to// de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsad pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod de/ rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ rang rang gi phyag
325b8(mdo): bskums te/ dang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du bzud pa'i phyir/ 'jig rtend kyi khams myi mjed du bkye'o// de dag gi gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
326a1(mdo): chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs

326a4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya grub pas de lachi/ gsang sa pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// gsang ba bra'i bdag po la ka na do rje/ bdud sdig cad 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas
326a5(mdo): bcings pas 'di las khrol la ci nas kyang / sangs rgyas la skyabs/ su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro bar rgyu/ ra ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang
326a6(mdo): gzhan yang sa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / drin dang / lA ma yin/ dang / dam mkhal ldong dang / byi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chedan po des gyi dang khyi ma yin pa gang dag ci tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
326a7(mdo): ba la bzhugs par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstadad pa la zhugs nas kyang / ci nas kyang khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / gas ba pa'i bdag po lag na
326a8(mdo): de rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsamed te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ yang rdo rje'i rnam par thadad pa'i sgo chen po 'i ti nga 'dzid 'an
326b1(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo chen po la ting nge 'dzind bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed
326b2(mdo): pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ches ches
326b3(mdo): rab tu chem ches/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur da te/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba non
326b4(mdo): po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa brtsigs te/ mchu/ mnan nas me lce chen po ltar sma par ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/ myi bzad pa rna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul drug 'thor
326b5(mdo): dang / ba lang sna lta bu dang / kabang bu lta bu dang / sbrul chen po kha kade ngas pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug po 'bang bar 'byung pa'i tshogs kyi phreng ba bzhin du me 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag dus
326b6(mdo): la de rje dang / dgas pa dang / gtun shing dang / gtun zhing skyed nyeg dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags sgrog las sogs pa sogs pa'i mtshon mal rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i sna bas stong gsum gyi/ 
326b7(mdo): gang chen pa'i 'jig rten kyi 'ams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gnob sbyin dang / srin pa dang / sde dgas dang / sha sa dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / brtsegs dang / log 'dren la phrogs pa/ slong / 
326b8(mdo): rab tu snang ba'i sems can smag par byed pa/ ri dgas kyi dbang po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa shas thabs su gos pa// sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram tu das du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 
327a1(mdo): 'chi bdag kyang skrag par byed pa khams gsum pa thams cad bsdus pa lta buli lu sa dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur de nas/ lus kyi tshigs thams cad las khro bo kha dog tudu ma 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / 
327a2(mdo): ser po dang / dmar po dang/ dkar po dang / nag po dang / thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ khro mnyer myi mnyam par rnam par sbas pa'i gnyer ma'i khrim/ gnyer can gyi bral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i rdul
327a3(mdo): kyi thigs pa rtsub po 'dzag pa las/ drug 'chang rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang nying lag kun tu bkres pa'i mngon rtags can tu 'gyur zhing / rdo rje drag shul can du snang ste/ mche ba myi bzad par 'dug

327a5(mdo): nas/ rlabs chen po g.yo las/ rta rgod ma'i kha nas me byung ba labu'i hUM zhes bya ba zal cing brtan pas sgrub dang myi rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste/ 'byer zhing 'thor nas spangs te
327a6(mdo): skyabs su 'dong zhing / 'dud pas nyis spong bas lhag par 'bar pa'i lus rnams mthong ba na/ swa skad spud can zhom pa lta bu'i bug zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang na/ sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil ba'i gtsug gnong du'i
327a7(mdo): 'od kyis bkram pa rnam par mdzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa/ ltar ser zhing 'bar ba'i myag ka 'bras bu'i 'od zed kyis/ skra'i tshogs rtsub zhing gshong pa gyed du 'greng ba'i rtse mos brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyurd pa/ 
327a8(mdo): sbrul gyi ga/ dengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing / sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyad dang / gdu bu dang / rna chas lus brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri me myed cing draka shul can bye/ 
327b1(mdo): bzad pa lag nathogs pa/ 'thub mo rnam ma dang hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra chen po ladag gis 'gyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kun tu bsdigs pa dag 'bon te/ gang de dag ga phyog dang / kha nas gnas grub pa la/ rlom
327b2(mdo): sgra chen po'i tshigs las/ me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/ des sdang ba 'i 'gyegs dang / log 'dred la sogs pa drag shul can drag gi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa cad sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
327b3(mdo): spa ba snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams tshig par byed pa/ mongs par byed pa/ chos par byed de/ skye bzad la/ drag pa// rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yid du gyi 'ong ba'i tshong pa myong bar byed do// de dag tsho
327b4(mdo): bas nyen pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ngo // de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis brtsegs dang / log 'dren de dag chod pa dachen pos nyen te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dong ba la rdo
327b5(mdo): nas/ 'jigs spangs spag ste/ skyabs tam rnyed nas rlung drug thos pasmod pa'i ga po bzhin du/ 'dad rab tu 'dar te/ byab 'dod na yang du ma nus nas/ ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad gso
327b6(mdo): pa myed par gyur to// de nas gsad pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdud sdig can 'dul bar 'dod de/ sdang ba gdon dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
327b7(mdo): thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ rdo rje'i rnam par thard pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa
327b8(mdo): drag shul gyi gzugs can seng ge'i sgra chen po'i hUM zhes bya ba 'byin pa gnyis phyung ste/ de gnyis skar mda' chen po bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil bu rgyang ring du 'phur te/ nam mkhal la gnas bzhin du shugs kyis bcom ldan/ 
328a1(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhag kya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag tu ma mtha' yas mu byed par bskor ba byas te/ gsabab pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
328a2(mdo): 'di ska ces smras pa/ garigs kyi buci bgyi ba bka' grol cig/ de nas gas ba pa'i bdan po lagan rdon chub gyi lba bar 'dug ste/ yang bral ba'i dkyis nas dadzin po 'jigs mtshan pa la gzugs
328a3(mdo): mche ba mye bzad pas drag pa 'jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs te/ margya ma rung bar bskul pa'i kha nas nus kyi 'jig pa'i che/ rnam par 'thor drung drag po'i shugs kyis/ rab tu bskyod pa'i srin nag po'i tshogs
328a4(mdo): rab tu sgrogs pa de rnam par bkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra grag po lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra spang ba/ bgyegs dpa log/ 'dren thams cad 'jigs nas/ 'bros shing sgyid lug nas phyogs
328a5(mdo): bslag par byed pa/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / sen mo dang / myig dang / mgacom dang / sgra thams cad rdo rje 'bang bar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten da rgyas pam 'byings pa
328a6(mdo): gzi brjid cad bams cad kyig 'i brjid napas rang gi ga'i brjid kyis yi'i du brlag par byed cing chung ring tu byed pa/ de ni 'bar ba'i skang ba des spyog pa dang / kaka' dang rkang pa dang / nor bu rnams rgya 'od las
328a7(mdo): ma yid/ lha pa sa yid/ yang dang pa yin par byed pa/ gang na nyi ma dang / zab tu 'phrul dbang bar mags pa/ mthu tsho ga sang las ze pa yin/ gad ma yin/ gang de ma yin pa
328a8(mdo): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi 'das rtogs pa pa'od gzhan 'ams cad migasag por byed pa gzhan srung ngo // de nam
328b1(mdo): rdo rje 'khro bo des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha yas mu myed par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ 
328b2(mdo): kasang ba pa'i bdag po las na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu cibagyis pa bka' stsold cig/ 'di nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ga da rdo rjes khro bo chen po de rje khro ba chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras
328b3(mdo): so// skyes bu dam pa dag deng la btud sdig can dkon mchog gsum la sbubs su 'dzind du tug cig/ 'did pa tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ gzhan yang gang dag snang ba gdod dang / bkyegs dang / log
328b4(mdo): 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba cad snang / ne pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i bstan
328b5(mdo): pa la myi 'jug pa dang / myi rtogs pa dang / yid khyi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la gnas par gyis shig da de sems can thams cad kyi yun ring po la don dang / pan pa dang / 
328b6(mdo): bde bapa 'gyur ro// de skad ces sbas pa dang / khro ba chen po rdo rje 'khro ba de dag gis gsang pa pa'i bdag po laka na rdo rje'i tshigs nyan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsu dad pa yang bzung ste/ dus gci
328b7(mdo): tu sgra skad kyir ro gcig tu ser ge'i sgra skad chen po'i hung zhes bya ba das/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams rgyas par 'gyengs shing gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas la phyag
328b8(mdo): 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMs dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag
329a1(mdo): 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i lugs kyu la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'i lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
329a2(mdo): rdo rje li ka nas lugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i be con la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i yan lag dam pa la phyag 'tshal mo// stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// de rjen par
329a3(mdo): 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro lda ba la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i khro bo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// // tad d+ya thA/ traT tra Ta/ tro Ta yai troT ya/ 
329a4(mdo): sUT suk+Sha/ s+phoT ya sos ya/ mod la mod / mdos la mo Na ya/ neku na gun/ kun pa ya kun pa ya/ sarba sa twa ni/ tAsa?dardzas/ tA sa ya tra sa ya/ pA ma bA pa/ bA ma ya bA ma la/ 
329a5(mdo): sarba pUlu ta ni/ kud Ta kudaT/ sang kud Ta ya sang ku da Ta ya/ sa prasha drA na/ kud Ta kA daT/ sa g+had Ta ya sad kAd Ta ya/ sarba byid d+yam/ badz+ra badz+ra s+pho ta ya/ badz+ra badz+ra ka ta/ badz+ra
329a6(mdo): badz+ra ma ta/ badz+ra badz+ra dz+rod tsa Ta ya/ badz+ra badz+ra rjod tsag ya/ badz+ra badz+ra krod tsa Ta ya/ badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+ra badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra badz+ra da ha/ badz+ra badz+ra pa tsa/ badz+ra badz+ra ma Sha/ badz+ra badz+rod sa da ya/ ya hA badz+ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ 
329a7(mdo): badz+ra pra ni pri ya/ ka ha ka ha/ ha sa ha sa/ ma had Ta da Ta ha sa// / kha cig tu rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'khrugs pa la/ bung zab cing 'jigs su rung ba'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras/ sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i
329a8(mdo): bgegs dang / log 'dred kun tu skrag par byed pa/ sdang ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/ 'joms su gsal du gsol// hUM hU~M saT/ badz+ra ba ra pra ta/ sarba/ bsgrub pa lha dang / lA ma yin dang / 
329b1(mdo): lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs mthar phyi da pa/ 'byed par mdzad pa// hUM hUM saT/ he te swa Ta/ sa mo g+ha swaT/ 
329b2(mdo): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha khang khyib dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phrugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du bsngal tu gsol// hU~M hU~M saT/ 'byer pa bgyid du stsal du gsol// hU~M hU~M swaT
329b3(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol// hU~M hu laT/ 'byed par bgyid du sbal tu gsol// hU~M swa rba/ 
329b4(mdo): la'i dbang po brgya byid khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du sbal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M sA Ta/ 'thab bral ba'i lu khang khyim dang bcas pa
329b5(mdo): bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar/ bgyid du stsal du gsol// hU~M hU~M s+pha Ta/ dga' ldan gyi lha/ khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang / 
329b6(mdo): la ka dang bcas pa/ g.yol bar bgyid du gsul du gsol// hU~M hU~M s+phaT/ 'phrul dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyogs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ 
329b7(mdo): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du gsal du gsol// hUM hU~M saT/ he he sA Ta// de bzhin du 'od gsal dang
329b8(mdo): tshangs ris nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og byin gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ba dang / phyogs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa/ g.yo bar bgyid du gsal du gsol// hUM hU~M swaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du
330a1(mdo): gsal tu gsol// rigs sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad du ge so lang/ rmugs par mjed drug zi mong dang rmongs par mdzad bya gsol/ bcu par gsol/ bcad du gsol/ gzhig pu gsol// 
330a2(mdo): rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ gnan tu gsol// hUM hU~M saT/ oM khro bo chen po rnam par bkra ba ser skya bo// rag po/ dmar ser po/ byi 'pham pa/ rtag tu rab tu 'bar ba'i khro ba/ su ru su ru/ su ru mu/ 
330a3(mdo): ru mu ru/ ku ru tu rU tu ru/ ku ru lu ru ku ru/ d+hu ru du ru ru du/ za ra ma ma ba ra/ b+ha ra bA ra/ ha ba ha ra/ ya~M ra ya ra ma ra ma ra/ ku hu ku hU/ rtsi la rtsi lo// mi li mi li/ lu Tu lu ny+tsa/ sarban rdza ma/ 
330a4(mdo): ma lu bu lu/ pu le na tAm/ lo ha si le na tam/ ma lu la la se/ tsu lu tsu len tam/ ma lu pu len tam/ ma lu drA thi/ ku wi/ pra rtsu len/ mya byur k+ta/ N+yan+tu/ pU ru n+ya/ su ru su ru/ su mu bu mra
330a5(mdo): su mu su mu ru/ Ta kaSh+Ti/ bi ka Te/ ni ka te/ kaT/ bi ka Te/ ka Tad ka Te/ dza ye bi khA yaM/ ma yan ti/ bi dza lan d+hi/ ting ming gi so/ ma ha ting mi g-i sa~M/ pU lu ta pa ga be/ bu ta \u0f7f
330a6(mdo): ma ye Ne// sdang ba rnams la rjes su 'doms pa/ ma dul rnams dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byer par mdzad pa/ dpal bo rnams kyi nang na dpa' ba/ nges pa rnams kyi nang na des pa/ ma grub pa rnams
330a7(mdo): grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud myi za bar byed pa/ sems cad thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas// mna' bsgags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ 
330a8(mdo): de rje'i rigs kyi rigs lags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa chung gshegs chung gshegs/ do rje'i mi ba kyi ci mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyin sangs dang / sru dang / gnod sbyid dang / lam
330b1(mdo): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / phyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun gradam tshig gang bcas pa rjes su bskad du gsol// rjes su bskang du gso'o// gshegs su gsos / myur du gshegs su

330b3(mdo): shind tu sgrub par byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ de rje'i phur ba la swA hA/ do rjes 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ de tre ki li ki li le swA hA/ drag po ke li ki li sa pA NAM/ 
330b4(mdo): dbang po ke li ko li la sa hUM/ byis pa ke li ki lo lA swA hA/ sa ba rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA bdag po'i gnod pa dang / dang 'go ba thams cad dang / rim
330b5(mdo): thams cad skyed par mdzod cig sa // de nas rdo rje khro ba chen po rdzas 'di smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzin tend kyi khams 'dinam pa drug phu g.yos te/ phyogs dang phyogs
330b6(mdo): gnas pa'i thunan pa dang / gachen po dang / lam yin chen po de dag pas pa ba kyang sa mchog nas sason nyid/ rirab kyi na spyan 'an nyi/ gyen du byung nas macom lan dag gsums su dang // da dun
331a1(mdo): shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ snang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'i 'brung po dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar rab tu 'a
331a2(mdo): zhing / kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur da pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'jom par shes te/ de dag sdug bsngal myi bzad cing draka la rtsub pas/ nyed nas ha ha zhes
331a3(mdo): bya ba'i nga skad 'dod cing / tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gas bab pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur tu bgyid na/ 'jigs pa chen por ltung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab
331a4(mdo): du gsol/ yongs su bskye ba tu gsol/ bgyegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhid du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad na gnas pa dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / lteng ka dang / rdzi pad/

331a8(mdo): 'bar/ kun tu 'bar zhing kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur da par snang po// gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos sngangs skrag ste/ rang rang

331b3(mdo): skyabs su so / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang phyag 'tshal te/ khro bo chen po rje khro ba de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su skyobs shig/ yongs su spobs shig/

332a1(mdo): slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// bsti bstang bya'o// rim 'gror bya'o// mchod pa bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bcu

332a5(mdo): par gyis// de skad ces smras pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa/ li 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rang rang gi lag/ gi snyim pa na me tog gi phur ma thogs par shes te/ me tog gi phur

332b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che ligazhal myed khang chen po dpag bsas kyi shing tu mas myig mangs ris su bres pa'i/ rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang /

332b4(mdo): pa dri zhim po'inged kyis dri zhes par byas pa/ bye ma rmi zhim pol ba sgo ba bsgos pa/ la'i bu mo 'bru zag tu ma yis spyan dang / mig dob pa dang / klu len kar byed pa rdzing bu yan lag brgyan dang smad pa'i na
332b5(mdo): can 'buM phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po dang / ud pa la dang / dri mchog dang / pas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa byung nas/ de mchog tu dgan
332b6(mdo): ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas/ bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnab par 'phrul 'a chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyi gas kyi bo la blangs te
332b7(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsad pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dgal ba yang / mchod pa'i phyir phul ti/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag la dbang byed dpang
332b8(mdo): gyis 'byor gyur da pa// stobs bcu 'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brtend nas su// byang chub phyir na tshogs bral dri myed byang chub sems// sems can bde' sprub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob// 
333a1(mdo): bdag myig gti'i mug mun pas tri can dri myed gyur// srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing 'dod pa'i spros dang bral// mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstand// sems dmyal mya
333a2(mdo): bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// sdig par 'jig rten mgon la skyabs su ma song ba// kye ma dman pa yun ring ji ltar bskus zhig ku// de'i bshub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang // dbang dang snying
333a3(mdo): ting 'dzin mthong nas ngo mtshar dgyu rad// sa 'gon cig khur sangs rgyas myur grub shog/ gcig pus 'gro ba mu lus mya ngan bzla bar bya// srid pa gzhan na kun tu rgyu tshe bdag gi yid// rang phan 'jug dang dge ba shes
333a4(mdo): 'bral bar ma gyur dacig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dpa' tra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis// gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas kas
333a5(mdo): pa ba'i bdag po la ka na rdo rjes khro bo chen ze rdo rje de dag la 'di skad sa smras so// rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang gdon dang bgyegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad kang gis sems can thams
333a6(mdo): cad las rnam par thom pa la rnam par myi 'tshel ba dang / bgyegs myi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar gyur da bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzind tu chug cig/ rigs kyi bu
333a7(mdo): dag 'di dag la myi 'jigs pa yang byin cig dang / des sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang / bdel ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa bla na myed pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo chen
333a8(mdo): rdo n+de zhwa ba de dag gas gsangs pa'i bdag lo lag na rdo rje la legs mo zhes te// tshig la mkhyen par dka' nas/ ya \u0f88\u0f90 dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / ska ma yin dang / na ma mkha' lding dang / kyai 'am
333b1(mdo): dang na pa lho 'phye chen po las sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / sdang ba dang bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma mo dang yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed dang / srul khro dpa / 
333b2(mdo): lus srul po dang / ro langs dang / mkhal 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang skal 'dzind bcas pa las stsogs pa de dag thams cad dang / gdon gyi tshogs de thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po mang po bab pas dkrugs kha'i
333b3(mdo): mtsho' chen po zab mo kri ba 'khyil ba'u pa'ur skra 'byung ba ltar drag cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pas 'di skad ces smras so// sdang ba 'byung po dang / gdon dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren las stsogs pa
333b4(mdo): drag shul can trag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ khyed thams cad nyon cig/ khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang
333b5(mdo): dag de bzhin gshegs kha'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang / nged las btsogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub pa 'am/ klog pa de dag la bgyegs 'byung bar myi bya zhing 'che bar myi bya ste/ 
333b6(mdo): sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i stobs sbyin par bya'o// sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bskyang bar bya/ zhi ba dang bde la legs su 'gyur ba dang / chud pa spang ba dang / dug kazhil ba dang
333b7(mdo): rkyen gamang ba dang / rigs sngags sgrub pa sbyin paras bya'o// smang ci dang / tshigs pa dang / lkog pa dang / ke'u dang / gtam sa dang / 'byung po dang myi 'grub pa rnams kyi sha dang zas thos kyang skyon du myig tsu
333b8(mdo): zhing nyes par myi bci'o// de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang / gdod dang / bgyegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ skra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so// zhes bya ba'i
334a1(mdo): bdudu de bzhin du sbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung gsol ba de bzhin du 'ams cad bkyi'o// deng sman chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chas dang dege 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems cad/ 
334a2(mdo): thams cad kyi don tu tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag yo la ka na rdo rje khro bo de dag dang / sdang ba'i 'byegs dang / log 'dzin dang / 'byung po dang / 
334a3(mdo): gdon gyi tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs sngags kyi las dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'ja nid du bcug go// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar/ 
334a4(mdo): ba'o sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzind de las langs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul skye
334a5(mdo): cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstand pa dang / bdud sdig can yang byang/ chug tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang sdang ba dang gdon dang 'byung po dang / bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang dam
334a6(mdo): tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di myong ci zhes bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 
334a7(mdo): brgyan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzind de myong dang yi ge dang / sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mying dang / gzugs sam/ dbyibs sam/ gnas sam/ mnyam par bzhag/ 
334a8(mdo): pa 'am/ yengs pa yang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang myed do// ka la mying myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa dang / dbyibs myed pa dang / gnas myed pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa myed pa dang / 
334b1(mdo): g.yeng ba byed pa de btsun pa ga rang ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzidid 'di'i mying ci zhes bya zhes de la ji lta de snyam du sems/ yang btsun bshar dwa ti'i bu gsal yar byed pa 'di ni bdag la gsal bar byed pa ma yin
334b2(mdo): gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin no// gnyi ga la gsal bar byed pa ya yin te/ 'od kyang gsal 'du byed par btags pa yod do// de la gsal par byed pa'i gams bar byed pa'i dag nyid kyi du
334b3(mdo): bdag ni bdag gis stong / gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stor/ gnyig yang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro// 'dzang zhes rgyal lo yi gi gnyis kyi tshig de
334b4(mdo): tshig gi bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yi ge yang yi ge ma yin no// de ltar na nyed cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no// dran de brjod pan yang gang nas kyang gyi 'ong / gang du yang gyi 'gro me kyi
334b5(mdo): gzhan gyi dbang la rten pa'i phyim yi ker btags pa yang yod do// yongs su btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa yang stong pa'o// / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyang stong pa'o// 
334b6(mdo): rgyu dang rkyend las byung ba'i phyir tend cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang spyod pa'o// blo bu mang rgyu dang rkyend kyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba yang 'thung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo // de la rten cing 'brel bar
334b7(mdo): 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma dor ba de bzhin nyid do// ma dor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma
334b8(mdo): yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzind to// ting nge 'dzin dgang yin pa de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo // 
335a1(mdo): lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so// zhi gnas gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar da ba'o// rnam par tha rad pa gang yin pa de ni dbul ma la lam yin no// dbul ma'i lam gang yin pa de la ni mtha' gcig
335a2(mdo): myed/ mtha' gnyis myed/ gzung ba myed/ 'dzin pa myed/ 'jig pa myed/ 'chad pa myed/ rtag pa myed// skye ba myed/ 'gag pa myed/ rtog pa myed/ rnam par rtog pa myed/ rang dbang myed/ gzhan gyi dbang
335a3(mdo): myed/ 'gro ba myed/ 'ong ba myed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed/ rnam par byang ba myed/ 'du ba myed 'bral ba myed de/ de ni lhag mthong yin no// lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams myed/ khams rnam
335a4(mdo): myed/ skye mched rnams myed/ yul rnams myed/ yul du gang dgas pa myed/ las myed/ las kyi 'bras bu myed do// kang dal las myed cing las kyi 'bras bu myed pa de/ bla na myed pa yang dag
335a5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa rji byang chub kang yi bde blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas so// blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
335a6(mdo): gang yin pa de chos so// chos gang yin pa de myi skye'o// myi 'chi'o// myi skye myi 'chi ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge
335a7(mdo): 'dzinid bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni shand tu zab ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba yang myed na/ 'jig rten pa'i mu stegs dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos
335a8(mdo): te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa ni ba rtog so// 
335b1(mdo): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ni dmyigs pa myed pa la gnas myed pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ka na rdo rjes/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i yul 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
335b2(mdo): bag ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi
335b3(mdo): myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa yin na/ de ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstand cing
335b4(mdo): dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku legs par brgya nad/ ji ltar de ba zhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par gzhag par blta la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
335b5(mdo): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su/ tem bcu la \u0f7f gnyis shes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi 'da'i tshig go/ 
335b6(mdo): brgyadan ces bya ba de ni spros pa'i yi ge dang smra'o// dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sbrus dang skyi las kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni nam ma kha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// 
335b7(mdo): sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de ni tshigs gnyis kyis skul ba'i mtshan nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/ de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni
335b8(mdo): bsod nams chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do// bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa gang yin la de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longasuspyod pa'i sku ste/ 'odadi yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las dang
336a1(mdo): sku'i gsang pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gsupa zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs
336a2(mdo): pa'i 'khrul ba'i sku'o// rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba la chad pa myed pa dang / rtag pa myed par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam kyis 'jug pa/ bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya
336a3(mdo): pa ste/ dmyigs pa myed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas stong pa/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ yid rang gi ngo bo'i yul ma yin pa/ gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
336a4(mdo): gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams la rnam par gzhag pa ni de ltar bltal bar bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
336a5(mdo): pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu'am li lam yin par blta'o// / dbul mo'i lam gang yin pa de ni mye skye myi 'chi' ba ste/ de
336a6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung // chos kyi sku 'odi ni gnas pa nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyind pa dag gi rnam grangs su
336a7(mdo): gtogs pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyidad pa zhes bya ba de yang bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyi rnyed pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi ring gi dngos
336a8(mdo): po rnam pa gnyis yongs su gtang bar bya'o// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi tshig go// napa zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i tshig ko// de la phyi zhes bya ba ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom
336b1(mdo): 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / de bzhin du bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / sa dang / mgo' dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mya ke dang / sha
336b2(mdo): dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / tshal dang / rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de yang thabs kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pas yongs su zind pas yongs su bsngos pa/ rnam par spyon pa la myi re ba dang / gya nom pa dang / rgya
336b3(mdo): che ba dang / rang gis pa sti ba stang du byas te/ rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 'di ni phyi'i lo// nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'brel dbar 'byung ba la 'jun
336b4(mdo): tham yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrim das kyi gtam dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bas dam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang
336b5(mdo): smon lam dang / ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying rjes yongs su zin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par 'du ba'o// gzhan yang nang gi sbyin po na/ gang 'di mthar 'dzind pa dang / 
336b6(mdo): skye ba dang / 'gag par yongs su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnam par spangs pa/ dga' bas yongs su zind pa/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par 'du ba ste/ 
336b7(mdo): 'od na chos kyi sbyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid la lus dang ngag dang / yid rgol ba myed pa dang / khengs pa myed pa dang / lus rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa dang / ngag rnam par g.yeng ba myed pa dang / yid rnam par ga
336b8(mdo): ba myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zin pa/ gcig tu nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa/ btang snyoms kyis yongs su zind pa/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yang dag par 'du
337a1(mdo): pa 'di ni 'odar tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// gang 'di nyid la rang ki lus dang srog la myi lta bar bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin
337a2(mdo): ba dang / bded pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba dang / phyig/ yol ba'i dngos po rnam par stong zhing byams pas yongs su zin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yang dag par 'dus pa 'di na zhe rje
337a3(mdo): pa'i pha rol tu phyi nid pa'o// gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing chom pa dang / yongs su myi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa myed pa dang / dmyigs pa
337a4(mdo): myed pa dang / byams pas yongs su zi rnyed pa/ ye shes kyi pharode lad tu phyirid pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni bsod
337a5(mdo): nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs pa'i long stso da pa'i sgo'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o// btsun pa sha rati'i bu/ gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha rold tu phyin
337a6(mdo): pa bzhi po 'di nyid rtogs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa rnams byed pa dang / 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / de la gzhol zhing myi rtag pa dang / bdag myed pa dang / stong pa dang / gsob dang / gson
337a7(mdo): dang / dngos po thams cad dngos po myed par yang dag par stond pa'o// mdor bstan 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti muka dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing / chos kyi dbyings na
337a8(mdo): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / mnyam par yang dag par stond pa'o// dmyigs pa dang bral ba 'di ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
337b1(mdo): stong pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nad pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs so// 
337b2(mdo): bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / shes pa dang shes bya mtha' dag dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
337b3(mdo): bar rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gas ra pa mdor masmras te bstand pa'o// rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sku'i che'i tshad
337b4(mdo): bskal par bzhugs te/ bstan cing bshad kyang mthar da phyi nad par myi 'gyur ro// sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung gi gas pa ba'ang de bzhin no// thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
337b5(mdo): rnam pa dang / so so'i rnam pa dang kha dog dang rtags dang / dbyib/ sa dang / ngag dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya// ba bstand pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang bstan par myi spyod mod
337b6(mdo): 'od kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gi rig pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de na de'i phyir rngam grang so 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ bdag
337b7(mdo): cag lta bu byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang mi dgos 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi 'drabs kyis sems cad kyi khams mthal las mu myed pa'i bsam pa dang / 
337b8(mdo): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / blo gros dang / tho dang / rtogs pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu myed pa dang / sems can gyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod
338a1(mdo): yul dang skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lam sna tshogs dang / myo shes pa dang ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / myi snang ba dang / mun pa dang // mun na ka dang / 'gro ba lnga dang
338a2(mdo): 'gro ba drug dang / khams gsum pa thog ma dang / dbus dang 'jig par gnas pa// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad par gnas pa/ dus gsum dang phyogs la mgo mongs pa skye ba
338a3(mdo): dang / rga ba la sogs pa na pa dang / nad dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bdel ba dang / 'khrug pa las stsogs khas nyin cig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can
338a4(mdo): rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma brgal ba bskal pa dang / dgrol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyind pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan la
338a5(mdo): bzla ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bkod pa dang / gnas thams cad du gyur da pa'i lam la dkod pa dang / mya ngan la/ sa 'das pa shind tu bde' ba don dam pa la zhi ba 'khrugs pa
338a6(mdo): myed pa/ dge' ba nad myed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
338a7(mdo): dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la sbyar da pa dang / yang dag bas 'dzind tu gzhug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / dka' ba dang / 
338a8(mdo): dang ba dang / mgul ba'i sa la yang dag par gzud pa dang / chos rtogs pa'i byed par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho' chen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i dus dang / tshod la myi 'da'
338b1(mdo): bar bya ba dang / de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du byas te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i phan pa dang / bde ba/ dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po'i bla na myed pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas
338b2(mdo): gcig tu brgyud de/ gnas par bya ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu lung byan pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes goms brnal 'byor du gyur pa rgyun
338b3(mdo): myi 'chad pa dang / bskal pa yod la yongs su ma sbyind pa yongs su smyind par bya ba'i 'os su gyur da pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo zhig mdun du byas te/ 'dug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad pa
338b4(mdo): bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mchog tu ngo mtsharu du gyurd cing rmad du byung bar gyur da te/ dga' ba thob nas gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'od
338b5(mdo): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// nga gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu nyi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sgra bskrag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la
338b6(mdo): chos zab mo la tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyang legs so// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de skad smras pa bzhin no// btsun pa sha ra da ti'i
338b7(mdo): bu ting nge 'dzind 'di'i phyir ci'i nas de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin da 'di'i mying rdo rje'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ 
338b8(mdo): phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gnyen la shin da tu gzhan sha chags pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ med du bkal cha lad pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal to// gas ba
339a1(mdo): pa'i bdag po log na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdol sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsal ba'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstand cing bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ba leg so// 
339a2(mdo): legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig
339a3(mdo): te nad kyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgol la phyag bzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsa lad cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs
339a4(mdo): kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na mying 'dzind pa yang dkon na/ rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs
339a5(mdo): 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu dag gang ka'i klung chad myed grangs myed dang pag tu myed pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi tshul las shi nad tu 'das pa snyed/ chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral
339a6(mdo): ba skyes so// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
339a7(mdo): myi dang kyi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dgan myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir myi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
339a8(mdo): tu sems skyes so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu myed cing grangs myed la/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa dag kyang rnam pa drug
339b1(mdo): tu g.yos so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lakan rdo rjel chos kyi dga' pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir napa ma 'a'i dkyil nas rnams ma 'dungs par kun nas smra byung ngo // byang rgyab sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul kyi gzhal byed
339b2(mdo): nga gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas si la snyan dang / theg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs blangs khas lha'i bu mo rnams gang byed do// spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / 
339b3(mdo): dang/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng dang / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / sud pa la dang / dri mchog dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / pa rig
339b4(mdo): ka dang / pa rig ka chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung ched po dang / man dar ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man hUMsha ka dang / man d+hu sha ka chen po dang / kun nas skyes dang / kun nas
339b5(mdo): skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par phab zo// spos chu'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab bo// de nas chang pa dang / khyal 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 
339b6(mdo): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gi don gyi tshogs dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / skyem byed dang / bsgrub pa dang / sprul 'dzi

339b8(mdo): brtsegs dpa log 'dren las thams cad dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang / bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzer da te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang rnamapa la btsugs nas/ bcom
340a1(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbya rad pa btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag kozi rad cing nye bar gzi da bas rigs
340a2(mdo): sngags 'chang thams cad la dngos grub gastsol pa dang / dam tshig thams cad du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po bdag cag la bstand du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
340a3(mdo): kyis tshangs pa las stsogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legs so legs so// 
340a4(mdo): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyed la rang gi snying po bstand par bya'o// de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol da to// de nas bcom ldan
340a5(mdo): 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho' chen po dang / sgra lta bu'i ga sung tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs pas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab pa/ thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge' ba/ seMs
340a6(mdo): can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/ gsal ba 'jebs pa/ dka ba mnyen bsnyan pa brjod pa'i tshig khams thams cad la go bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs po'i seng ge'i sgra bla na myed pa'i de grub pa'i des
340a7(mdo): kas sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / ta d+yar/ dz+wa la dza ya/ ja ya ba na/ rgyam
340a8(mdo): tham ma yi/ mas sum/ nga ba'i ngos/ ngasan te/ nga yan ti/ a dzi ti/ a yAn ci te/ ti te/ sam du rdza bdun snyam pa ni/ rdzas ldan/ mazhen/ he te kAr le ke'u me/ sarba bu sa
