340b7(mdo): la swA hA/ ma mo rnams la sA hA/ mtshan rnams la sA hA/ bgyegs dang log 'dren thams cad la sA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la sA hA// lha dang kru dang gnod sbyin dang / dr-i za dang lha ma yin dang / 
341a1(mdo): nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang \u0f7f/ srin po las sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la swA hA/ chur shog tshur
341a2(mdo): shoka/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ru/ sa ra swa ra/ tai shwa ti thA ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM yung/ pU / tsan NA li/ ma tang gi/ pra mA ni/ pu ka si// de bzhin gshegs
341a3(mdo): pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur da cig/ swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'odi gsungs pa na/ thams cad
341a4(mdo): dang lhal 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyurd nas/ chu shing gi tshal rlung drag po chen po sa bskyod de pha ba chad pa bzhin du g.yol zhing kul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje bur bus btab pa bzhin du zug cing
341a5(mdo): zhig sa la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal po'i phyir/ 'du shes tsam/ kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsarang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
341a6(mdo): cha lad to// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor 'di srong shig/ ngas dam tshe ka yongs su 'dzin de du bcug no// rigs sngags grub pa/ 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la gzhol bar bsgrubs so// de skad ces bka'
341a7(mdo): su lad pa dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje
341a8(mdo): trag po la phyag 'tshal lo// A~M ka li ki li'i/ bA la ke lI ki lA yA swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das khyod ni bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang pa lags te/ rigs sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lag so// 
341b1(mdo): des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis la btang bar mchi'o// dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub gsal ba 'gyi'o// lung bzhin 'gyu'o/ bzung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par 'gyi'o// babyen pa dang na
341b2(mdo): 'arjen thams cad rnam par gzhig go// sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o// 'byung po thams cad rnam par ka zhig bar bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyin
341b3(mdo): ba ni ma rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das bdakri snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di ni 'di na sa bskal da ba grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyis pa bkyigs dang
341b4(mdo): log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe/ bcom// ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho la mchog 'dzind me ltar blos rnam par
341b5(mdo): bsgyings shing / rnam par rol pa mngon shes tri zhim zhing dpal gyi sa bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du gsol// gsang ba ba'i bdag bo lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu/ 
341b6(mdo): 'khor de dag thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / bde' bas tshim par gyurd te/ kas papa kha'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dmachig ki bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang
341b7(mdo): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsa lad pa/ kun dka' bo khyod kyi mchos kyi dam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ ltogs shika/ 'dzin du chug cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya che
341b8(mdo): yang dag par ston cig dang / de sems can mang po la yun ring por ban pa dang / bde ba dang / ma ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes blan byed pa'i chags pa myed la sgrib pa myed pa thob par gyur da cing rtogs pan 'as/ 
342a1(mdo): !/ su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang /

342a3(mdo): rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// dbul po'i rigs su skye bar myi 'gyur/

342b7(mdo): bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/

343a2(mdo): bya bar yang gi shug/ rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i 'ang ba brtsegs pa'i gzungs shes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes
343a3(mdo): bya ba ga mo lad te// mngon par dga' nas cang myi smra bar gyur da to// de nas byams pa la mtshogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
343a4(mdo): dpa' chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po las stsogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jigarten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnon sbyind dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

343b2(mdo): mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// oM badz+ra tsan ta sa la du thA na da ka ha na da na pa tsa hUM phaT/ nam sa ma ta ma ka te ny+tsa/ sarba mu khye b+h+ya/ m-i tshan Na ma ga ro sha 'adz+ra pa ni hU~M phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'o zhi smos

343b5(mdo): myi tshugs pa'i gzungs// rdzogs/ s+ho// / rgya kar skad du/ ma rgya 'japa ni 'gu h+ya na ma a ShI ka sa man tra ba ri b+hi ta na ma d+ha ra ni/ 
343b6(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa la ka na rdo rje'i gsang ba'i mying brgyad po gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 8/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
343b7(mdo): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong ka dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
343b8(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal da pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni rigs sngags kyi
344a1(mdo): cho ga zhib mo 'di brjod pas khyod na mi rungs pas bsnyen par dka' ba/ thub par dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyis 'phags pa ma yin no// khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo gang brjod pa de
344a2(mdo): thams cad ni/ gsapa chen bral ba dang / rigs ji ma bzhin du las byed pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs 'di dang / rigs sngags mchog gachog zhib mo 'odi bde bar grub pa'i phyir/ khyod kyi gsang ba'i mying brgyad
344a3(mdo): po gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskor da pa dang bcas pa// ngas lag na rdo rje khyod la brjod par bya'o// 'di thos nas 'tshams myed pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa rnam par sbyangs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje khyod kyang man+de
344a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bkyegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang rab tu 'byer par 'gyur ro// log 'arjen bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu zhi bo rnams kyang phyogs bzhi dag tu rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro// 
344a5(mdo): 'di blags na tshangs par ma pyad pa yang spyad par 'gyur ro// 'di zos na thub par ma byas la'ang thub par 'gyur ro// 'di rnyed na bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro// 
344a6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyang mthong zhing de dag / kyang snying rab tu dga' bas de la bsrung ba byed par 'gyur ro// dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
344a7(mdo): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gsang ba'i phyir brgyad po gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskorar pa dang bcas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon
344a8(mdo): cig 'di lta ste/ khyod na na baglang po che'i lta bu'o// khyod ni legs par brgyand pa'o// rkye na yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas so// khyod ni shind tu rnam par gnond pa'o// khyod ni bden pa'i srin no// khyod ni
344b1(mdo): dka' ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// khyod ni 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba can no// khyed nig thugs bzung po dang ldan pa'o// gang zhig khyod kyi mying 'di dag klog pa 'am nyand pa de ni tshe rabs bye ba khrag zha/ 
344b2(mdo): 'bum phrag bdun du sems can dmyal bar skye bar myi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun du bzhugs zhing de dag la chos ston dpar la gyur te/ chos bstand pa des
344b3(mdo): de dag pa ldan gyi rna rnams kyi nang tu skye bar 'gyur ro// na mo nyud na mya nas dam bya/ rnam sangs bya/ dam sangs kyi/ na mo bam pan gyi/ na sa 5/ yad de med de/ mam som nu / tir / mi ga
344b4(mdo): b+hi ri d+hi si ni/ sidi s+yad du me/ sarba ka danaM/ sad+ha ya/ man rdzas hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sra lad nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po leg na rdo rje yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
344b5(mdo): kyis gsungs pa la mngod par bstod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i mying brgyad po gsang sngags kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dang bcas pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// 
344b6(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ a r+ya ma hA naM pi pu la bi mA na su pra ti shwe te/ ku h+yan pa mahas+yad ka la ra dza namad+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas po'i gan
344b7(mdo): myed 'a shind tu gnas pa legs pa'i dam pa'i gsang po'i cho ga zhib mo la rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'as
344b8(mdo): kyis rgyal ze'i khrib kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par mdzad/ dpyod pa pa dang kun tu sku dang / de dag la sogs pa mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyang 'drub sam par mdzad de/ 
345a1(mdo): ya 9/ 'khor ba'i skyon 'thor ba'i chu bo'i pha rold tu gshegs so// gang gi tshe bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag par mdzad nas/ bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dam bu'i gling bkang ba'i che
345a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ sa thams cad rdo rjer gyur da nas/ 'jigs pa'i sgra yang ma thos nas shing mtshon cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogs su bab par
345a3(mdo): gyurang to// rgyal po la'i bkye grong khyer gyi sum mdo'i dbus su de'i me de yang brtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma 'dab ma stong pa/ sdong po de 'jam bu'i chu po'i ka sem/ sdong buni byi ru h+ya/ sred ni tshangs pa
345a4(mdo): li 'jig rten gyi bar du thug pa 'od dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bad ma de byung nas phyogs bcu'i thams cad du snang bar byas so// de nas pad ma las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
345a5(mdo): skul ba'i sgra 'di dag byung ngo // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ lo// AM ma Ni pad dzA hr-i da ya/ badz+re ma rA s+ya mya/ bide dA pa Ni/ 
345a6(mdo): ha na ha na/ badz+ra kar b+he tra sa yA tA sa ya/ sarba mA ra b+ha ba na ni hUM hAM/ san p+tar san d+ha ra/ b+hud d+ha mAM tri sarba ta tha ga ta/ bad dzA ka la pa/ a d+hiShI te sA hA// pad ma de las yang legs so zhes
345a7(mdo): bya ba'i skra grags te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra yis bkang nas/ shaka kya thub bya srid pa'i dgon pa las ni rgal/ bdud ni bcom/ nyon mongs po'i rdul ni skyengs/ ma rig
345a8(mdo): 'i sgo nga ni sbubs ni dz+wal chos kyi sgron ma chen po spar te/ gang gi phyir gzungs 'di'i mthus/ sa rdo rjer byin gyis bar pas nas/ bdud 'di bcom pa legs so legs so// de nas gsang ba pa'i
345b1(mdo): sa na da rje su mi zhes byed cing lus 'ad ldan 'das kyin bsrog la sdugatu pa ste/ po 'ad 'das la 'di skad mam zhi pa'i te/ rjod 'das sa med du dag ldan/ 
345b2(mdo): chen po 'dadi 'dus pa dang po la 'jam bu'i gling du byung lags/ com ldan 'das rigs sngogs 'di 'jig rten kyi sngon zung bar mu tho bo lags so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis gi sang pa pa'i ba gi sa lak+sha sa
345b3(mdo): de rjel bka' \u0f7f/ kand sngon pabu chen po rgyas pa'i/ zhal byed la bzhin tu gnas la/ gsangs lazhes bya ba'i ga zungs sod de/ ra nus myong dasum gyi lcematshan po la 'jog rten gyi sa 'di'i rjem
345b4(mdo): rang bzhin du gyur nas/ mtshan tsha'i char 'bab po 'di yang kas tshogs su gyur da te 'ba'o// gzungs 'di mi mthus bu ma me pa srog chags kyi 'dul te/ 'di'i mdus
345b5(mdo): sum mdo'i dbus su pad ma 'di byung bar gyur to// lag na rje gzungs 'od myed par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par/ myi nus/ bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'i
345b6(mdo): mtshol skyems pam ma yin te/ chos kyi sgron ma spar myi nus so// lag na rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag tu ma spyad na/ ji srod du ngas gzungs 'di mnyan pa dang / mngon par brtson pas bcom
345b7(mdo): 'grum ma byas kyi bdu d+ha/ ras sangs rgyas nyid tho'o bar ma nus kyi bdu// ras sangs rgyas nyid thob par ma nus kyo// khyis ngas sangs rgyas nyid bzo'o// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthul che zhing phan yon cheb/ 
345b8(mdo): yin no// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa yin no// lag na rdo rje'i myir bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
346a1(mdo): thams cad kyi mchad bzung bar 'gyur ro// brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
346a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang / dri dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
346a3(mdo): zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso lad to// bcom ldan 'das myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad par mi 'dri ba dag gdal ba bstan tu gso lad/

346a6(mdo): dran pa las rmongs pa/ yid ches par dka' ba/ par myi 'dzind po/ mar mya 'dzind pa/ dge sbyong du myi 'dzind pa/ bram zer myi 'dzind pa/ rigs kyi tsha bo la bsnyen bkur gyi byed pa ste/ des na gzungs 'ad
346a7(mdo): lag tu 'ong bar myi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams chung ba/ skal ba chung pa// blo nan pa/ de rnams kyis kyang nyan par myi 'gyur/ 'chad par myi 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs
346a8(mdo): po'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di la dad pa bskyed par myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' pha lang to// rigs kyi lung ni 'di nas shar phyogs
346b1(mdo): logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa gang ka'i klung ki bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stopa 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ grong khyer gyi khor

346b3(mdo): nor bu dang gser 'bar ba'i 'gro rgyan sna tshogs kyi / brgya nad pa/ lha'i gzugs can mthu' dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/ nya shes gnyen thams cad dang ldan pa/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs khar kho

347a4(mdo): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / ser gyi kha dog gi lu sa 'od 'phro ba/ mtshan dang ldan pa// rin po che sna bdud kyi pad ma'i dastan la 'khod pa ste/ thams cad kyang spobs pa myi zad pa
347a5(mdo): smon pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul ba/ rig pa'i gnas rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas ba'i gzhal myed khang shi nad tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang pa pa zhes bya ba'i

347b1(mdo): zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ myu dgrol ze gcig tu gyurd pa bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang

347b4(mdo): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / skom pa dang / 'don pa dang / sems pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / chung ngun gying nyan par byed dam/ lag pas reg gam/ lus la 'chang ngam/ myin

348a7(mdo): dar gyi ba dan mang pos kun nas margya dad pa/ me tog sna tshogs du mo'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo // sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul ldeg pa las sgra 'byind cing mthol ba
348a8(mdo): dpa dma' bar gyur da to// lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to// rigs sngags 'chang ki gnas thams

349a3(mdo): 'das bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs la thag tus chen po 'di mi yang tu g.yos par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu rin po che dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

350a1(mdo): snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar smra 'byind/ steng ka nem mkha'i bar snang gi lha'i bu rnams kyang / lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba yan lag lnga pa dag dkrol bar byed/ klu chen po gang dag
350a2(mdo): yin pa de dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed/ tri'i phye ma sna tshogs dang / tsad dan gyi chu rnams kyi char yang 'bebs par byed/ gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / lha ba lhub sna tshogs
350a3(mdo): kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par sdang byed dang / nor bu rin po che chen po nyi me'i snying po dang / chu shel dang / me shel dang / dpal gyi
350a4(mdo): snying po'i cher yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i tshir yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ 
350a5(mdo): sA li 'jam bu'i chu bo'i ga seram las byung ba'i me tog dang / lha'i drungul/ las byung ba'i me tog ki char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ lha'i mu/ tig ka 'phreng ba'i cher yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/ 
350a6(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyis na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang // a la la zhes smra snyan par 'byind cing 'byangs kyang / rjes su sgrogs par byed/ legs zhes bya ba sbyin par byed do// bcom ldan 'das
350a7(mdo): shag kya thub pa 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor da pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzam bu'i kri du bzhag pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i
350a8(mdo): ka zhal byed khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa/ gsang ba'i rgyal po chog zhib mo chen po 'jam bu'i gling du rab tu spyod par bgyis la legs so legs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ 
350b1(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas chang ma'i mdzod su nas/ 'od zer sna tshogs babyo ste/ 'od zer de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag gis sangs rgyas/ 
350b2(mdo): kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bskul zhing snang bar mdzad do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang snang bar mdzad/ lha'i gnas/ thams cad dang / klu'o/ 
350b3(mdo): gnas thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ma yin gyi mi rnams la yang bskul cing snang bar mdzad de/ nga log nas bcom ldan 'das de 'dzin
350b4(mdo): shegs bshag kya thub pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ sla ra yang gtsug rted kyi gsab tu zhugs so// de nas khyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas
350b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhi dag nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/ tshad myed 'i keng ga'i klung ki bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
350b6(mdo): ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun kyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul da nas 'bab 'jig ma'i nang du 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i ki ser
350b7(mdo): las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dag byung ba de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang dang ki 'khor dang / khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par
350b8(mdo): bkra bA gnas rtsang mase/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad yang dag par dges pa mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod nas/ rang rang gi seng ge li khri la bzhugs so// de nas byad
351a1(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab kanas chang ma ka na po der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
351a2(mdo): zos phyag 'tshal da te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu dka'/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / wA dang / klu dang / gnod
351a3(mdo): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am cad pa/ lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma lags pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu dka'/ rigs sngags 'chang gi tshogs kyi 'dus pa
351a4(mdo): chen po'ang lhags/ 'di lta ste/ lag na rdo rje las stsogs pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lhags/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gdal lags pas/ bcom
351a5(mdo): ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal myed khang shind tu gnas pa/ gsang ba rab tu bstand pa'i dus ni 'di lags so// chod na 1'di legs so// zhes lan gnyis lan gsum tu gsol ba
351a6(mdo): btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas chang mas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
351a7(mdo): bo na gu snying po la bkal su lad pa/ rigs kyi bu song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la gsol ba thob shig dang / des khyod la rab tu stond par 'gyur
351a8(mdo): ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ 
351b1(mdo): bacham ldan 'das la yan gsum 'askor ba rgyas te spyan snga 'du gnas co/ ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dam bu'i snying thom 'din dkyim ga mi med to// bcom ldan 'das rna
351b2(mdo): nucan pa rgyam pa'i gan la byed khang ga da d+ha rab tuganas pa gas pal 'di sems can zugs pache ba'i mad du ba tu stan tsug po yang // de ma mtsham ldan 'das banid ga shegs bzhag tu thun sa pa debs
351b3(mdo): ba bugs su chud nas/ gsang ba ba'i bdag pa la ka na de rje la bka' stsal dpa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag zi ma la/ 'khang ma ba 'di'i dbus kyis phyogs sun rdzam la sngun cig/ den pa gsang ba pa'i 'das/ 
351b4(mdo): la kan rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/ 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i dibus gang na ba der song nas/ brgyan pa de la rdo rjes bsnun te/ mal bsnun ma thag tu/ 
351b5(mdo): de nam sa kyu bzhi gas so// stong gsum gyi stong ga chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu gtugayos so// gam zag tus phyog sa dang ri po che lnga 'dun gyi 'ang pa 'thogs pa gru
351b6(mdo): bzhi ba ka pa bzhi bug pa/ skra bzhi btod pa/ mnyam pa nyams dga' ba/ shind tu rnam par phye ba/ chas mdzes par byas pa/ bkra ba/ blta la na stu ka pa/ 'od 'badas/ zam skas bzhi dang ldan pa// 'phang du dpa/ 
351b7(mdo): tshed gsum yod pa/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo // khang pa bacheg mo'i dbus der yang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo gse ma las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tika gi tra ba drA mas brgya nad pa
351b8(mdo): rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i trai le sh+ya ka ye mkha'i rde bas g.yogs pa/ trail bu tu ma 'phyang du bcuka la/ dad kyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par brgya dad la zhig byung ngo // 
352a1(mdo): mdzad stod de'i gus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs pa de la mchod pa mdzad do/ 
352a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i 'phor de yang khang pa pheg ma de dang / mchod rten la/ byed pa// brjed par byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / tri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
352a3(mdo): ba dan dang / rol mo dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas lga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma
352a4(mdo): yin pa 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar skyes te/ ya mtshan du gyur da/ spro bar gyur da nas khang pa pa cig ma dang / mchod rtend 'di ci'i phyir byung bar gyurd ces/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra thon par 'byind cing / mchod rten
352a5(mdo): de dang khang pa ba cheka ma de la skor bar byed/ mchod par byed/ badz+re/ da bar byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / tri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis
352a6(mdo): mchod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dang thal mo sbyar da te/ 'bod de/ phyag 'tshal bar byed do// de nas khabab pa cig ma de la
352a7(mdo): sgra byung ba/ kye 'khor mang po dag par snang las ci sde pa ltos shig/ de nas ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar sngangs bltas te/ bltas ma thag tu bye dUr+ya dang / nor bu rin po che chen po las
352a8(mdo): byung ba'i srin kyi phung po zhig byung ngo // de nas sprin gyi phung po'i ste du d+ha/ nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal myed khang shi nad tu rab tu gnas pa/ gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yi ge gser gyi kha dog tu bris pa ma
352b1(mdo): nom mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas spa byung ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor nu chen po rgyam bya'i gzhal byed 'ang shin tu rab tu ga nas bya/ gsang ban po bgyi ba'i gzungs pa zag tu
352b2(mdo): ka mo l+ya/ bathag tu gsol/ swA byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i re re'i rgyan sngar sbrid kyi thung ba lo zhes babyung nas/ 'di skad ces kyang dbyangs su sgrogs so// bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de la/ 
352b3(mdo): 'tsham lo// phyag 'tshal lo// mchod rten mchog 'di kye zhig dang / mchod nyid de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugs so// da'i sa thum tsho 'phrul gyirna pa 'ama'aphrul ba'i khyad pa
352b4(mdo): na po 'di grang zhi mna'i ma nus de bdi na gshegs pas cad kyi mu 'phrul la yang dang/ da du na margyam paganas byed/ shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i gzungs kyi
352b5(mdo): dkyil 'khor dpe/ chog dang / rigs sngags dang / napo kyad dpa 'am sa pa' dag rdzogs gi rgyas par 'tshadabus su legs par 'chad par 'gyur ro// de nas phyogs brgya na/ 
352b6(mdo): 'dus bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhag kya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das mchod rten
352b7(mdo): rin po che 'di dang / 'di na bzhugs pa 'di ste ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dang bu rnam par bkra ba dang / rdo rje 'phags
352b8(mdo): khyil gyi zhes bya'o// de dag bstan pa'i skams dbye ba mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pas/ rdzu 'phrul kyi 'phrul chen thos/ 'das 'theg pa'i mchod nyid
353a1(mdo): ga byen pa der bzhud de/ phyog g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can/ bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa brkyang nas// mchod rten mchog de'i sgo la sgo 'phyar phye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
353a2(mdo): sku rnams bstand to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shaka kya thub pa legs so legs so// deng khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i klo
353a3(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs bshaka kya thub pa mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
353a4(mdo): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gso s+ho// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'a de dag khang pa brtseg ma'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i slad du byung
353a5(mdo): kang nas ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba bskal pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ da myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa/ gzhal du byed pa// gzhal kyis myi
353a6(mdo): la ba ba/ tshad ga zung du byed pa bas/ ches grangs myed pa na gang gi tshe 'dzam bu kwib 'byord pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dgal ba dang skye bo dang / myi khang pos gang zhing ma mos ma btab pa'i 'brasas su byung ste
353a7(mdo): bdag ga'i myed cing yongs su gzung ba myed de/ 'jig rten thams cad 'dol ba dang ldan pa de'i tshe/ 'jam bu'i kli ra sangs rgyas myed do// de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po ron chen ri bro zhes bya ba de la drang sgrogasum zhig gnas te/ kacig/ 
353a8(mdo): ki mying ni nor bu'i phyag tor// gnyis pa ni gser gyi gtsug tor/ gsum pa ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/ de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad bskal pa'i phyir 'di ste ste// 'jig rten du yang dag
353b1(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur snyam zhingapa/ kacig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/ chos yid la byed/ dge 'dun yid la byed do// de nas drang srong de nams de snyam tu bsams nas
353b2(mdo): yud tsam nag cang myi smra bar gyur da cing sems pan de rnams kyis sems can thams cad thams cad mngon 'od dkal ba'i khyams pa rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal myed Sha ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing lha'i myig skyes
353b3(mdo): khyis sa na stong chub ltam na gnas yang 'tshas kyi zhi'i du ba rnangal sra byin pa/ skyes bu dpa pa dag / legs pado lags la khyod 'di sa / 'ad byed pa yang dag pam rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thang
353b4(mdo): sems bskyed pa 'di legs so// kye skyes bu dam pa dka/ nor du na po rgyas pa'i gzhal myed 'ang sha nid tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams
353b5(mdo): cad lnga ldan pa'i don du gsungs pa/ thos bcas kyis phyir myi rjo/ gnas/ zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tho' bar 'gyur/ cham thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ gzungs
353b6(mdo): kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ bdud thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi smon ma sa rabar 'gyur/ dge ba 'i sri pa thams cad mngon tu 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyi nid pa drug yongs su rdzog
353b7(mdo): ma 'gyur/ dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi yul rnams las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na la dang / 
353b8(mdo): mab dang / mya ngan dang // smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi bdel ba dang / 'jug pa rnams las yongs su tha da bar 'gyur ba thos sam/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i klong
354a1(mdo): 'din soms cad gang dag par myi 'dzind pa dang / mang gyi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du gyi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer gyi 'dzind pa dang / phyi dge ba dang / dam pa'i chom spong ba dang / 'phags pa
354a2(mdo): la bskurd pa 'debs pa dang / mnar myed par gzhol pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la slu ba dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa dang / bram ze gsod pa dang
354a3(mdo): ba klang gsod pa dang / chom rkun dang / ka yol can dang / sho gam skugs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / ma byin par lend pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba dang
354a4(mdo): gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang / gzhal lugs la smra byed pa dang / srang la smya byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / da tams la gnog pa dang / bshes pa la'akhu ba dang / sngon gyi
354a5(mdo): las kyi sgribe bas zi nad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad gzungs 'di'i mthus thos pa tsam 'am/ klags pa' ma/ kun chub par byas pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ bris pa/ 
354a6(mdo): 'chang ngam/ rgyal mtshan gyi che mo la 'dogs sam/ glegs bam du byed dam/ ras la bris pa 'am/ dpal bris la'am/ tshig la la bris pa 'am/ ra ba la bris pa 'am/ chung d+ha na skra 'am lag pas res
354a7(mdo): kam gri be mas phog gam/ sems cad gzhan gyis reg na yang de gdon myi za bar phyir myi ldog par gyurd nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 
354a8(mdo): tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad 'bral bar 'gyur// dge ba'izha pa thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'dud thams cad mthar myed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams
354b1(mdo): cad dka' bar 'gyur/ mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa// thams cad dka' bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang thams cad dkal bar 'gyur/ 
354b2(mdo): tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ rtag tu lag pa dang rkang pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ tshig mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur/ bkren par myi 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur/ 
354b3(mdo): lus la dug gis myi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ mes ma yin/ rgyas ma yin/ de la gcan phan khro bo ma 'jigs par myi 'gyur te/ myi rgod kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pas ma
354b4(mdo): yin/ aklos 'jigs pa ma yin/ lam dpal ma gol ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ kanod sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ 'byung ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ srin po'i 'jigs pas ma
354b5(mdo): yin/ sha za'i 'jigs pas ma yin/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'ji gas pas ma yin te/ sbrul gyis 'joshes pas ma yin/ lus la rims kyis myi tshugs te/ zhag cig pa 'am
354b6(mdo): zhag gnyis pa 'am/ zhagag sul 'am/ zhag bzhi pa'am/ rtag pa'i rims sas/ rims sems cad kyis sums kyi gran sa par 'gyur ro// rgya gnad kyi 'gyu s+ho/ rna ba'i nad ma yin/ sna'i nad pa yin/ 
354b7(mdo): lnga'in ma yin/ kha'i nad ma yin/ so di ma yin/ brgya'i nad ma yin/ 'grin pa'i nad ma yin/ na bar thug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i dad pa yin/ rkang pa'i da ma yin te/ nad thams cad kyi 'byung ngo // 
354b8(mdo): chu so'i nid ma yin/ zhang 'byam ma yin/ mchun ma yin/ 'khru ba'i nad ma yani/ shu ba'i dad ma yin/ badz+ra li nad ma yin/ byin pa'i dad ma yin/ rkang pa 'i nad ma 'ayin te/ nad thams cad kyi 'byung ngo // 'di lta
355a1(mdo): chom lpags pa dang ldog pa dang / me dpal dang ston pa dang / g.yin pa dang po la gyig dang / khyi rngo dang / mjed dang / rkang shu las stsogs pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mya 'byung // klang pa
355a2(mdo): na pa ma yin// zhogs byed na pa ma yin/ long bar myi 'gyur/ zha bor ma yin/ sgur bor ma yin/ pha rol gyi mthus/ 'chi bar myi 'gyur/ 'on par mya 'gyur/ sha bkra can du myi 'gyur/ brnyas shing gnas
355a3(mdo): bar myi 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad pa 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i che yang spobs pa myi zad par 'gyur/ sems 'khrug pas dus byed par myi 'gyur// de bzhin ga
355a4(mdo): pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon gsum tu bstand nas/ dbugs la byi rked pa mdzad par 'gyur/ lus la byad dang g.yengs byed kyis myi tshugs/ lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas myi tshugs// bdel bar
355a5(mdo): ka nyid kyis log par 'gyur/ 'de'abar sad par 'gyur/ rmyi la ma na yang sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhi na gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams
355a6(mdo): cad mthong bar 'gyur te/ gsang ba'i gzungs kyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu byung ngo // zhes smras pa mthong ngo // de nas trang song de rnams chos kyi dkal ba snying la reg cing dka' ba thob nas/ ma ma sar gyi gong bu bzhun
355a7(mdo): ba bzhin du lus zhig nas zhu ba'i khu ba de sa'i nang du thim mo// de nas sa'i gzhi de las spyuka ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can/ rtsa ba rin po che sna bad+yAn las byas pa/ lo ma gser las byas pa/ che mo mu tig las khyas
355a8(mdo): 5/ bkral bstan sug pa/ stobs dang ldan pa// ka zil dang ldan pa tri zhim pa/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyes so// smyig ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang / shes te de rnams kyi dbus nas/ khye'u gzug
355b1(mdo): ba'ang ba/ mdzes pa bltan sdug pa la dag brgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gsum byung ngo // denas khye'u de rnams la phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na/ dkyis mo krung sa ston da pa 'a ba'o'ad de// tsam na zhag
355b2(mdo): brgya 'a gyur te// pa ya da napas kya 'a gsar gyur to// na khyo po ma jigan mi byed pa shod tu bcu gnas sa gnam 'di dpa
355b3(mdo): rgyal po chen le bzhi yang steng na gzugs 'dzin cing me te ngag gis gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyu ro zhes dbyangs su sgrogs shing / 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal ba chen po
355b4(mdo): gtsug gnor bu zhes bya ba dang / grul bus kyi rgyal po chen pon ra'u snang po zhes bya ba dang / phreng 'gro' yi na sa rgyal po chen na bu'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'dan tshe rgyal po chen ma
355b5(mdo): nang bul rje zhes bya ba 'or gnad sbyin brgya stong phrag tu ma dang / bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par byed do// ma phyogs rdo yang rin ma ma lnga bdun kyi rang bzhin du mu dad to// me tog gi zhi thams cad kyang rin po che
355b6(mdo): rang bzhin du gyur da to// la ka na rdo rje 'de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong srog ma'i mde lu rnams las byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir
355b7(mdo): zhe na/ lag na rdo rje de dag gi/ 'dra ba pa cig ma'i mchod rtend kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yin no// 'jig rten sa phyogs kyang 'di yin no// 'jig rten kyi khams kyang 'di yin no// smig ma'i mde'u myi khapa' yang / 
356a1(mdo): dog de// dmang bya na/ da dam sa na/ sa mams / na na tham cad rgyas na gnas [।]gas zung
356a2(mdo): rnams dang / decan da gshegs pa de rnams la 'akur sti ngam sa byas bags 'anab dgazhan dag yan rtswa ya de ltar gyi 'alta'o// dbyir zhen/ decanan gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag 'a
356a3(mdo): ma ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pashas yul pa sa legs pa zhes kya phyin te// kyi lu sa kyad kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul kyi rnas par 'phrus ca rgyad kyi rnabyas 'di
356a4(mdo): 5/ ldan gyi sbyor ba gsungs zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i gzungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lu
356a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying rje ro gshegs pa'i gsang ba/ de bzhin
356a6(mdo): byed me khyos/ na/ dasu rjo son dag ya nag la / 
356b1(mdo): gshegs pa mam gro cad do tshul gshegs pa gsang bu/ dbunan gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mo 'phrul gsang ba/ de mazhi gshegs bya thams cad kyi ra byed tu phyin dpa drug yongs su rdzogs
356b2(mdo): mamag mang la/ de sa na gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa'i dgongs pa'i gsang 'i// de mazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i gdul kyi gas pa sa// de bzhin gshegs pa mams cad
356b3(mdo): kyi rgyal 'char gas ma dgashegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ya bdag par 'dzi dad pa'i gas sa de gzhan pa masems cad kyi 'ad ma rab tu byed pa gas / de bzhin gsheg
356b4(mdo): thams ca kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa thugs su chud bsdigs pa pa/ sgra'i 'thams cad 'jig 'a byed pa'i gam 'jig zum pa lags la legasa'o// de nas de bzhi da gshegs 'an na
356b5(mdo): da/ yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa kyi grub pas dgangs pa dang ldan zhing / byed pani / 'di gshegs pa mams cad la gzigs nas/ 'a ze 'di ma tshigs kyi ba thag sa
356b6(mdo): na nye steni byin pa dang / mngo sa dang / dmang po dang / dag po dang / bzhan dang / sa dang / / rirnam pa byedapa su da
357a1(mdo): ma ldan 'das la lan gsum brjod du 'khyis nas// dasu tsug kyi gas ba tu zhugs so// 'di ma dag
357a2(mdo): tu/ com ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung kyangs chen tshan bka pa nas/ rigs ljags chen ma 'di ga sung
357a3(mdo): A~M sa rba ta thA ga ta/ ma shata/ d+hiH ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ rnam tu/ kar b+he/ ma dam ni/ ma hA sa Ni/
